tgt_text: Guvhangano iḽi ḽo amba nga ha mafhungo fanaho na ita uri pulane khulwane dza zwa vhulimi dzi thome shumela vhalimi vha fhano hayani; themamveledziso ya tshifhinga tshilapfu hu tshi itelwa zwiḽiwa zwo liṅwaho fhano hayani ita uri vhupo honoho ha fhethu afho vhu tsireledzee lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu hu tshi itelwa mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa yapo yo livhaho kha vhumatshelo khathihi na khwaṱhisa vhukoni ha vhabveledzi vha zwiḽiwa ha shandukisa zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi zwo ṱavhiwaho fhano hayani..   Sa nḓila ya dovha hafhu dzhiela nṱha mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa, Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thomiwa ha Senthara ya Mveledziso ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Vhulimi ya Lushaka nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhushaka ha Tshandukiso ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Vhulimi ya Muhasho wa Saentsi na Tshandukiso vha tshi shumisana na vha Yunivesithi ya Pretoria.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go tshwarwa ga Kopano ya Ngwaga le Ngwaga ya bo 32 ya IRSC kwa Johannesburg go tloga ka 1 go fitlha ka 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Poposešwa ya diporo mo Lefatsheng le le sa tlhomamisegeng”.
tgt_text: Senthara iyi ḓo tikedza zwa thivhelwa fhungudzwa na ndangulo ya malwadze zwiliṅwa na zwifuwo, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo shela mulenzhe kha engedzea ha mveledziso, vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa khathihi na mveledziso ya vhupo ha mahayani ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu   Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: RSC ke kopano sa boditšhaba e kopanyang dirutegi mo mererong ya pabalesego ya diporo go ralala lefatshe go abelana maitemogelo bona ka maikaelelo go tokafatsa pabalesego ya diporo..   Jaaka tokololo ya IRSC, Molaodi wa Taolo ya Diporo wa Aforika Borwa nnile moamogelabaeng wa kopano la bofelo ka.
tgt_text: Tsaino ya Thendelanomviswa ya Phaḓaladzo ya Mbumbano ya Afrika (AU).
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ṋetshedzwa kha Phaḽamennde ha Thendelanomviswa ya AU ya nga ha Milayo na Maitele Phaḓaladzo, Muvhuso Wapo na Mveledziso Yapo uri sainiwe.

src_text: Seralwa sa Leano la Mafaratlhatlha Bosetšhaba la 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya bo.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina iyi thendelanomviswa nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go phasaladiwa ga seralwa sa NIP 2050 Kgato ya bo 2 go ngoka ditshwaelo tsa baagi.
Leano le le neelana ka tsela ya go matlafatsa le go tlaleletsa diporojeke tsa puso tse di golaganeng..
tgt_text: Thendelanomviswa ya Phaḓaladzo ṋetshedza muhanga kha mashango oṱhe ane vha miraḓo une wa vha ḽiṅwalo ḽi sumbedzaho nḓila nga ha phaḓaladzwa ha maanḓa na mishumo bva kha mivhuso ya vhukati ya kha maṅwe masia muvhuso.

src_text: Le tlhagisa diporojeke tsa botlhokwa tsa mafelobonno batho; motlakase wa bommasepala; metsi; matlakala a popota; dipalangwa; mafaratlhatlha thuto le boitekanelo; mafaratlhatlha dijithale, le bosenyi le bobodu..   Popego ya leano le tlamela ka ponelopele ya karolo e tshwanetseng go lejwa tlamela ka tshekatsheko ya maemo ga jaana tlhalosa dipeelo tse di botlhokwa go netefatsa katlego le go tlhalosa tse di tshwanetseng go dirwa go fitlhelela ponelopele eo tshitshinya tsela ya tsenyotirisong e tshwanetseng go dirwa mo pakeng ya dingwaga tse tharo tsa leanotiro..   Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale.
tgt_text: Iyi Thendelanomviswa ambesa nga maanḓa nga ha phaḓaladzwa ha maanḓa na vhuḓifhinduleli, muhanga wa mavhusele apo khathihi na mveledziso yapo..   Muṱangano wa vhu32 wa Khoro ya zwa Vhutsireledzi ha Zwiporo ya Dzitshaka (IRSC) wa ṅwaha nga ṅwaha.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Muṱangano wa vhu32 wa IRSC wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha ngei Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 1 swika ḽa 6 Tshimedzi 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U fhaṱa hafhu zwiporo nga huswa kha Ḽifhasi ḽi sa fulufhedzisi”.

src_text: Letlhomeso le le phasaladitswe ka 2021 go ngoka ditshwaelo tsa baagi..   Letlhomeso le le tlamela ka dipilara tse tlhano tsa ditsereganyo mo go direng Bodiredipuso ba porofešenale.
tgt_text: IRSC ndi muṱangano wa dzitshaka une wa kuvhanganya vhaḓivhi vha zwa vhutsireledzi ha zwiporo bva kha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe uri vha kovhane nḓivho hu tshi itelwa khwinifhadza vhutsireledzi kha zwiporo..   Sa muraḓo wa IRSC, vha Vhulangi ha Vhutsireledzi ha Zwiporo ha Afrika Tshipembe vho fara muṱangano uyu lwa fhedzisela nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Dipilara tse di akaretsa go ngoka le tlhaolo ya pele ga go tsena mo Bodiredipusong; peodinakong le tshimololo; thulaganyo le taolo ya tiragatso; thuto e tswelelang le tlhabololo ya porofešenale; le tlhatlogo ka maemo mo tirong le ditiragalo mo tirong..   Diphetogo mo Dipeelong tsa Tiro tsa Bakaedikakaretso (bo DG).
tgt_text: Luṱa lwa 2 lwa Mvetamveto ya Pulane ya Themamveledziso ya Lushaka ya 2050 (NIP 2050).

src_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo e tshitshinyang mekgwa ya go matlafatsa nonofo le bokgoni ba bo DG mo Bodiredipusong.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ganḓiswa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso ha mvetamveto ya Luṱa lwa 2 lwa NIP 2050 hu tshi itelwa zwa vhukwamani na miraḓo ya tshitshavha.

src_text: Pegelo e dirile ditshitshinyo di le mmalwa, go akaretsa paka ya tiro ya bo DG le taolo ya maatlatiro ka Bothati ba Khuduthamaga go bantlhankedi ba ba rweleng maikarabelo..   Pegelo e tshitshintse gape gore DG mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente tla tsewa gape le Tlhogo ya Botsamaisi ba Puso.
tgt_text: Pulane iyi sumbedzisa nḓila kha zwa khwaṱhiswa na engedzwa ha thandela dza muvhuso dzo ṱanganelaho nahone dza ndeme..   Lu dovha hafhu lwa ṱalusa thandela dza ndeme dza zwa vhudzulo ha vhathu; muḓagasi wa ha masipala; maḓi; mathukhwi omaho; vhuendi ha hwala vhaṋameli; themamveledziso ya pfunzo na mutakalo; themamveledziso ya didzhithala, vhugevhenga na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.

src_text: Mo diporofenseng, tiro e tla newa oDG ba ba mo dikantorong tsa Ditonakgolo.
tgt_text: Tshivhumbeo tsha pulane tshi ṋetshedza bono ḽa masia ane khou tea lavheleswa khao, tsha dovha hafhu tsha ṋetshedza tsenguluso ya tshiimo tsha zwino, tsha bvisela khagala nyimele dza ndeme dzine dza ḓo ita uri hu vhe na shuma zwavhuḓi khathihi na sumbedzisa zwine zwa tea itwa itela swikela bono ḽeneḽo.

src_text: Pegelo e tshitshintse gape mekgwa ya go kaela mafapha ka ga taolo ya dikonteraka tsa bo DG..   Tsamaiso ya Taolo ya Tiragatso ntšhwa ya bo DG a tlhabololwa go nyalanya le diphetogo tse di dumeletsweng..   Tona ya Nama-o-Tshwere ya Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi, Rre Thulas Nxesi tla bitsa kopano ya bobegakgang mo bekeng e tlang go tlhalosa Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale le go tlhagisa gape le diphetogo tse di letleletsweng mo dipeelong tsa tiro ya bo DG..   Pegelo ya Botlhano ya Tswelopele mo Tsenyotirisong ya Lekwalopuso la Mabudusatsela ka ga Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole (WPRPD) ya 2020-.
tgt_text: Tshi dovha hafhu tsha dzinginya maitele u thoma shumiswa ha pulane iyi ane ḓo itwa nga vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha miraru ya pulane ya kushumele..   Muhanga wa shuma wa Lushaka ho livhiwa kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Pegelo ya Botlhano ya Tswelopele mo Tsenyotirisong ya WPRPD e tlhagisang peodinakong ka go tsenngwa tirisong ga WPRPD.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa thoma shuma ha Lushaka ho livhiwa kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa.

src_text: Pegelo e akaretsa ditshitshinyo go tswa go mafapha puso bosetšhaba le diporofense tlamela ka peodinakong ka ga tsenyotiriosong ya pholisi e akaretsang kabo ya matlole..   Pegelongwaga ya ntlha ya tswelopele phasaladitswe ka.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu wo anḓadzwa hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhukwamani nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Pegelo ya Tswelopele ya botlhano letleletswe go phasaladiwa ka kuranta ya puso ke Lefapha la Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba nang le Bogole.

tgt_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza thikho ṱhanu dza nga ha maga u ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza mishumogudwa.

src_text: Tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya Tumelano ka ga go Fedisiwa ga Mefuta yotlhe ya Kgethololo Kgatlhanong le Basadi (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Thikho idzi dzi katela maitele ane vha u ranga musi hu tshi ṱoḓa kungwa vhashumi khathihi na u nanga vhashumi vho teaho henefho kha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso pfumbudzwa na ṱanganyiswa na vhaṅwe vhashumi; ndangulo ya vhupulani na mashumele; vhugudi vhune ha khou bvela phanḓa, khathihi na mveledziso ya mishumogudwa hu tshi katelwa aluwa kha zwa mishumo khathihi na zwiwo zwa mishumo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore mametlelelwe.
tgt_text: Tshanduko kha nyimele dza kutholelwe kwa Vhalangi Vhahulwane (DGs).

src_text: Diphetogo tse di tlamela ka paka e okeditsweng ya dikopano tsa komiti e sekasekang dipegelo tsa dinaga tse leng ditokololo..   Aforika Borwa saenile tumelano ka 1993 le go mametlelela ka Sedimonthole.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo une wa khou dzinginya maga u khwaṱhisa vhukoni na zwikili zwa dziDG kha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso.

src_text: Go romelwa kwa Palamenteng go senka go golaganya tumelano e mametleletsweng mo malobeng le tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya tumelano .
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo ṋetshedza makumedzwa fhambanaho, hu tshi katelwa na themo ya shuma ya dziDG khathihi na ndangulo ya vhurumelwa nga vha Khorotshitumbe ya muvhuso kha vhaofisiri vho ṋewaho maanḓa..   Muvhigo uyu dovha hafhu wa dzinginya uri DG Ofisini ya Phresidennde ḓo ḓivhiwa sa Ṱhoho ya Ndangulo ya Muvhuso.

src_text: Tumelano ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe ka ga Kamogelo ya Makwalothuto Tebang le Thuto Kgolwane.
tgt_text: Kha mavunḓu, hoyu mushumo ḓo ṋetshedzwa kha dziDG kha ofisi dza Vhalangavunḓu.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Tumelano ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe ka ga Kamogelo ya Makwalothuto tebang le Thuto Kgolwane gore tsenngwe molaong semmuso.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo dovha hafhu wa dzinginya maga u eletshedza mihasho nga ha kulangelwe kwa khonṱhiraka dza dziDG.

src_text: Fa sena go tsenngwa molaong semmuso tla romelwa go Mokgatlo wa Thuto, Saenthifiki le Setso wa Ditšhabakopano (UN) le mono gae tla nna karolo ya Molao wa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la Naga la Makwalothuto wa ngwaga wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 67 wa 2008)..   Tumelano eno ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe tlhoma melawana ya lefatshe ka bophara ya Kamogelo ya makwalothuto ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane le makwalothuto mangwe ka go dira gore lefatshe ka bophara go se nne le makwalothotu a sa tseeweng tsiya a nang le lehunelo, le a sa tlhaolweng.
tgt_text: Sisteme ya Ndangulo ya Mashumele dziDG yo senguluswaho khou dovha ya senguluswa hafhu nga huswa itela uri elane na tshanduko dzo tendelwaho.

src_text: Tumelano eno neela tetla ya gore makwalothuto dinaga disele mo dinageng tse 193 tse leng ditokololo tsa UN amogelwe ke dinaga tseno..   Kgogelomorago ya Ditokafatso mo Kaeding ya Maloko Khuduthamaga.
tgt_text: Minisṱa vha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Ndangulo vho tou Farelaho, Vho Thulas Nxesi, vha ḓo vhidza muṱangano wa vhoramafhungo vhege ḓaho une khawo vha ḓo bvisela khagala Muhanga wa shuma wa Lushaka wo livhiswaho kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa khathihi na bvisela khagala tshanduko dzo tendelwaho dza nga ha nyimele dza shuma dza dziDG.

src_text: Kabinete tlhomamisitse pegelo e dirilweng ke Kantoro ya ga Moporesitente ka Mosupologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogela morago diphetogo tse di dirilweng tsa 2022 mo Kaeding ya Maloko Khuduthamaga e bidiwang gape Bukana ya Ditona..   Ditokafatso tse di dirilweng ka Moranang 2022 di tlamela ka mothamo o okeditsweng mo dikantorong tse dingwe tsa Ditona tse di nang le maikarabelo makala feta bongwe.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa Vhuṱanu wa Mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha thoma shuma ha Nḓivhadzamulayotibe ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vhane vha vha na Vhuholefhali (WPRPD) wa ṅwaha wa 2020-.

src_text: Di ne di tlhagisa gape gore Puso tshwanetse go rwala maikarabelo ka botlalo ditshenyegelo tse di jaaka tlamelo ya motlakase le metsi kwa mafelobonnong semmuso maloko khuduthamaga..   Kabinete etse tlhoko dingongorego tsa baagi mme sweditse go leba sešwa Kaedi ya Maloko Khuduthamaga.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Vhuṱanu wa Mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha thoma shuma ha WPRPD, ine ya vha yone ṋetshedzaho maswamaswa nga ha thoma shuma ha WPRPD.

src_text: Tiragalo e tla dirwa ke setheo se se ikemetseng mme fa sena go konosediwa, kaedi e tla phasaladiwa mo webosaeteng ya Lefapha la Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi: www.dpsa.gov.za..  Semphato sa Phetogo e Lolameng sa Maatla (JETP) le Leano la JETP (JEPT-IP).
tgt_text: Muvhigo katela na vhupfiwa bva kha mihasho ya muvhuso wa lushaka na wa mavunḓu dovha hafhu wa bvisela khagala zwiswa nga ha thoma shuma ha mbekanyamaitele ine ya katela mikovho ya migaganyagwama..   Muvhigo wa thoma wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wa ṅwaha nga ṅwaha wo anḓadzwa nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Morago ga go amogela tlhagisetso ya JEPT le JETP-IP, Kabinete ne ya mametlelela JETP-IP le go supa ditebogo ka tiro e botlalo e dirilweng go tlhagisa..   JETP-IP tlhalosa dipeeletso tse di tlhokegang go fitlhelela boineelo ba Puso ya Aforika Borwa ba go fedisa khabone le go tsweletsa kgolo e tswelelang, le go netefatsa phetogo e lolameng go badiri le mafelo a amegang..   Komiti ya Ditona ya Phetogo ya Tlelaemete tla tshwara kopano ya bobegakgang mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo go neela ka dintlha ka botlalo   Melaotlhomo.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa vhuṱanu wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wo ṱanganedzwa uri ḓo ḓivhadzwa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso nahone wa dovha wa anḓadzwa nga vha Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali..   Khwiniso ya Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha Thendelano dza nga ha fheliswa ha Zwiito zwoṱhe zwa Khethululo Itelwaho Vhafumakadzi (CEDAW).

src_text: Molaotlhomo wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe wa.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha khwiniso ya Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha CEDAW itela uri sainiwe.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa ga Molaotlhomo wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe wa 2022 kwa Palamenteng go diragadiwa.
tgt_text: Khwiniso idzi dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsho engedzwaho tsha miṱangano ya komiti ine ya shuma na mivhigo ya mashango ane vha miraḓo.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o tlhabolola Molao wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe, 1957 (Molao 57 wa 1951) o setseng le dingwaga di le.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina hedzi thendelano nga ṅwaha wa 1993 he ḽa dovha ḽa tendelana nadzo nga ṅwedzi wa Nyendavhusiku.
Uhu ṋetshedzwa hadzo Phalamenndeni ndi hune ha khou lingedza ṱumanya thendelano dze na dzone ha tendelanwa khadzo tshifhingani tsho fhelaho na khwiniso idzi dza Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha thendelano.

src_text: Fa sena go amogelwa jaaka molao, Molaotlhomo o tla tlamela ka letlhomeso la semolao go laola tsamaiso ya boleng ya dikepe.
tgt_text: Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dza nga ha Ṱanganedzwa ha Ndalukano dza Pfunzo dza Nṱha .

src_text: Gareng ga tse dingwe tla laola popego, kwadiso, maina le go fedisiwa ga dikepe..   Diphetogo tse di tla nna le seabe mo go tsosoloseng lekala la tsamaiso ya dithoto ka dikepe gammogo le go nyalanya naga le Tumelano ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhaba wa Pharakano ya Dikepe.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dza nga ha Ṱanganedzwa ha Ndalukano dza Pfunzo dza Nṱha itela uri hu vhe na tendelana.

src_text: Aforika Borwa mametleletse tumelano     .
tgt_text: Musi ho no vha na tendelana khadzo, dzi ḓo rumelwa kha vha Khethekanyo ya zwa Pfunzo, Saintsi na Mvelele ya vha Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) khathihi na ḓo ita uri ngeno hayani dzi shume nga kha Mulayo wa Muhanga wa Ndalukano wa Lushaka, wa ṅwaha wa 2008 (Mulayo 67 wa 2008).

src_text: Molaotlhomo wa Tokafatso ya Dipalopalo wa.
tgt_text: Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dzi bveledza milayo ya ḽifhasi ya ṱanganedzwa ha ndalukano dza pfunzo dza nṱha nga nḓila linganaho re khagala nahone si na khethululo.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Molaotlhomo wa Tokafatso ya Dipalopalo wa 2022 gore tswelediwe.
tgt_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza tendela hu tshi vha na ṱanganedzwa ha ndalukano dza mashango nnḓa kha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya UN swikaho humiselwa murahu ha khwiniso dza Tsumbamaitele dza Miraḓo ya Khabinethe.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o tshitshinya tokafatso ya Molao wa Ditlhopho, 1999 (Molao 6 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza nḓivhadzo ye ya ḓo itwa nga Ofisi ya Phresidennde nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 17 Tshimedzi 2022 ya humisela murahu ha khwiniso dze dza itwa kha Tsumbamaitele ya Miraḓo ya Khabinethe, ine ya dovha hafhu ya ḓivhiwa sa Bugupfarwa ya Dziminisṱa, ya ṅwaha wa..   Khwiniso hedzi dze dza ḓo itwa nga ṅwedzi wa Lambamai 2022 dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha engedza vhaṅwe vhashumi kha dziṅwe dza dziofisi dza Dziminisṱa vhane vha vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha muhasho fhiraho muthihi.

src_text: Diphetogo di tlamela ka tlhabololo le tsenyotirisong ya Tsamaiso ya Bosetšhaba ya Dipalopalo e tshegetsang ditshwetso tse di tshegediwang ke bopaki..   Di matlafatsa kgolagano magareng ga Setheo sa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa le ditheo tse dingwe tsa puso, le go atolosa letlhomeso la taolo la Molao D.  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza lavhelela uri Muvhuso dzhie vhuḓifhinduleli ho fhelelaho ha zwa masheleni ane elana na ṋetshedzwa ha maḓi na muḓagasi kha madzulo tshiofisi ane avho miraḓo ya khabinethe vha dzula khao..     Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha sa farea zwavhuḓi ha vhadzulapo he ya fhedza nga dzhia tsheo ya dovha shandukisa hafhu iyo Tsumbamaitele ya Miraḓo ya Khabinethe.

src_text: Samiti ya Moporesitente ya Dikgwebopotlana, tse Dinnye le tse di Magareng (SMME) le Dikoporasi.
tgt_text: Haya maitele ḓo tshimbidzwa nga tshiimiswa tsho imaho nga tshoṱhe nahone musi tshi tou khunyeledzwa, iyo tsumbamaitele ya hone vho ḓo wanala na kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Ndangulo ine ya vha: www.dpsa.gov.za.

src_text: Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Dikgwebopotlana, ka tirisano le bannaleseabe ba lekala la poraefete, le tla tshwara Samiti ya SMME le Dikoporasi ya Moporesitente ya Bosetšhaba kwa Bryanston, Gauteng ka 13 go fitlha ka 15 Ngwanatsele..   Samiti e tla kopanya bannaleseabe ba botlhokwa ba lekala la poraefete le la puso mo tikologong ya dikgwebopotlana go rerisana ka go senka ditsela tsa go dirisana mmogo go matlafatsa lekala le.
tgt_text: Vhushaka ha Shandukela kha Fulufulu ḽi Pfadzaho (JETP) na Pulane ya Vhubindudzi kha JETP (JETP-IP).

src_text: Bannaleseabe ba ba solofelwang ba akaretsa mekgatlo ya kgwebo, badiri ba diSMME, dirutegi, badiri ba dipholisi le ditheo tsa tlhabololo ya matlole..     Samiti tla rerisana gape le ka ga Leanolegolo le le Momaganeng la Bosetšhaba la Tlhabololo ya Dikgwebopotlana, le le tlamelang ka letlhomeso le le botlhokwa go matlafatsa lekala la SMME.
tgt_text: Nga murahu ha ṱanganedza makumedzwa nga ha JETP na JETP-IP, Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza JETP-IP ya dovha hafhu ya sumbedzisa takalela mushumo nga vhuḓalo we wa itwa hu tshi itelwa i bveledza..   JETP-IP bvisela khagala vhubindudzi vhune ha ṱoḓea itela swikela vhuḓikumedzeli ha fhelisa zwa muhasaladzo wa khaboni he ha itwa nga Muvhuso wa ḽa Afrika Tshipembe musi tshi khou ṱuṱuwedza mveledziso ya tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na vhona uri hu khou vha na tshanduko pfadzaho kha vhashumi na zwitshavha zwi kwameaho.

src_text: Samiti e solofelwa gape go thankgolola Dikabo tsa Bosetšhaba tsa SMME tsa Moporesitente tsa Ngwaga le Ngwaga..     Go Tshwarwa ga Samiti ya Moporesitente ya 2022 ya Tirisodikgoka e Ikaegileng ka Bong le Polao ya Basadi (GBVF).
Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Samiti ya bobedi ya Moporesitente ya GBVF kwa Gallagher Convention Centre mo Gauteng ka 1 le 2 Ngwanatsele.
tgt_text: Komiti ya Vhukati ha Dziminisṱa ya nga ha Tshanduko ya Kilima ḓo fara muṱangano na vhoramafhungo hu si kale itela uri ṋetshedze zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo   Milayotibe.

src_text: Samiti ya ntlha e neng tshwerwe ka 2018 ne ya dirisiwa go supa boineelo gape ba puso le balekane ba loago mo go fediseng ditiragalo tse di kwa godimo tsa tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le basadi mo nageng..   Samiti ya bobedi tla dirisiwa go lekola Tswelopele e dirilweng mo go tsenngweng tirisong ga Togamaano ya Bosetšhaba ka ga GBVF tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Boikarabelo; Itlhaganediso le Kgodiso JAANONG”..   Samiti e tla sekaseka gareng ga tse dingwe, go batla ditsela tsa go itlhaganedisa dikgato le maikarabelo go tswa go mafapha botlhokwa le bannaleseabe ba ba akaretsang baagi, lekala la poraefete le mekgatlo ya badiri..   Pitso ya Botlhano ya ga Moporesitente kwa Kapa Botlhaba.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Zwikepe zwa Vhavhambadzi wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Pitso ya Botlhano ya Mokgwa wa Tlhabololo ya Sedika (DDM) ya ga Moporesitente kwa Upington, Kapa Botlhaba tla diragala ka Labotlhano, 21 Diphalane 2022 kwa Setediamong sa selegae sa Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..   Pitso ya Moporesitente ya DDM tla lekola tswelelo ya thebolelo ya ditirelo le dikgwetlho kwa Kapa Botlhaba le go tsereganya go di rarabolola.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Zwikepe zwa Vhavhambadzi wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phalamenndeni hu tshi itelwa uri kone davhidzaniwa nga hawo ya phanḓa.

src_text: DDM netefatsa gore thulaganyo, tsenyotirisong le kabelomatlole ya thebolelo ya ditirelo di momagantswe go tokafatsa thebolelo ya ditirelo go baagi..   Jaaka matlhagolatsela Pitso e, Ditona, maloko dikhuduthamaga le bommeyara ba tla tswa letsholo go ya kwa baaging ba kwa Upington le mafelo a mabapi..   Puo ya Pholisi ya Maano go Rulaganyetsa Tiriso ya Matlole mo Pakeng ya Dikgwedi di le Tharo (MTBPS).
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu vusulusa uyo muṅwe Mulayo wa Zwikepe zwa Vhavhambadzi, wa ṅwaha wa 1951 (Mulayo 57 wa 1951) une wa vha na miṅwaha ya..   Musi wo no phasiswa, Mulayotibe uyu ḓo ṋetshedza muhanga wa zwa milayo wa zwikepe zwa vhavhambadzi une wa ḓo shuma kha langa zwa engedza ndeme kha zwikepe ḓo dovha hafhu wa langa zwa olwa redzhisiṱara rinwa madzina na bviswa ha zwikepe nḓilani.

src_text: Kabinete dumela gore MTBPS ya 2022 e tla alwang ke Tona ya Matlotlo Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro, 26 Diphalane 2022 ke karolo e botlhokwa ya tsamaiso e bulegileng ya Aforika Borwa ya tekanyetsokabo e maikarabelo..   MTBPS tlhalosa boineelo ba puso mo teng ga maemo palogotlhe ya tiriso ya matlole naga ka kgonang tlhalosa gape le gore puso tla tswala jang mokhino fa gare ga lotseno le ditshenyegelo, le go dirisa matlotlo a leng teng ka tshwanelo.
tgt_text: Hedzi tshanduko dzi ḓo shela mulenzhe kha vusuluswa ha sekhithara ya vhuendi ha zwa lwanzheni khathihi na ita uri hu vhe na elana kha kutshimbidzele kwa zwa lwanzheni vhukati ha shango ḽino na Thendelano dza Dzangano ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Dzitshaka.
Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina thendelano idzi.

src_text: Ditlhatlhobo tsa Materiki.
Ditlhatlhobo tsa Setifikheiti se Segolwane sa Bosetšhaba di simolola ka 31 Diphalane go fitlha ka 7 Sedimonthole.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya zwa Mbalombalo wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Kabinete eleletsa setlhopha sa 2022 masego jaaka ba tla bo ba samagana le legato la bofelo la leeto la bona la sekolo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya zwa Mbalombalo wa ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na davhidzaniwa nga hawo.

src_text: Tshegetso e tswelelang go tswa go barutisi, batsadi le batlhokomedi tla nna botlhokwa thata mo go thuseng baithuti ba go samagana le ditlhatlhobo tse ka boitshepo..   Kabinete ikuela go batsadi le batlhokomedi go nna le seabe ka go rotloetsa le go tlhotlheletsa baithuti, gammogo le go tlhola tikologo e siametseng go ithuta kwa gae..   Khonferense ya Leanotlhabololo la Bosetšhaba (NDP) le Bokgoni ba Naga.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu dzinginya uri hu vhe na khwiniso kha Mulayo wa zwa Mbalombalo, wa ṅwaha wa 1999 (Mulayo 6 wa 1999).

src_text: Lefapha le Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi ka semphato le Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Togamaano le Lefapha la Dithuto tsa Tlhabololo la Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal, le tla tshwara khonferense ya NDP le Bokgoni ba Naga go tloga ka 7 go fitlha ka 9 Ngwanatsele 2022 kwa Khamphaseng ya Kholeji ya Howard ya Yunibesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Khonferense e tla lekola bokgoni le tiragatso ya puso mo dingwageng tse 10 tsa ntlha tsa NDP, mme tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Tekolo ya Bokgoni ba Naga le Tiragatso ya Puso mo dingwageng tse lesome tsa ntlha tsa NDP”..   Go Neelwa Setifikheiti sa Bogosi go Kgosi Misuzulu kaZwelithini.
tgt_text: Khwiniso idzi dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha bveledzwa na thoma shumiswa ha Sisteme ya zwa Mbalombalo ya Lushaka ine ya tikedza tsheo dzo ḓitikaho nga vhuṱanzi..   Dzi khwaṱhisa tshumisano ine ya vha hone zwazwino vhukati ha vha Mbalombalo dza Afrika Tshipembe na zwiṅwe zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso khathihi na engedza muhanga wa zwa milayo kha Mulayo   Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla neela Setifikheiti sa Bogosi go Motlotlegi Kgosi Misuzulu kaZwelithini kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Moses Mabhida kwa Durban ka Lamatlhatso, 29 Diphalane..
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Lushaka wa Phresidennde wa nga ha Mabindu Maṱuku, Maṱukuṱuku na Vhukati (SMME) na Dzikoporasi.

src_text: Se se latela moletlo wa setso wa go tlhoma kgosi wa “Ukungena eSibayeni” wa Kgosi o neng tshwerwe ka 20 Phatwe 2022 o mo tlhatloseditseng mo setulong sa bogosi jaaka Kgosi ya Setšhaba sa amaZulu   Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Mabindu Maṱuku, nga tshumisano na vhashumisani vha kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe ḓo fara Muṱangano wa Lushaka wa Phresidennde wa nga ha dziSMME na Dzikoporasi fhaḽa Bryanston, kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng bva nga ḽa 13 swika ḽa 15 Lara..   Muṱangano uyu ḓo kuvhanganya fhethu huthihi vhashumisani kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe na ya muvhuso kha nḓowetshumo ya mabindu maṱuku uri vha ambe nga ha wana nḓila dza shumisana kha khwaṱhisa sekhithara iyi.

src_text: Go akgolaKabinete akgola le go eleletsa masego: Rre Sam Matekane, Rre yo tlhophilweng go nna Tonakgolo ya Puso ya Lesotho.
tgt_text: Zwiimiswa zwine zwa khou lavhelelwa shela mulenzhe zwi katela madzangano zwa makwevho, vhashumi vha kha dziSMME, vhoradzipfunzo, vhaiti vha mbekanyamaitele na zwiimiswa zwa masheleni mveledziso.

src_text: Kabinete gape inyalantse le Setlhopha sa Tshekatsheko ya Ditlhopho sa AU kwa Ditlhophong tsa Kokoanobosetšhaba kwa Pusong ya Lesotho ka la bo 7 Diphalane 2022 mo go akgoleng tsepamo ya ditlhopho le sepolotiki ya Batho ba Puso ya Lesotho go bo ba tshwere ditlhopho tse di atlegileng.
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyu ḓo dovha hafhu wa amba nga ha Pulane khulwane ya Lushaka yo Ṱanganelaho ya nga ha Mveledziso ya Mabindu Maṱuku, ine ya ṋetshedza muhanga wa ndeme wa khwaṱhisa sekhithara ya SMME.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tswelela go ineela mo go matlafatseng le go tiiseng dikamano tsa sebedi gammogo le go kgontsha tirisano mo mererong ya dikgatlhegelo tse di tshwanang mo kgaolong, kontinente le go ralala lefatshe..   Matshediso Kabinete rometse melaetsa ya matshidiso go lelapa le ditsala tsa ga: Rre Albert Nolan (88), Moperisita wa Catholic ya Aforika Borwa yo boineelo yo neng gwetlha dikakanyo tsa sedumedi tse di neng di batla go mametlelela tsamaiso ya tlhaolele.
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyu khou dovha hafhu wa lavhelelwa thoma na Pfufho dza Phresidennde dza nga ha dziSMME dza Lushaka dza Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha farwa ha Muṱangano wa Phresidennde wa nga ha Khakhathi dzo Ḓitikaho nga Mbeu na Mabulayo Vhafumakadzi (GBVF) wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Ka 2003, Moporesitente wa nako eo Thabo Mbeki ne mo neela Kabo ya Luthuli ya Selefera ka ntlha ya “boineelo ba gagwe ba botshelo botlhe go kgaratlhela temokerasi, ditshwanelo tsa botho le bosiamisi le go gwetlha tsamaiso ya sedumedi go akaretsa mametlelelo ya tlhaolele ka tsela ya sedumedi.”   Go Thapiwa.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo fara Muṱangano wa Phresidennde wa nga ha zwiito zwa GBVF wa vhuvhili fhaḽa Gallagher Convention Centre kha ḽa Gauteng nga ḽa 1 na ḽa 2 Lara.

src_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang   Atefokheiti James Mlawu – Mokaedikakaretso: Lefapha la Dipalangwa   Rre Shabeer Khan – Ramatlotlo-Kakaretso: Matlotlo Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa thoma we wa farwa nga ṅwaha wa 2018 wo shumiswa kha kumedza hafhu muvhuso na vhashumisani vha zwa matshilisano kha fhelisa zwiwo zwo andesaho zwa khakhathi dzi itelwaho vhafumakadzi kha ḽino shango.

src_text: Kabinete dumalane le go thapiwa ga ba ba latelang:.

Maloko Boto ya Bojanala ya Aforika Borwa   Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Monnasetilo)   Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlatsa Monnasetilo)   Mme Pretty Ntombela   Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai   Rre Odwa Mtati   Rre Ravi Nadasen thapilwe gape)   Rre Enver Duminy thapilwe gape)   Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Rre Mduduzi Zakwe thapilwe gape)   Mme Rosemary Anderson   Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa vhuvhili ḓo shumiswa kha lavhelesa murahu kha mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya Ndeme ya Lushaka ya nga ha GBVF ḓo farwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Vhuḓifhinduleli ṱavhanyedza na ṱavha mukosi ZWINO”..   Muṱangano uyu ḓo dovha hafhu wa amba nga ha maṅwe mafhungo fanaho na wana nḓila dza ita uri zwoṱhe zwine zwa khou tea itwa zwi itwe nga tshihaḓu hu tshi katelwa na vhuḓifhinduleli bva kha mihasho ya ndeme khathihi na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho fana na madzangano zwitshavha, sekhithara dza phuraivethe na madzangano vhashumi.

src_text: Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa lefapha).

Maloko Boto ya Koporasi ya Taolo ya Pharakano ya Ditsela   Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe thapilwe gape)   Mme Thandi Clara Thankge thapilwe gape)   Moporofesara Maredi Mphahlele   Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Monnasetilo)   Atefokheiti Xola Stemela   Mme Lerato Magalo   Moporofesara Chitja Twala   Rre Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mme Jaxa (Leloko la thefosano); le   Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Leloko la thefosano).
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya Vhuṱanu ngei Northern Cape.

src_text: Rre Tshepo Monaheng – Motlhankedi Khuduthamaga (CEO): Setlamo sa Aforika Borwa sa Merero ya Dikgwa (Konteraka ntšhwafaditswe sebaka sa dingwaga tse tharo (3)).
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki ḽa Vhuṱanu (DDM) ngei Upington, kha vunḓu ḽa Northern Cape ḓo farwa nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 21 Tshimedzi 2022 fhaḽa Tshiṱediamu tshapo tsha Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..    Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha DDM ḓo sengulusa mvelaphanḓa na khaedu kha zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo fhaḽa kha vunḓu ḽa Northern Cape khathihi na dzhenelela hu tshi itelwa dzi tandulula.

src_text: Rre Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Ditsela sa Aforika Borwa..   Mme Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Molaodi wa Nutlere wa Bosetšhaba..   Rre Risenga Maluleka – Radipalopalo-Kakaretso (Ntšhwafatso ya Konteraka).
tgt_text: DDM ḓo vhona uri vhupulani ha zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo, zwa thoma shuma na ita mugaganyagwama zwi khou ṱanganyiswa fhethu huthihi itela khwaṱhisa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo kha zwitshavha.

src_text: Samiti ya Moporesitente e ka ga Tirisodikgoka e Totileng Batho ba Bong jo bo Rileng le Dipolao tsa Basadi (GBVF).
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go tshwarwa ga Samiti ya Moporesitente e ka ga GBVF kwa Gallagher Estate kwa Midrand, Gauteng ka la bo 1 le la bo 2 Ngwanaitseele 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go Rwala Maikarabelo, Go Potlakisa Twantsho ya Ditiro Tseno mmogo le Go Dira Modumo ka Tsona, GONA JAANONG!”.
tgt_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Mo samiting eno go builwe ka kgatelopele eo setseng dirilwe mo go tsenyeng tirisong maikano a dirilweng mo Samiting eno ya Moporesitente e neng tshwerwe mo ngwageng wa 2018, mo go neng ga totobadiwa maikano naga eno go nna le ditharabololo tse di mosola tse di lekaneng tsa go lwantsha GBVF re le seoposengwe..     Bao ba neng ba tsaya karolo kwa samiting eno e tsereng matsatsi le mabedi ba ne ba rwala maikarabelo ka tiro e dirilweng mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la Naga la Togamaano mo Mererong ya GBVF leng leano leo maitlhomo lona leng go dira gore go nne le pholisi le leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya makala mantsi a farologaneng ka thulaganyo le nngwe gore re kgone go matlakafatsa dikgato tsa go tsibogela bothata jono jwa GBVF re le puso bile re le naga yotlhe..     Samiti eno ne le yona e tlhokagalang gore batho ba bue puo pha ka tseo ba atlegileng mo go tsona le tseo santseng le tlhobaboroko mo go lwantshaneng le GBVF.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.

src_text: Mo samiting eno go builwe gape le ka botlhokwa jwa go ipopa ngatana mmogo le ka dilo tse ditona tse di ka fitlhelelwang fa re na le tsotlhe tse di tlhokagalang go lwantshana le bothata jono le fa tsotlhe tseo di dirisiwa ka tshwanelo.
tgt_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..

src_text: Seo re utlwaneng ka sona kwa samiting eno se bontsha botlhokwa jwa tirisanommogo puso nang le yona le maphata mangwe mekgatlho ya baagi, dikgwebo, bao dirisanang le bona mo go fetoleng maemo, ba dikereke mmogo le maphata mangwe jaaka botlhe ba dirisana mmogo mo go lwantshaneng le GBVF..     Tse dingwe tsa ditharabololo tse di tlhagisitsweng ke go tlamela NSP ka matlole a lekaneng gore kgone go samagana le GBVF, go dira gore fa go ka fitlhelwang ba sa dira seo ba tshwanetseng go se dira ba di game ba sa di tlhapela, mmogo le go dira gore ditheo tsa naga, tsa diporofense le tsa dkgaolo tseo leng tsona tseo batho ba ikarabelang mo go tsona di neelwa matla mantsi go kgalema ditiro tseo di sa tsamayeng ka tshwanelo..     Kabinete ne ya gatelela gore ga go tiragalo epe ya tirisodikgoka kgotsa ya go bogisa batho ba bangwe go tla itshokelwang yona.
tgt_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging gore ba tobane mo matlhong le ditiragalo tsa GBVF ka go tshwarisa beng ba tsona kwa mapodising.
tgt_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.

src_text: Gotlhe mo setšhabeng sa rona re tshwanetse go dira gore go nne boima gore go diragale ditiragalo tsa GBVF.
tgt_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.

src_text: Tshireletsego le pabalesego.
tgt_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..

src_text: Kabinete netefaleditse baagi gore Setheo sa Naga sa Ditheo tse di Kopaneng go Lwantshana le Botlhokotsebe le go Abelana ka Tshedimosetso e ka ga Bosenyi (NATJOINTS) – seo mo go sona leng mafapha puso a farologaneng mo Setho sa Phemelo ya Puso (SSA) leng sona se se di gogang kwa pele mmogo le Setheo sa Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) le Setheo sa Masole Naga (SANDF) - jaaka ba na le batlhankedi ba tiro ya bona leng go batlisisa ditiro tsa bokhukhuntshwane tse di bayang mo kotsing tshireletso ya naga ya rona mmogo le tsona ditiro tsa menolopuso.
tgt_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..

src_text: NATJOINTS sekaseka maemo pabalesego ka fa nageng gangwe le gape go bona gore ga go matshosetsi a rileng a tshosetsang pabalesego.
tgt_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.

src_text: Jaaka le karolo ya ditumelano magareng ga ditheo tsa go lwantsha botlhokotsebe mo dinageng tse dingwe tsotlhe, Aforika Borwa le yona bona dipoelo mo ntlheng ya go abelana ka tshedimosetso e ka dirang bonnete jwa gore naga a bolokesega..     Kabinete ikuela mo baaging go nna ba ntshitse matlho dinameng mme ba begele ditheo tsa molao ka ga sengwe le sengwe se ba se belaelang le se se seng mo molaong seke wa didimala; fa bona sengwe se se belaetsang, begela ditheo tsa molao - fa rotlhe re dirisana re ka kgona go dira gore setšhaba sa rona se babalesege.
tgt_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.

src_text: Puo ya Ngwaga wa 2022 ya Pholisi ya Maano go Rulaganyetsa Tiriso ya Matlole mo Pakeng ya Dikgwedi di le Tharo (MTBPS).
tgt_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.

src_text: Kabinete leboga dikgato tse di tsentsweng tirisong mo go MTBPS ya 2022 tse di ka ga go busetsa maemo matlole puso sekeng, le fa maemo ikonomi lefatshe tshosa..     Dikgato tse Tona ya Matlole Rre Enoch Godongwana buileng ka tsona kwa Palamenteng, kwa Motsekapa ka Laboraro wa la bo 26 Diphalane 2022 di ne di tsenyeletsa le go fokotsa thata tiriso ya matlole puso mo go dirisiwang matlole mantsi go feta go kgonnweng go kokoanya mo lekgetong maitlhomo le go tokafats leano la naga ya rona la go tsamaisa tiro ya matlole, go ema nokeng maemo rona mo ikonoming mmogo le go dira gore moAforika Borwa mongwe le mongwe nne le tshepo e tletseng gore maemo ikonomi ya naga ya rona mo isagong tla fetoga.
tgt_text: Safety and security .

src_text: Maano a leng teng go oketsa matlole go emela motsi wa tlala re thusa gore re kgone go samagana le mathata tshwana le a tlhodilweng ke tlhago.
tgt_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.

src_text: MTBPS ya 2022 re thusa gape le gore re kgone go kgarametsa dilo tse di botlhokwa mo mafaratlhatlheng rona mmogo le mo matsholong kabo ya ditirelo, mmogo le go dira gore re nne le ditharabololo tse dingwe tse di ka ga thusang baagi ba naga ya rona ba ba dikobodikhutshwane mmogo le ba ba leng mo tlalelong..     Kabinete ikuela mo makaleng otlhe a samaganang le merero ya go tswela baagi le ikonomi mosola gore dirisane le puso gore kgone go godisa ikonomi ya rona gore kgone go tokafatsa matshelo baagi ba naga yotlhe ya rona.
tgt_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.

src_text: Tirisanommogo magareng ga naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Spain.
tgt_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke Leeto la Semmuso la go jela naga ya Aforika Borwa nala ke Tonakgolo ya naga ya Spain Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón go tla go tsosolosa botsalano jo bo leng teng jwa dinaga tseno go dira gore bo gagamale le go feta.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.

src_text: Tonakgolo ne felegeditswe ke Tona ya bona ya Lefapha la Diintaseteri, Kgwebisano le Bojanala bong Mme Reyes Maroto, mmogo le beng ba dikgwebo ba naga eo.
tgt_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.

src_text: Leeto leno le neile beng ba dikgwebo ba naga ya Aforika Borwa mo makaleng a farologaneng dikgwebo tšhono ya go kopana le badirikabona ba naga ya Spain gore ba kgone go dira gore tirisanommogo ya bona mo kgwebisanong le mo dipeeletsong mo maphateng saense le boitshimololedi bobetli le setso metshameko le thuto nne e tseneletseng.
tgt_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).

src_text: Leeto leno le kgarameleditse kwa pele naga ya rona mo dipeeletsong mo kgodisong ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..

src_text: Dipuisano mo go Direng gore Ethiopia le ya Tigray di Fitlhelele Kutlwano.
tgt_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.

src_text: Mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, go ya ka maikarabelo yona mo go Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika, go ne ga tshwarelwa dipuisano tsa go diga matshwafo maphata otlhe a neng sa tlhole utlwana kwa kgaolong ya Ethiopia le ya Tigray, go tloga ka la bo 25 go fitlha ka la bo 30 Diphalane.
tgt_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.
The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..

src_text: Dipuisano tseno di ne di etilwe pele ke Moporesitente wa mo malobeng wa naga ya Nigeria bong Olusegun Obasanjo, Moporesitente wa mo malobeng wa naga ya Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta mmogo le Motlatsamoporesitente wa mo malobeng wa naga ya Aforika Borwa Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.

src_text: Kabinete tlhagisitse kemonokeng ya yona mo dipuisanong tseno tsa go tlisa kagiso e tla nnelang ruri, fela jaaka go tshwanetse go ya ka maitlhomo pholisi ya Aforika Borwa ya tirisanommogo le dinaga tsa boditšhaba ya go dira gore mo kontinenteng go se tlhole go nna le dithulano     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: South Africa – Spain relations.

src_text: Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la go Tlhabolola Dikgwebopotlana tse di Golaganeng (NISED).
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la NISED gore le tsenngwe tirisong.
tgt_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.

src_text: Leano la ntlha la Kgodiso ya Boitshimololedikgwebo ba Dikgwebopotlaka (ISPESE) le ne la simololwa go tsenngwa tirisong ka ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.

src_text: ISPESE eo mo legatong la yona go tseneng NISED dira gore Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela sa ngwaga wa 1995 se se buang ka Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la go Aga le go Tlhabolola Dikgwebopotlana ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa le tsenngwe tirisong.
tgt_text: This visit provided another boost to the country’s investment and economic growth drive.

src_text: Leano la Naga la go Tsamaisa Tiro la NISED le tlhagisa maano a golagantsweng go gagamatsa le go ema nokeng batho ba ba itshimololelang dikgwebopotlana le tse dikgolonyana.
tgt_text: Ethiopia – Tigray Peace Talks.

src_text: Leano leno le tlhagisa leano la go tsamaisa tiro le le tsamaisiwang ka tshwanelo go dira gore botlhe ba ba nang le seabe mo maphateng otlhe a botlhokwa ba tsamaise tiro ka tshwanelo..     Monongwaga ka kgwedi ya Moranang Kabinete ne ya dumela gore go ka phasaladiwa sekwalwa sa ntlha se se santseng se tlhoka gore se sekasekwe sa NISED gore baagi ba dire ditshwaelo ka ga sona.
tgt_text: South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October.

src_text: Go tswa mo ditshwaelong tse dintsi tseno leano leno le ne la tokafadiwa ka ditshwaelo go tswa mo baaging mmogo le go tswa mo Lekgotleng la Naga la Tlhabololo ya Ikonomi le Ditiro (NEDLAC), leno ke lekgotla le mo go lona go nang le bagwebi, mekgatlho ya baagi, ya badiri, batlhankedi ba diyunibesiti mmogo le ba puso mo maitlhomo leng go samagana le matsapa a leng teng mo ikonoming, mo ditirong le mo go tokafatseng maemo naga tobaneng le ona mothale ona oo.
Sekwalwa sa Ntlha se se Santseng se Tlhoka gore se Sekasekwe se se Buang ka Pholisi ya Ditirelo tsa go Thusa Baagi ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.
tgt_text: The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria’s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Sekwalwa sa Ntlha se se Santseng se Tlhoka gore se Sekasekwe se se Buang ka Pholisi ya Ditirelo tsa go Thusa Baagi ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.
tgt_text: Cabinet expressed its support for peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa’s foreign policy objectives of secure and conflict-free continent   Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: Sekwalwa seno se dira gore Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela se se buang ka Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi mmogo le Tumelano ya Mokgatlho wa Dinagakopano (UN) e buang ka Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi di tsenngwe tirisong (UNCPRD).
tgt_text: National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework.

src_text: Pholisi eno eletsa Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Loago gore le kgone go abela ka tshwanelo ditirelo tsa lona mo bathong ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi mmogo le mo ba malapa batho bano tlhagisa ka fao maemo sa letleng ka teng le ka fao tswelelang go kganela bathong ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi go ka nna le seabe mo ditirong tse di botlhokwa mo setšhabeng, mmogo le go dira gore ba se nne le seabe mo ditirong tsa go thusa baagi le tsa go nna le seabe mo ikonoming.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation.

src_text: Pholisi eno tlhagisa dikakanyo tse di ka dirisiwang mo go tlhomeng maemo leitlho go dira bonnete jwa gore dikgato tse di tsewang go tokafatsa maemo di diragadiwa jaaka go tshwanetse mo mafapheng a matshwanedi.
tgt_text: The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in.

src_text: Aforika Borwa ke nngwe ya dinaga tse di saenetseng UNCPRD mmogo le Lekwalo la Ditshwanelo tsa Batho tse di Buang ka Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi mo Kontinenteng ya Aforika..     Kopano ya Setlhopha sa Baemedi ba Maphata Puso ka fa Nageng e Buang ka Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi (IPCC).
tgt_text: The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.

src_text: Ka Seetebosigo 2023 Mokgatlho wa IPCC tla tshwara kopano ya bona ya bosupa e ka ga go sekaseka tiro ya yona.
tgt_text: The NISED Strategic Framework provides an integrated strategy to strengthen and support entrepreneurship for small and medium-sized enterprises.

src_text: IPCC – mo go yona go nang le baemedi ba le 195-ba leng batlhankedi ba puso mo mokgatlhong wa UN – ke bona ba ba rweleng maikarabelo go sekaseka tiro e setseng dirilwe mo mererong ya saense, botegeniki le mo go ya kitso ya merero ya go tlhokomela baagi le ikonomi, mme maitlhomo kopano eno ke go eletsa batho ba ba tsayang ditshweetso gore ba itse gore ke eng se se tlholang phetogo ya maemo loapi, se se amang le seo se ka diriwang go samagana le yona.
tgt_text: It provides structured coordination framework for all key ecosystem role players in small to medium enterprise development.

src_text: Mo kopanong eno e tla tshwarwang ka 2023, go solofetswe gore IPCC tla tlhopha motho yo mongwe yo tla okamang maemo monnasetulo.
Kabinete ya rona setse neseditse pula leina la ga Moporofesara Debra Roberts go tswa kwa Yunibesiting ya KwaZulu-Natal gore nne ene yo okamang maemo ano.
tgt_text: In April this year, Cabinet approved the publication of the draft NISED strategic framework for public comment.

src_text: Moporofesara Roberts diragaditse tiro ya IPCC sentle mo go buleng baagi matlho ka fa kontinenteng ya Aforika.
tgt_text: Through the wide consultations, the strategy was enhanced by inputs from the public and from the National Economic Development and Labour Council, which is forum comprising business, civil society, labour, academics and government that seeks to deal with economic, labour and development issues and related challenges facing the country.

src_text: Ga jaana moporofesara yo ke tokololo ya Mokgatlho wa IPCC.
tgt_text: Draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: Fa ka bo tlhophiwa tla nna ene mosadi wa ntlhantlha bile gape tla nna motho wa ntlhantlha go tswa mo Aforika yo okamang maemo ano.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publishing for public comment of the draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: Go tlhophiweng ga gagwe go tla bontsha setšhaba tiro ntle e diriwang ke basadi mo kontinenteng ya Aforika     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: The policy gives effect to the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the United Nations (UN) Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (UNCPRD).

src_text: Letsholo la Ngwaga wa 2022 la go Lwela Ditshwanelo tsa Basadi la Matsatsi le.
tgt_text: The policy guides the Department of Social Development in the provision of its services to persons with disabilities and their respective families.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla keteka mmogo le lefatshe Letsholo la go Lwela Ditshwanelo tsa Basadi la Matsatsi le 16 la go Ema Kgatlhanong le GBV, le le tla simololwang go ketekiwa go tloga ka la bo 25 Ngwanaitseele mo go tla bong go ketekiwa Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Fedisa Tirisodikgoka mo Basading, mme le tla garela ka la bo 10 Sedimonthole, fa go tla bo go ketekiwa Letsatsi la Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.
tgt_text: It outlines the restrictive environment and barriers that continue to marginalise and exclude persons with disabilities from mainstream society, and from participating in social and economic activities.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula molaetsamogolo wa monongwaga o reng "Go nna le Ditshwanelo mo Mererong ya go Thusa Baagi le Ikonomi go dira gore basadi ba kgone go ikemela kgatlhanong le ditiragalo tsa go bogisa le go bolaya basadi: Go Kopana, Go Dirisana Mmogo le go Nna le Ditumelano".
tgt_text: It proposes monitoring mechanisms that will ensure closer tracking of its implementation and mainstream interventions within the relevant departments.

src_text: Monongwaga ka nako ya go keteka Letsholo la go Lwela Ditshwanelo tsa Basadi la Matsatsi le 16 la go Ema Kgatlhanong le Tirisodikgoka mo Basading le mo Baneng, naga ya Aforika Borwa tla tsepamisa mogopolo wa yona mo go buleng baagi matlho ka ntlha ya go tsenya tirisong Leano la Naga la Togamaano mo Mererong (NSP) ya GBVF.
tgt_text: South Africa is signatory to the UNCPRD and the African Charter on Human and People’s Rights on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities in Africa..   Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Meeting.

src_text: Maitlhomo leano ke go dira gore go nne le pholisi le leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya makala mantsi a farologaneng ka thulaganyo le nngwe gore re kgone go matlakafatsa dikgato tsa go tsibogela bothata jono jwa GBVF re le puso bile re le naga yotlhe..     Kgwedi ya Bosetšhaba ya Temososetšhaba ka ga Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi (DRAM) mmogo le Letsatsi la Naga la go Keteka Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi.
tgt_text: The IPCC Bureau will be convening its seventh assessment cycle meeting in June.

src_text: Kabinete dumelane le kakanyo ya go keteka DRAM le Letsatsi la Naga la go Keteka Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi mmogo le molaetsamogolo wa kakanyo eno, mo go tla ketikiwang go tloga ka la bo 3 Ngwanaitseele go fitlha ka la bo 3 Sedimonthole.
tgt_text: The IPCC – which comprises panel of 195-member governments under the UN – is responsible for assessing the available scientific, technical and socio-economic knowledge, so as to advise decision-makers about the causes, impacts and responses to climate change.

src_text: Molaetsamogolo wa teng re: “Go Matlafatsa Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi ka go ba tlamela ka didirisiwa tse ba di tlhokang, ka go ba ema nokeng le ka go dira gore ditikologo tse ba leng mo go tsona nne tse di babalesegileng”..     Molaetsamogolo ono gatelela botlhokwa jwa go fedisa dilo tsotlhe tse di kgoreletsang batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi.
tgt_text: During its meeting in 2023, the IPCC is expected to elect new chairperson for its seventh assessment cycle.

src_text: Dilo tseno di tsenyeletsa gape le didirisiwa tse ba di tlhokang, ka go ba ema nokeng le ka go dira gore ditikologo tse ba leng mo go tsona nne tse di babalesegileng mo go bona, mmogo le go amogela gore ga se batho botlhe ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi ba ka ba supang gonne ba bangwe ga ba bonagale.
tgt_text: Cabinet has endorsed the nomination of Prof Debra Roberts from the University of KwaZulu-Natal for this position.

src_text: Mekete eno e tla ketekiwang kgwedi yotlhe tla bula baagi matlho mmogo le go ba bontsha kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe ka fa nageng mo go netefatseng gore ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi, jaaka go tlhalosiwa mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Prof Roberts has championed increased IPCC outreach work in Africa.

src_text: Mekete eno tla totobatsa gape le dilo tse go santseng go tlhokwa gore go samaganwe natso tse batho ba ba tshelang ka bogolofadi ba santseng ba itemogela tsona kwa mafelong ao ba dirang kwa go ona     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: She is currently member of the IPCC Bureau.

src_text: Melaetsa ya go Akgola    Kabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Sekolo sa Edendale Technical Secondary School sa kwa porofenseng ya KwaZulu-Natal jaaka se fentse Sejana sa Metshameko ya Kgwele ya Dinao mo Dikolong sa CAF.
tgt_text: If elected she would be the first woman and person from Africa to chair this body.

src_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso      Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: Rre Jeremy Mansfield (59), modiredi yo neng tumile yo leng kgale direla kgaso mo thelebišeneng le mo seyalemoweng yo tiro ya gagwe e dirileng bontle tota, yo gapileng dikabo di le dintsinyana.Mme Nelisiwe Magubane (56), yo neng le Mokaedikakaretso wa Lefapha la Eneji (le ga jaanong leng Lefapha la Metswedi ya Dimenerale le Eneji (DMRE)) ne tlotliwa tota fa go tla mo mererong ya intaseteri ya metlakase     Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang     Mogeneralemogolo wa Sepodisi Siphosihle Thumy Nkosi – thapilwe go nna Motlatsi wa Tlhogo ya Setheo sa Naga sa Dipatlisiso tsa Melato Megolo ya Botlhokotsebe (DPCI)     Moperikatiri Nicholaas Jacobus Gerber – thapilwe go nna Motlatsi wa Tlhogo ya Setheo sa DPCI mo Porofenseng ya Mpumalanga     Moperikatiri Gopaul Govender – thapilwe go nna Motlatsi wa Tlhogo ya Setheo sa DPCI mo Porofenseng ya Limpopo     Moperikatiri Stephen Molefi Mabuela – thapilwe go nna Motlatsi wa Tlhogo ya Setheo sa DPCI mo Porofenseng ya Kapa Bokone.
tgt_text: Her election will send positive message on the good work being done by female scientists from Africa  Upcoming events.

src_text: Leano la go Beeletsa mo Phetogong ya Motlakase o sa Kgotlheleng Tikologo (JET-IP).
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Leano la go Beeletsa mo Phetogong ya Motlakase o sa Kgotlheleng Tikologo la naga ya Aforika Borwa le akgotswe go utlwagala kwa Kopanong ya bo 27 ya Khonferense ya Dinagakopano e ka ga Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi (COP27) e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sharm El-Sheikh, kwa Egepeta go tloga ka la bo 6 go fitlha ka la bo 18 Ngwanaitseele.
tgt_text: Just Energy Transition Investment Plan (JET-IP).

South Africa’s JET-IP received widespread acclaim at the 27th session of the United Nations (UN) Climate Change Conference of the Parties (COP27) being held in Sharm El-Sheikh, Egypt from 6 to 18 November.

src_text: Leano leno la rona le legolo le le akgotsweng ke Badirisanimmogo ba Rona ba Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba – United Kingdom, United States, Germany, France, European Union mmogo le badirisanimmogo ba bangwe mo mererong ya loago – le tlhalosa ka tlhamalalo dikgato tsa rona tsa go tswa mo tirisong ya motlakase wa ga jaana go tsena mo go oo sa kgotlheleng tikologo.
Leano leno le na gape le seabe le mo matsapeng a tswewang mo lefatsheng go lwantshana le phetogo ya loapi mmogo le mo maanong tlhabololo go samaganweng le ona ga jaana le mo isagong.
tgt_text: The bold plan that was endorsed by the International Partners Group –  the United Kingdom, United States, Germany, France, European Union and other social partners – outlines our transition to low carbon economy.

src_text: Leano leno, le le tlotlomaditsweng tota ka gore le tlisa diphetogo tse dintšhwa, le bona kemonokeng ya matlole go tswa mo dinaga tse di gatetseng pele gore di kgone go diragatsa maikano tsona go lwantshana le phetogo ya maemo loapi.
tgt_text: It also contributes to global efforts to ensure climate resilience and sustainable development for current and future generations.

src_text: Leano leno le nopola dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tse go tshwanetsweng go beelediwang mo go tsona mo tlhagisong ya motlakase o sa kgotlheleng tikologo, mo tlhagisong ya dijanaga tse di dirisang motlakase le leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo leng tse di tla dirisiwang go bulela dikgato tsa go fetola metlakase re dirisang go simolola go dirisa e sa kgotlheleng tikologo..     Khonferense ya Makoko a Tshegetsang Ditharabololo tsa Maemo Phetogo ya Loapi.
tgt_text: Hailed as ground-breaking new model for tackling climate change, the JET-IP is based on the financial responsibility of developed countries to assist developing nations meet their climate change commitments.

src_text: Kabinete eme nokeng boikuelo jo bo dirilweng kwa go COP27 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sharm El-Sheikh, kwa Egepeta go tloga ka la bo 6 go fitlha ka la bo 18 Ngwanaitseele 2022 jo bo reng dinaga di tshwanetse go tswelela go diragatsa dintlha tse go ipeetsweng tsona mo Tumelanong e Utlwanetsweng ke Dinaga kwa Teropong ya Paris e reng go tshwanetswe go samaganwe le go fokodiwa ga mogote mo lefatsheng ka ditekeri selešiase di le.
tgt_text: It identifies investment priorities in the areas of clean energy, electric vehicles and green hydrogen, to pave the way for sustainable and fair transition towards cleaner energy..
Climate Change Conference of the Parties .

src_text: Kemonokeng ya rona mo ntlheng ya go fokodiwa ga mogote mo lefatsheng ka ditekeri selešiase di le.
tgt_text: Cabinet supported calls at the COP27 being held in Sharm El-Sheikh, Egypt from 6 to 18 November 2022 for countries to remain on track to meet the Paris Agreement goal of limiting the global temperature rise to.

src_text: 5 ke selo se se botlhokwa thata mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa jaaka re le karolo ya kontinenteng ya Aforika bile gape re le naga e santseng tlhabologa tlhabologo ya yona mo go thuseng baagi le ikonomi di anngwang tota ke ditlamorago tsa phetogo ya maemo loapi..     Kabinete dumelane le boikuelo jo bo dirilweng ke dinaga tsa Aforika jwa gore dinaga tse di gatetseng pele di tshwanetse go diragatsa lefoko la bona la go solofetsa gore le tla ema nokeng dinaga tse di santseng di iketetsa jaaka di solofeditse mo ditokomaneng ka bobedi ba tsona leng Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Dinagakopano (UN) mo Mererong ya go Fetola Maemo Loapi mmogo le ya Tumelanong e Utlwanetsweng ke Dinaga kwa Teropong ya Paris.
tgt_text: 5 degrees Celsius.

src_text: Tseno di tsenyeletsa gape le boikuelo ja gore dinaga tse di gatetseng pele tshwanetse go nna tsna tse di gogang kwa pele dikgato tsa go fokotsa kuelelo ya kgotlhelo ya tikologo mmogo le go tlamela ka matlole dinaga tse di santseng di iketetsa gore le tsona di kgone go tsaya dikgato go samagana le phetogo ya maemo loapi..     Go Lwantshana le Bonweenwee.
tgt_text: Our support for the.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke seo se dirilweng mo malobeng leng go tshwara batho ba ba amegang mo ditiragalong tsa go goga puso ka nko mmogo le go thopa dithoto tsa bona.
tgt_text: 5 degree Celsius target is of utmost importance to South Africa as an African and developing country that is highly vulnerable to environmental, social and economic effects of climate change..

src_text: Ditiragalo tseno ke sesupo sa gore tiro e dirilweng ke Khomišene ya Diphuruphutso tse di Mabapi le go Goga Puso ka Nko, go Dira Bonweenwee le Bokhukhuntshwane mo Pusong mmogo le mo Ditheong tsa Puso di simolola go nna le dipoelo..     Batho ba ba dirang bonweenwee mmogo le bao ba dirang gore bana ba rona ba nne le bokamoso jo bo letobo ga ba batlege mo setšhabeng sa rona.
tgt_text: Cabinet also endorsed the Africa group position to call on developed countries to honour their pledges and commitments made under both the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change and its Paris Agreement.

src_text: Puso itomile sesino fa go tla mo go samaganeng le bonweenwee ka tsela e kgopo e sa tshabeng sepe bile sa tsee letlhakore..     Kabinete ikuela mo baaging gore ba tshwarise batho botlhe ba ba dirang ditiro tsa bonweenwee kwa ditheong tsa molao kgotsa ka go loma tsebe ba Mogala wa Tshoganyetso leng Mogala wa Naga wa Twantsho ya Bonweenwee: 0800 701.
tgt_text: These include call for developed countries to take the lead on reducing emissions and providing developing countries with financial resources for their own climate action..  Fight against corruption.

src_text: Batho ba ba lomang mogala ono tsebe ba ka nne ba kopa go nna botlhokaina.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the recent arrests and freezing of assets of individuals allegedly linked to State Capture.

src_text: Leeto la Semmuso la Moporesitente kwa Nageng ya Kenya.
tgt_text: These developments are testament that the work of the Judicial Commission of Inquiry into Allegations of State Capture, Corruption and Fraud in the Public Sector including Organs of State is now bearing fruit..

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke Leeto la Semmuso la Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa, kwa Nageng ya Kenya go latela gore lalediwe ke Moporesitente ka ene bong Ngaka William Ruto.
tgt_text: Corrupt people and those who steal the future of our children have no place in our society.

src_text: Mo leetong leo go atlhaatlhilwe dilo di tshwana le Foramo ya Kgwebisano moo go neng go buiwa ka go gwebisana le go beeletsa mo dinageng ka bobedi leng ya Kenya le ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Government is committed to dealing harshly with all acts of corruption, without fear, favour or prejudice..

src_text: Mo leetong leno go ne ga saeniwa ditumelano tsa go dirisana mo ditirelong tsa tlhokomelo ya batshwariwa, tsa go agela baagi magae, tsa didirisiwa tsa dikgaso tse di reediwang le tse di bogelwang mmogo le mo ditirelong tsa go tlhatlhelela badiredi ba Sekolo sa Naga sa Katiso le Tlhatlhelelo ya Badiredipuso (NSG).
tgt_text: Cabinet urges citizens to report all acts of corruption to law-enforcement agencies or call the National Anti-Corruption Hotline: 0800 701.

src_text: Baeteledipele bano bobedi jwa bona bo ne jwa atlhaatlhaa merero e ka ga ditumelano tsa tirisanommogo ya dipuso tse di farologaneng, maemo ikonomi kgaolo le kontinente.
tgt_text: Callers may choose to remain anonymous.

src_text: Naga ya Kenya ke nngwe ya dinaga tse di gwebisanang go utlwagala tota le naga ya Aforika Borwa fa go tla mo Dinaga tse di Dirisanang Mmogo tse di kwa Borwa jwa Aforika (SADC), mme seno se raya gore Aforika Borwa ke yona e rekisetsang Kenya ditlhagisiwa tse dintsi mo kontinenteng ya rona Naga ya Aforika Borwa romela ditlha.
tgt_text: Kenya State Visit.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa rekiseditse naga ya Kenya ditlhagisiwa di ka dira boleng jwa go feta R6-bilione mo ngwageng wa.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful State Visit to Kenya by President Cyril Ramaphosa, at the invitation of his Kenyan counterpart, Dr William Ruto.
The visit included Business Forum focusing on trade and investment between Kenya and South Africa.

src_text: Dipula tse di Bogale.
tgt_text: The visit also resulted in the signing of instruments on cooperation in correctional services, human settlements, audio-visual co-production, and on building the capacity of the State with the National School of Government.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging gore ba ntshe matlho dinameng mo dipuleng tse di bogale, segolobogolo mo dipuleng tse di nang ka magadima.
tgt_text: The two leaders discussed multilateral, economic, regional and continental issues.

src_text: Puso mmogo le Setheo sa Naga ya Aforika Borwa sa Tirelo ya Maemo Loapi bobedi ba tla tswelela go sedimosetsa baagi ka maemo ga jaana loapi mmogo le ka ponelopele ya maemo ano.
tgt_text: Kenya is South Africa’s largest trading partner outside the Southern African Development Community (SADC) region, making South Africa the biggest seller of goods to Kenya on the continent.

src_text: Baagi ba elediwa gore ba se tsamaele gaufi le mo metsi mantsi sianang ka lobelo, ba se thumele mo go ona kgotsa ba se kgabaganye mo metsing ano ka dijanaga tsa bona se ke wa leka go kgabaganya mo metsi tletseng gonne ka go gogola.
tgt_text: South Africa exported over R6-billion worth of goods to Kenya in.

src_text: Dira bonnete jwa gore ka gale bana ba gago ba bolokesegile bile mo ba tsamayang go babalesegile..     Samiti ya Baeteledipele ba Dinaga di le Someamabedi (G20).

Moporesitente Ramaphosa ne tsenetse Samiti ya bo 17 ya G20 kwa Bali kwa nageng ya Indonesia go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 16 Ngwanaitseele 2022 mo go yona baeteledipele mo lefatsheng ba neng ba kopane teng go bontshana ditharabololo mabapi le dikgwetlho tse dikgolo tse dintsi tse lefatshe ka bophara le tobaneng le tsona      Ditharabololo tse di solofelwang go fitlhelelwa di tsenyeletsa tse di ka ga tirisanommogo ya dinaga tse di farologaneng mo go tsosoloseng ikonomi ya lefatshe, go dira gore ditheo tsa matlole mo lefatsheng di boele sekeng, go dira gore kgolo e sa tekatekeng tswelele go nna teng sebaka se se telele mmogo le go dira gore tsamaiso ya ikonomi mo lefatsheng gagamadiwe.
tgt_text: Severe weather conditions.

src_text: Molaetsamogolo wa samiti eno ya G20 ya Moporesitente wa Indonesia re: “Re Thusana go Tsosolosana, Re Tsosolosana Re na le Maatla le go Feta”.
tgt_text: Cabinet called on the public to exercise caution during unfavourable weather conditions, particularly thunderstorms.

src_text: Jaaka le karolo ya tiro ya naga ya rona, Moporesitente Ramaphosa nnile le seabe mo dikopanong tse di neng di bua ka merero ya boitekanelo, go se felelwe ke dijo le motlakase mmogo le go tshwara le dikopano tse dingwe gape tsa dinaga di le pedi le dinaga tse di botlhokwa tseo re gwebisanang le tsona..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke ditharabololo tse di atlhatlhilweng kwa samiting eno, tseo di tsamaisanang le dintlha tse di botlhokwa mo nageng ya rona leng go fokotsa tshokolo, botlhokatiro le go se lekane re se meno.
tgt_text: Government and the South African Weather Service will continue to provide information on severe weather based on current observations and predictions.

src_text: Katiso le Tlhatlhelelo ya Bokgoni.
tgt_text: People are advised not to walk, swim or drive through fast-moving flood water.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke dikgato tsa semmuso tsa go thankgolola laboratori kgolo ya dithuto tsa 4IR kwa Kholejeng ya Katiso le Thuto ya Ditiro tsa Diatla le tsa Setegenik (di-TVET) ya Goldfields kwa Welkom, mo porofenseng ya Foreistata ka Labone wa la bo 10 Ngwanaitseele.
tgt_text: Do not try to cross flooded area because you could be swept away by the strong currents.

src_text: Seno se thusa gore go nne le katiso le tlhatlhelelo ya bogoni, boitlhamedi le boitshimololedikgwebo, re le naga re ka kgona go abelana ka ditharabololo tse dintšhwa, tse di botoka le tse di sa diegeng go rarabolola dikgwetlho tse re tobaneng natso tsa tshokolo, go se lekane re se meno mmogo le tsa go tlhoka ditiro     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Always ensure that your children are safe and they are able to travel safely.

src_text: Dipegelo tsa Tiro e Dirilweng mo Kotareng ya Bobedi ya Ngwaga.
Kabinete neseditse pula Dipegelo tsa Tiro e Dirilweng mo Kotareng ya Bobedi ya Ngwaga go simolola ka la bo 01 Moranang 2022 go fitlha ka la bo 30 Lwetse.
tgt_text: Group of Twenty (G20) Leaders’ Summit.

src_text: Mo dipegelong tseno ga go buiwe fela ka tiro e dirilweng mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga, dipegelo tseno di bua gape le ka tshekatsheko ya dintlha tse di botlhokwa mo bogareng jwa paka ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro mo Pakeng ya Ngwaga wa 2019-. .
tgt_text: President Ramaphosa participated in the 17th G20 Leaders’ Summit held in Bali in the Republic of Indonesia from 15 to 16 November 2022, which brought together world leaders in collective effort to find solutions to wide range of global challenges.

src_text: Dipegelo tseno di rulagantswe go ya ka ditlhopha di le tlhano  setlhopha sa Merero ya Phimolakeledi, Thibelobosenyi le Pabalesego; (ii) setlhopha sa Makala Merero ya Ikonomi, Dipeeletso, Ditiro le Kago ya Mafaratlhatlha; (iii) setlhopha sa Tlhokomelo ya Baagi, Setšhaba le Katiso ya Batho; (iv) setlhopha sa Ditheo tsa Puso, Batlhankedi ba Puso le Tlhatlhelelo ya Ditheo tsa Naga, mmogo le  setlhopha sa Tirisanommogo le Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le go Gwebisana le go Babalelana..     Dipegelo tseno di tlhalosa ka botlalo dintlha tse di botlhokwa go tswa mo dipeelong di le supa tse di botlhokwa tse puso ipeetseng tsona mme re dirisa tshedimosetso e gatisitsweng mo dipegelong tsa mafapha a farologaneng, dipalopalo go tswa mo dipegelong tsa Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) mmogo le mo dipegelong tsa ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane.
tgt_text: The envisaged solutions include increasing multilateral cooperation for the recovery of the global economy, to bring stability to the global financial system, to promote long-term sustainable growth and to strengthen global economic governance.

src_text: Tshedimosetso eno a sekasekiwa go netefatsa boammaruri jwa yona go ya ka Leano la Tlhabololo la Bosetšhaba: Ponelopele ya.
tgt_text: The theme of the summit held under the G20 Presidency of Indonesia was: “Recover Together, Recover Stronger”.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tiro ntle go begilweng ka yona mo dikarolong dingwe mo go bonagalang gore go diragaditswe bontle go feta le ka fao go neng go lebeletswe.
tgt_text: As part of our nation’s engagement, President Ramaphosa participated in the working sessions on health, food and energy security as well as held several bilateral meetings with key trade partners..

src_text: Le fa go le jalo, Kabinete tshwenngwa ke dikarolo dingwe moo go gogwang maoto mo dipegelong tseno.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the deliberations at the summit, which underpin our own national priorities of reducing poverty, unemployment and inequality.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula ditharabololo tse di tsitshintsweng tse di tla tleng di tsenngwa tirisong go dira gore tiro e saletseng kwa morago potlakisiwe..     Lefapha la Tiromaano,Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Tiro tla re mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo la nna le dipuisano le bobegakgang go tlhalosa dipegelo tseno ka botlalo..     Pholisi ya Dikgato tsa go Thibela Thekiso ya Dikgorokgoro go Dira gore Ikonomi le Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba di se Tlhole di Senyetswa.
tgt_text: Skills Development and Training.

src_text: 1    Kabinete ne ya sekaseka le go nesetswa pula dikgato di le dintsinyana tsa go thibela gore ikonomi le mafaratlhatlha setšhaba di se tlhole di senyetswa ka go dira gore dikgorokgoro le ditshipi tse di sa tlholeng di dirisiwa di se tlhole di rekisiwa.. 2    Seno se dirilwe morago ga gore go phasaladiwe lekwalo la melao ya puso ka la bo 5 Phatwe 2022 go kopa baagi go ntsha se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga lona le le bediwang “Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Melao e Tshitshinngwang go Thibela Ditiro tsa go Gweba ka Ditshipi tse di Botlhokwa le tse di Seng Botlhokwa, Ditshipi le Masenke Dikgerekgere le Dikorokoro le go Dira gore Thekiso ya Tsona Tsmaisane le Molao mme Maitlhomo le go Thibela Ditiragalo tsaTshenyetso ya Ikonomi le Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba”, mme lona le golotswe ke Tona ya Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Intaseteri le Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo; mme le ditshwaelo tse dintsintsi tsa baagi re setse le tsona re di amogetse.. 3    Dintlha ka botlalo tse di ka ga dikgato tse jaanong di tla tsewang di tla rulaganyediwa gore di phasaladiwe mo Lekwalong la Semmuso le le Gatisang Melao ya Puso mme le tla gatisiwa ke Kantoro e jarileng maikarabelo ano mme GCIS yona tla re ka gangwe fela fa tiro ya molao sena go garela ya dira bonnete jwa gore gasa mo bobegakganyeng dikgato ka botlalo ka ntlha eno.. 4    Aforika Borwa tla tšhotlha kgang eno gape le Dinaga tsa Borwa tse di Santseng di Tlhabologa, Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika mmogo le Lekala la Tlhatlhobo ya Dithoto kwa Melelwaneng maitlhomo le go dira bonnete jwa gore re dikadikana le bosenyi jono mo kgaolong ya rona     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the official launch of 4IR micro-laboratory at the Goldfields Technical and Vocational Education and Training College in Welkom, Free State on Thursday, 10 November.

src_text: Semphosiamo ya Aforika Borwa ya go Aga Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba a tla Nnelang Ruri (SIDSSA).
tgt_text: This contributes towards skills development, innovation and entrepreneurship, as the country can provide new, better and faster solutions to our challenges of poverty, inequality and unemployment  Cabinet decisions.

src_text: Ba Mafaratlhatlha Aforika Borwa, mmogo le ba GIZ leng setheo sa go aga mafaratlhatlha sa naga ya German, ba tla tshwara SIDSSA ya boraro kwa Motse Kapa kwa Century City go tloga ka la bo 28 go fitlha ka la bo 30 Ngwanaitseele.
tgt_text: Biannual performance reports.

src_text: Semphosiamo ya monongwaga tla bua ka leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo jaaka selo se se botlhokwa thata mo go godiseng lekala la rona le maano naga go beeletsa tshwanetseng go tobana le lona.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the biannual performance progress reports for the period 1 April 2022 to 30 September.

src_text: Semphosiamo tla kopanya mo lefelong le le esi batlhankedi ba ba tsayang ditshwetso tse dikgolo, ditheo tsa matlole, tsa thuto kgolwane mmogo le ditheo tsa molao tsa boditšhabatšhaba.
tgt_text: In addition to capturing the biannual performance progress, the reports also provide mid-term review of the priorities of the 2019-2024 Medium Term Strategic Framework..

src_text: Semphosiamo eno tla neela naga ya rona tšhono ya gore bontshe lefatshe mafelo yona magolo le a sa tlhokeng matlole mantsi maemo a kwa godimo mo lefatsheng go tlhagisa leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo.
tgt_text: The reports are compiled according to the five clusters namely  Justice, Crime Prevention and Security; (ii) Economic Sectors, Investment, Employment and Infrastructure Development; (iii) Social Protection, Community and Human Development; (iv) Governance, State Capacity and Institutional Development, and  International Cooperation, Trade and Security..

src_text: Tlhokagalo ya leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo go tshwana le amoniya le leokwane la maaka la difofane a oketsega mo lefatsheng.
tgt_text: The reports provide an analysis of the key indicators of the seven adopted priorities of government using data collected from the departmental reports, statistics from Statistics South Africa and reports from the academia.

src_text: Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi la naga ya Aforika Borwa ga le bolo go dira dipatlisiso ka leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo mme le ne lebeletse thata lephata la dinamelwa tse di sa kgotlheleng tikologo mmogo le go ka dirisa ditshipi tse di welang mo setlhopheng sa ditshipi tsa polatinamo..     Monongwaga kwa tshimologong Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula Leano le Legolo la Lephata la Leokwane la Gase.
tgt_text: The information is analysed against the National Development Plan: Vision.

src_text: Leano leno ke le lengwe la maano mantsi puso go eletsa ditkgato tse pholisi ka di tsayang maitlhomo le go dira gore maphata puso le poraefete mmogo le ditheo tsa rona ba tshwarisane tiro gore re fitlhelele ponelopele ya rona e buang ka lefoko le le lengwe la ka fao re ka solang mosola leokwane la gase mmogo le dithekenoloji tsa lona, jaaka le karolo ya go tlhabolola ikonomi ya naga le go fitlhelela maikano re ipeetseng ona go nna le tikologo e sa kgotlhelweng.

Ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa leokwane la gase le dirisiwa ka bontsi mo lekaleng la phepafatso ya dikhemikhale le leokwane, le fa go le jalo fa le tlhagisiwa le tlhagisiwa go sa lebelelwa gore le dirisiwe jaaka sedirisiwa sa motlakase o sa kgotlheleng tikologo mme le dirisiwa mo dilong tse di jaaka malatlha le gase ya tlhago     Go Thapiwa     Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: Cabinet appreciated the remarkable progress reported in some areas that showed performance that exceeded the set-out targets.

src_text: Mme Phindile Baleni thapilwe go okama maemo Mokaedikakaretso (DG) kwa Kantorong ya Moporesitente le go nna Mokwaledi wa Kabinete (Konteraka ya gagwe otlolositswe ka dingwaga di le tlhano)..     Ngaka Philemon Mphathi Mjwara thapilwe go okama maemo DG kwa DSI (Konteraka ya gagwe otlolositswe ka ngwaga le mongwe)..     Kabinete dumelane le Tona ya DTIC go thapa batho ba ba latelang:.
tgt_text: However, it expressed concern at the slow progress reflected in some of the reports.

src_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Peo ya Maemo Boleng     Ngaka Sandile Bethuel Malinga (Monnasetulo)     Rre Tumisang Tsehlo     Ngaka Rudzani Nemutudi     Mme Deidré Penfold     Ngaka Nandipha Madibaf.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the proposed interventions to be implemented to fast-track areas that showed slow progress..

src_text: Mme Gloria Mngunig.
tgt_text: The Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation will soon convene roundtable discussion with the media to unpack these reports..  Policy measures to restrict trade in scrap metal to limit damage to public infrastructure and the economy.

src_text: Ngaka Ron Josiash.
