tgt_text: 1 Cabinet considered and approved the comprehensive package of measures to address the damage to public infrastructure and the economy by restricting trade of waste scrap and semi processed metals.. 2 This follows the gazetting on 5 August 2022 for public comment of the “Draft Policy Proposals on Measures to Restrict and Regulate Trade in Ferrous and Non-Ferrous Metals Waste, Scrap and Semi-Finished Ferrous and Non-Ferrous Metal Products to Limit Damage to Infrastructure and the Economy”, by the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Competition; and consideration of the extensive public comments received.. 3  Details of the measures to be implemented will now be processed for publication in the Government Gazette by the relevant Ministries and detailed media release containing details of the measures will be released by the GCIS as soon as the necessary legal work has been finalised.. 4  South Africa will also engage with the SADC, African Union and the Southern African Customs Union to ensure coordinated approach to fight this crime collectively as region  Upcoming event.

src_text: Ngaka Mukondeleli Grace Kanakana-Katumba.
tgt_text: Sustainable Infrastructure Development Symposium South Africa (SIDSSA).

src_text: Boto ya Lekgotla la go Sekela Dikgetse tsa Ditlamo     Moatlhodi Dennis Davis (Monnasetulo)     Mme Minah Tong-Mongalo (Motlatsamonnasetulo)c.    Mme Daiane Terblanche     Mme Hlaleleni Kathleen Dlepue.
tgt_text: Infrastructure South Africa, in partnership with GIZ German development agency, will host its third SIDSSA in Cape Town Century City from 28 to 30 November.

src_text: Moporofesara Clement Marumoagaef.
tgt_text: This year’s symposium will focus on green hydrogen as an important growth sector in the country’s investment strategy.

src_text: Rre Joshua Sesha Kadishg.
tgt_text: The symposium will bring together decision-makers, financial institutions, academics and international authorities.

src_text: Rre Richard Bradstreet     Rre Fulufhedzani Shane Mudzungai.
tgt_text: The event will afford the country the opportunity to showcase some of the large and low-cost world-class green hydrogen production hubs.

src_text: Mme Nomagcisa Cawej.
tgt_text: The demand for green hydrogen-based products such as ammonia and synthetic jet fuels is rising.

src_text: Rre Brian Jenningsk.
tgt_text: The Department of Science and Innovation (DSI) in South Africa has been researching green hydrogen with focus on green mobility and the use of platinum group metals..

src_text: Ngaka Alli Chicktay.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the Hydrogen Society Roadmap earlier this year.

src_text: Ngaka Mashilo Boloka: Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo yo tshwereng marapo nakwana mo Botong ya Difilimi le Diphasalatso thapilwe gape le mo Botong ya ditokololo di le thataro ya Mogala wa Tshoganyetso wa Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe (INHOPE).
tgt_text: The roadmap is one of government’s strategies and policy direction aimed at bringing together variety of public and private stakeholders and institutions around common vision on how to use and deploy hydrogen and hydrogen-related technologies, as part of the country’s economic development and greening objectives.

src_text: Dipatlisiso tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS).
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dipalopalo tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS) tse di dirilweng ke ba Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) mo kotareng ya boraro ya ngwaga wa 2022, mme tsona di bontsha gore batho ba le 204 000 ba iponetse ditiro mo kotareng ya bobedi le ya boraro ya ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Quarterly Labour Force Survey (QLFS).
Cabinet welcomed the results of Statistics South Africa’s QLFS for the third quarter of 2022, which indicated that 204 000 jobs were gained between the second and third quarters of..

src_text: Dipatlisiso tseno gape di bontsha gore palo ya batho botlhe ba ba iponetseng ditiro mo kotareng ya boraro ya ngwaga wa 2022 ne tsamaela mo go ba le dimilione di le 15,. .
tgt_text: The QLFS also revealed that the total number of persons employed in the third quarter of 2022 was 15,8 million.

src_text: Seno se raya gore palo ya semmuso ya batho ba ba senang ditiro wetse kwa tlase ka phesente le nngwe go tloga mo go ba ba ka dirang diphesente di le 33,9% mo kotareng ya bobedi mme ga jaanong mo go di le 32,9% mo kotareng ya boraro ya ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: This means that the official unemployment rate decreased by 1,0 percentage point from 33,9% in the second quarter to 32,9% in the third quarter of.

src_text: Go ya gape le ka tlhaoloso ya dipalo tsotlhe tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro palo ya batho ba ba senang ditiro fokotsegile gape le ka phesente le nngwe mme jaanong mo go diphesente di le 43,1% mo kotareng ya boraro ya ngwaga wa 2022 mme botoka fa bapisiwa le eo botlhokatiro bo neng bo le mo go bona mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: The unemployment rate according to the expanded definition of unemployment also decreased by 1,0 percentage point to 43,1% in the third quarter of 2022 compared to the second quarter of.

src_text: Le fa tota go tokafala ga maemo ano go bonagala kete ga go gokalo go go fetogileng, se sno se bonagalang ke gore maano go leka go oketsa dipalo tsa batho ba ba nang le ditiro setse simolotse go re tswela molemo..  Ditiro tse re nnileng le tsona bontsi jwa tsona bo tlhageletse mo lephateng la tlhagisong ya dikuno (moo go dirilweng ditiro di le 123 000), mme lona la latelwa ke la kgwebisano (moo go dirilweng ditiro di le 82 000), la dikoterana tsa kago (moo go dirilweng ditiro di le 46 000), la dipalangwa (moo go dirilweng ditiro di le 33 000),mmogo le mo lephateng la ditiro tsa mo metseng le la tlhokomelo ya baagi (moo go dirilweng ditiro di le 27 000).
tgt_text: While this increase may be viewed as drop in the ocean, it does show that the strategies to grow employment are starting to yield positive results.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging gore ba se tšhe legano fa go tla mo kemonokeng ya Leano la Itharabologelo le Kagosešwa ya Ikonomi (ERRP) go dira bonnete jwa gore re le naga ga re tšhwe mafoko fa go tla mo go godiseng ikonomi le mo go tlholeng ditiro tse di tlhokagala..  Kabinete itse sentle gore naga ya rona santse saletse morago mo dilong di le dintsi bogolosegolo mo tirong ya go rarabolola bothata jwa botlhokatiro..  Leeto la Moporesitente go Etela ka Mabaka Tiro Naga ya United Kingdom kwa Great Britain le kwa Northern Ireland (UK).
tgt_text: The largest jobs gain were recorded in manufacturing (123 000), followed by trade (82 000), construction (46 000), transport (33 000), and community and social services (27 000).

src_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke Leeto la maemo a kwa godimo la Moporesitente go Etela ka Mabaka Tiro Naga ya UK go simolola ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 23 Ngwanaitseele.
tgt_text: Cabinet called on South Africans to continue to rally behind the country’s Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP) to ensure that as country we keep the momentum of growing the economy and creating much-needed jobs..

src_text: Motlotlegi Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ke ene wa ntlhantlha mo lefatsheng jaaka tlhogo ya puso go amogelwa ke Bogosi jwa naga ya Britain fa sale bo okanngwa ke Motlotlegi Kgosi Charles III, fa sale namela setilo sa bogosi ka kgwedi ya Lwetse.
tgt_text: Cabinet acknowledges that the country has long way to go and more work needs to be done to address the challenge of unemployment in the country.
State Visit to the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (UK).

src_text: Leeto la Moporesitente go Etela ka Mabaka Tiro Naga ya Bogosi ke tlotla e seng kana ka sepe mo nageng jaaka thusa gore botsalano jwa naga eo le jwa UK bo tswelele go gola bile gape seno ke sesupo sa ka fao UK tsayang botsalano jwa yona le naga e rileng jaaka jo bo botlhokwa ka gona.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the historic Presidential State Visit to the UK that took place from   22 to 23 November.

src_text: Leeto la Moporesitente go Etela ka Mabaka Tiro Naga eno leng se se gagamatsang botsalano jo bogolo magareng ga naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya UK, le dirile gore go thankgololwe kgato e tla latelang ya tirisanommogo mo mererong ya mafaratlhatlha magareng ga UK le Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: His Excellency President Cyril Ramaphosa became the first Head of State to be hosted by the British monarch, His Majesty King Charles III, since his accession to the throne in September Royal State Visit is the highest honour bestowed on country by the UK to further promote bilateral relations and it also symbolises the importance the UK ascribes to its relations with particular country.

src_text: Mo tirisanongmmogo eno Aforika Borwa tla enngwa nokeng mo kgodisong ya mafaratlhatlha ikonomi ya ona mmogo le go dira gore ditlamo tsa naga ya UK di tsenye letsogo mo diporojekeng tsa boleng jwa madi le kana ka £.
tgt_text: The Presidential State Visit, which marked continuation of the strong bilateral ties between South Africa and the UK, resulted in the launch of the next phase of the UK-South Africa Infrastructure Partnership.

src_text: 37 bilione mo dingwageng di le tharo tse di tlang..  Mosola wa leeto leno ke go godisa kgwebisano le dipeeletso magareng ga dinaga ka bobedi, mmogo le go godisa maraka mo nageng ya Britain Aforika Borwa o rekisetsang ditlhagisiwa tsa yona.
tgt_text: The partnership supports South Africa’s economic growth through major infrastructure developments and offers increased access to UK companies in projects worth up to £.

src_text: Mo Foramong ya Beng ba Dikgwebo ba Naga ya UK le ya Aforika Borwa, babeeletsi ba naga ya UK bao ba neng ba dira boikano jwa gore ba tla tswelela go dirisana le naga ya Aforika Borwa ba ne ba bontshiwa ditšhono tse dintsinyana tseo dikgwebo tsa bona di ka beeletsang mo go tsona.
tgt_text: 37 billion over the next three years.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya UK di saenile gape le Tokomane ya Tirisanommogo mabapi le go Dirisana Mmogo mo Mererong ya Saense le ya Boitlhamedi mmogo le go Dirisana Mmogo le mo Mererong ya Boitekanelo mo go tla tsepamiswang mogopolo mo go direng meento, go abelana ka tshedimosetso ya matshwao bolwetse mmogo le go dirisana le ka merero ya maemo loapi..  Tse dingwe tsa dilo tse di tlhageletseng mo leetong leno ke go totobatsa gore dinaga tseno di tla dirisana mo mafaratlhatlheng, mo dithekenolojing tse di sa kgotlheleng tikologo mmogo le mo metsweding ya motlakase o fetlhiwang ka ditsela tse dintšhwa o sa kgotlheleng tikologo.
tgt_text: The visit focused on upgrading trade and investment levels between the two countries, and also on creating more opportunities in British markets for South African goods and commodities.

src_text: Ditšhono tseno tsotlhe di na le bokgoni jwa gore di ka bulela kgwebisano ka fa nageng, dipeeletso mmogo le go oketsa tlholego ya ditiro..  Lefelo la Teropo ya Tshwane la Ikonomi e Itlhophileng e Itshetlegileng mo Dijanageng (TASEZ).
tgt_text: During the UK-SA Business Forum, numerous business opportunities on offer were profiled to UK investors who pledged their continued engagement with South Africa.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tsa Ford Motor Company of South Africa (FMCSA) tsa go tlhagisa sejanaga sa Ford Ranger, mo re boneng go diriwa dipeeletso tsa matlole le kanaka  8 bilione..  Seno se dirile gore ditlamo tsotlhe di le 10 tsa go aga dikarolo tsa dijanaga tse di leng mo lefelong leno la TASEZ di tsene tirong semmuso ka botlalo.
tgt_text: South Africa and the UK  also signed Memorandums of Understanding on Cooperation in Science and Innovation as well as Health Cooperation that would focus on vaccine manufacturing, genome sequencing and climate change.

src_text: Dipeeletso tse di dirilweng ke ditlamo tseno tsa go aga dikarolo tsa dijanaga di ne tsa fitlha go  62 bilione mme ga tlhodiwa ditiro di le 1 259 tsa letsatsi le letsatsi tseo di unngwetseng bašwa ba le kanaka 76% le basadi ba le kanaka 32%..  Lefelo la TASEZ le tlhomilwe ka maitlhomo gore nne lefelo le le tlhagisang dijanaga tse di agiwang go dira tiro e rileng mme maitlhomo ne le go tlhola ditiro mmogo le go thusa gore dikgwebopotlana, tse dikgolwane le tse dikgolo di nne le seabe mo ikonoming ya kgaolo eo.
tgt_text: Other outcomes from the visit included securing collaboration on infrastructure, clean technology and renewable energy sources.

src_text: La ntlha fa sejanaga seno se ne se agiwa maitlhomo ne le go oketsa mafaratlhatlha le bokgoni mo setlamong sa FMCSA ka go dira gore naga ya Aforika Borwa nne nngwe ya mafelo le mararo fela mo lefatsheng a tlhagisang Ford Ranger ntšhwa..  Khonferense e Buang ka Thekenoloji ya Naga le Bokgoni jwa Kamoso.
tgt_text: These opportunities hold the potential to unlock domestic trade, investment and boost job creation.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke Khonferense e Buang ka Thekenoloji ya Naga le Bokgoni jwa Kamoso e neng tshwaretswe kwa Umhlanga, KwaZulu-Natal go tloga ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 23 Ngwanaitseele 2022, eo maitlhomo yona leng go matlafatsa dikgato tse naga ya rona gatetseng pele mo go tsona mo mererong e buang ka thekenoloji le bokgoni jwa kamoso..  Gareng ga dilo tse dingwe tse dintsi, maitlhomo Khonferense eno e neng tshwerwe ke Lefapha la Ditlhaeletsano le Thekenoloji ya Dijithale (DCDT) ka tirisanommogo le Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) ne le go matlafatsa tirisanommogo mo mererong e buang ka thekenoloji le bokgoni jwa kamoso mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, go dira gore batho ba nne le phisegelo ya go dira ka thekenoloji le bokgoni jwa kamoso mmogo le go tlhotlhomisa ditšhono tsa katiso ya tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni jwa go dirisa didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji tse bašwa ba nang le tsona tse di tlhagisiwang ka ntlha ya Diintaseteri tsa Thekenoloji..  Mo khonferenseng eno go dumelanwe gore puso, dikgwebo, mekgatlho ya baagi, mekgatlho ya lefatshe e samaganang le merero ya tlhabologo mmogo le mekgatlho ya bašwa tla nna bona ba ba isang naga eno pele mo lefatsheng la thekenoloji..  Lefelo le Lentšhwa la kwa Porofenseng ya Limpopo la go Tlhokomela Basadi ba ba Bogisiwang.
tgt_text: Tshwane Automotive Special Economic Zone (TASEZ).

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go bulwa ga Lefelo la go Tlhokomela Basadi ba ba Bogisiwang kwa Bookelong jwa Dilokong mo Motseng wa Dilokong, kwa porofenseng ya Limpopo ka Labobedi, 22 Ngwanaitseele.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the production of the next generation Ford Ranger by Ford Motor Company of South Africa (FMCSA), which saw capital investment of  8 billion.

src_text: Lefelo leno la ditirelontsi le ema nokeng basadi ba ba bogisiwang le ba ba sutlhileng leso ka mosobana wa nalete (GBVF) mmogo le bao ba kileng ba betelelwa..  Lefelo leno ke la bo 62 la mafelo mofuta ono a butsweng naga ka bophara mme le go bontsha gore puso diragatsa seo se solofeditseng ka ngwaga wa 2018 kwa Samiting ya Moporesitente e ka ga go Nna Kgatlhanong le GBVF mo solofeditseng gore tla aga mafelo mangwe mantsinyana mothale ono.
tgt_text: This resulted in all 10 auto component manufacturing companies located in the TASEZ officially entering into full operation.

src_text: Pegelo ya Tiro Yotlhe ya Morunikakaretso ya Ngwaga wa 2021/.
tgt_text: The investment by the component manufacturers amounted to  62 billion and created 1 259 permanent jobs benefiting youth (76%) and women (32%).

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dipoelo tsa ngwaga wa 2021/22 tsa tiro ya moruni mo go lekoleng gore Molao wa Botsamaisi jwa Madi Puso (PFMA) a obamelwa, mme dipoelo tseno di phasaladitswe ke Morunimogolo wa naga ya rona bong Mme Tsakani Maluleke ka Laboraro, 23 Ngwanaitseele 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go itlwaetsa go dira tiro ka maikarabelo go tla thusa gore kabo ya ditirelo mo setšhabeng tokafale”.
tgt_text: TASEZ was established as special-purpose vehicle production zone with mandate to create employment opportunities and promote economic participation for small, medium and micro enterprises in the region.

src_text: Kabinete etse tlhoko gore go ya ka dipoelo tsa tiro ya boruni go ditheo tsa puso ya naga le tsa diporofense tse di itsotsoropang mme le fa go le jalo santse tshwenngwa ke gorego dikarolo tsa kabo ya ditirelo tse di botlhokwa tse di tswelelang go goga maoto.
tgt_text: Its first phase of development was aimed at creating additional infrastructure and capacity within the FMCSA supply chain to support South Africa to be one of the only three hubs in the world to produce the next-generation Ford Ranger.

src_text: Go ya ka tiro ya boruni jwa mafapha le 160, go bonagetse gore le 47 itsotsoropile mo go tokafatseng maemo ona fa le 12 boetse morago.
tgt_text: National Digital and Future Skills Conference.

src_text: Go fela jalo le ka tiro ya boruni jwa dikgwebo tsa puso di le 238, mo go bonagetse gore le 67 itsotsoropile mo go tokafatseng maemo ona fa le 34 boetse morago.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcomes of the National Digital and Future Skills Conference held in Umhlanga, KwaZulu-Natal from 22 to 23 November 2022, to strengthen our nation’s advances in the area of digital and future skills in South Africa.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse boikano jo bo dirilweng ke puso jwa gore tla tsaya dikgato go baakanya matsapa a dirang gore maphata puso se nne le dipholo tse di itumedisang tsa boruni mme tla fedisa matsapa ano gore dipholo tsa ona tsa boruni nne tse di itumedisang.
tgt_text: Hosted by the Department of Communications and Digital Technologies (DCDT) in partnership with the Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ), the conference aimed to, among others, strengthen partnerships in the area of digital and future skills in South Africa, create and stimulate interest in digital and future skills, and explore digital skills training opportunities available for youth presented by the Fourth Industrial Revolution.

src_text: Letsholo la Pabalesego mo Pakeng ya Dikeresemose.
tgt_text: The conference forged partnerships between government, business, civil society, international development organisations and youth organisations to take our nation forward into the digital era.

src_text: Mo malobanyaneng puso thankgolotse Letsholo la Pabalesego mo Pakeng ya Dikeresemose la ngwaga wa 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go oketsa palo ya mapodisi go dira gore tirelo ya mapodisi bonagale.”.
tgt_text: New Thuthuzela Care Centre in Limpopo.

src_text: Go dira gore baagi botlhe mmogo le bajanala ba se belaele le gore ba babalesege ka fa nageng ya rona mo pakeng ya dikeresemose le fa di setse di fetile, re tla dira gore tirelo ya mapodisi bonagale ka go gagamatsa matsholo go lwantshana le bosenyi ka go dirisana le maphata sepodisi le twantsho ya bosenyi mo tla gogwang kwa pele ke Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) le ditheo tse dingwe tsa twantsho ya bosenyi.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the opening of the Thuthuzela Care Centre in the Dilokong Hospital at Dilokong Village in Driekop, Limpopo on Tuesday, 22 November.

src_text: Kabinete ikueala mo baaging botlhe go dirisana le mapodisi go dira gore metse ya rona babalesege..  Jaaka mo mebileng ya naga ya rona pharakano simolola go susumoga, botlhe ba ba dirisang mebila go ikuelwa mo go bona gore ba ntshe matlho dinameng, mmogo le go obamela melao le melawana ya tsela e jaaka go se siane ka lebelo le le fetang leo ba le kwadileng mo mmileng oo.
tgt_text: The one-stop facility offers services in support of victims of gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF) and sexual crimes.

src_text: Go se itshiele fa kganna, go apara lepanta fa le ka fa sejanageng, go bula sekgala se se lekaneng fa pele ga sejanaga se se setseng morago mmogo le go ikhutsa morago ga diura tse dingwe le tse dingwe di le tharo mo lefelong le itseng gore le bolokesegile gore goge mowa fa le gore a kganna.
tgt_text: The centre is the 62nd to be opened across the country and fulfils the commitment government made at the 2018 Presidential Summit Against GBVF to build more of such centres.

src_text: Ela tlhoko badirisi ba bangwe ba ditsela gore lotlhe le goroge koo le yang le babalesegile..  Kabinete ikuela mo bathong botlhe go ntsha matlho dinameng mo pakeng eno ya dikeresemose go dira bonnete jwa gore bona le batho ba bangwe ba babalesegile, segolobogolo bana ba ba tlhokang go tlhokomelwa ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho.
tgt_text: Auditor-General’s (AG) 2021/22 Consolidated General Report.

src_text: Ka go ntsha matlho dinameng le go nna le maikarabelo, re ka kgona go dira gore rona le balelapa le masika mmogo le ditsala re nne le mekete e monate.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the 2021/22 Public Finance Management Act audit outcomes of the national and provincial government, which were released by AG Tsakani Maluleke on Wednesday, 23 November 2022 under the theme: “A culture of accountability will improve service delivery”.

src_text: Samiti ya Aforika Borwa e ka ga Leokwane la Gase le le sa Kgotlheleng Tikologo (SAGHS).
tgt_text: Cabinet noted the gradual upward trend in the audit outcomes of national and provincial government but expressed concern that key service delivery portfolios continued to receive poor outcomes.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke ka fao go garetsweng ka katlego mokete wa SAGHS 2022 o neng tshwaretswe kwa Motsekapa ka la bo 28 le la bo 30 Ngwanaitseele 2022 o dirileng gore naga ya rona itlhagise jaaka lefelo le le ka kgonang go nna lefelo la maemo a kwa godimo mo lefatsheng la tlhagiso ya leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo.
tgt_text: Based on the completed audits of 160 departments, 47 departments had improved and 12 had regressed.

src_text: Mo go direng gore naga ya rona nne le matshwanedi go nna le lekala le le dirang bontle la leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo, puso kwadile Leano la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la Merero ya Leokwane la Gase leng le le buang ka maikemisetso naga mo motlakaseng wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa mmogo le mo polatinamong leng yona e botlhokwa mo thulaganyong ya motlakase wa leokwane la gase leng seo se tla bayang naga ya Aforika Borwa mo maemong a kwa godimo mo go gogeng kwa pele maraka montšhwa ono..  Ikonomi ya tshomarelo ya tlhago ke enngwe ya ditiro tse re samaganeng le tsona mo Leanong la Itharabologelo le Kagosešwa ya Ikonomi (ERRP) mo re samaganang le go ribolola ditsela tse dintšhwa tsa go godisa ikonomi ya naga rona tse go nang le kgonagalo ya gore di ka fetola ikonomi ya naga ya rona le go tlhola ditiro tse dintšhwa.
tgt_text: Similarly, of the 238 public entities with completed audits, 67 had improved and 34 had regressed.

src_text: Go Thankgololwa ga Setheo sa Naga ya Aforika Borwa sa Dithekenoloji tsa Maemo a kwa Godimo tse di Dirang Ditiro tse di Diriwang ke Batho.
tgt_text: Cabinet affirmed government’s commitment to taking corrective measures to address the root causes that lead to poor audit outcomes and remove weaknesses to achieve clean audits.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tirisanommogo e nnileng teng magareng ga DCDT, Tshwane University of Technology mmogo le University of Johannesburg leng se se dirileng gore go thankgololwe Setheo sa Naga ya Aforika Borwa sa AI kwa Johannesburg Business Schoo ka Laboraro, 30 Ngwanaitseele.
tgt_text: Safer Festive Season campaign.
Government recently launched the 2022 Safer Festive Season campaign under the theme: “More boots on the ground towards enhanced police visibility.”.

src_text: Sekolo seno se se tshwanang se le esi se tlisa diphetogo tse dintšhwa ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa ka maitlhomo go tlhabolola thekenoloji.
tgt_text: To ensure the well-being and safety of all residents and tourists in our country during the festive season and beyond, heightened police visibility will include intensified and integrated crime-prevention and crime-combating operations by the South African Police Service and other law-enforcement agencies.

src_text: Se tla dira gore ikonomi gole, sa samagana le matsapa botlhokatiro mmogo le go tlisa dilo tse dintle mo baaging.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on all people to work with law-enforcement authorities to keep our communities safe.

src_text: Setheo seno sa AI se tla godisa dithuto tsa go betla diroboto le tsa dipuo tsa go naya didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji ditaelo tse ga jaana leng dithuto tse di rebolelwang baithuti mo dikolong tsa ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: As traffic volumes on our national roads increase, all road users are urged to be vigilant, and to obey traffic rules and regulations such as speed limits.

src_text: Maitlhomo setheo seno ke go dira bonnete jwa gore puso le ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane mmogo le diintaseteri botlhe ba tshwaraganela tiro le seoposengwe gore botlhe ba dirise kitso ba nang le yona, bokgoni le maitemogelo gore go tliwe ka ditharabololo tse di tsamaisanang tsa matsapa magolo le e leng kgale le teng naga ya Aforika Borwa le kontinente ya Aforika di tobaneng le ona mmogo le go dira gore kontinente eno gatele pele.
tgt_text: Do not drive while under the influence of alcohol, always wear your seatbelt, keep safe following distance and stop at safe place to rest after at least every three hours of driving.

src_text: Dikgato tsa puso tsa go tsepamisa mogopolo mo bokgoning jwa go dirisa didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji di tsenyeletsa gape le maitlhomo go tshegetsa bašwa le go tlotlomatsa bokgoni jwa bona, mmogo le dikgwebopotlana le tse dikgolwane, segolobogolo tse leng gona di simolola, go di rotloetsa gore ba dirise didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji go tlhagisa seo ba se dirang  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Be courteous to other road users so that we can all reach our destinations safely.

src_text: Pegelo ya Dipatlisiso mabapi le Madi a Dirisiwang mo Mererong ya Bana le Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Cabinet urges everyone to take extra care this festive season to ensure their own safety and that of others, especially children, who must be supervised at all times.

src_text: Kabinete atlhaatlhile mmogo le go nesetsa pula Pegelo ya Dipatlisiso e Tlhagisitsweng ke Lefapha la Merero ya Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi (DWYPD), mo le neng le dirisana mmogo le Letsholo la Dinagakopano la Merero ya Ditlhabologo (UNDP).
tgt_text: By exercising extreme care and responsible behaviour, we can guarantee an enjoyable time of celebration with family and friends.

src_text: Dipatlisiso tseno di neelana ka tshedimosetso e buang gore lelapa le dirisa madi le kanakang go tlhokomela bana ba ba nang le bogolofadi mmogo le batho ba bagolo ba ba nang le bogolofadi..  Tshedimosetso e tswang mo dipatlisisong tseno neelana ka bopaki jwa madi a dirisiwang, jo gareng ga tse dingwe tse dintsi bo tla dirisiwang go thusa go tla ka palo e tlhokagalang ya megolo ya go thusa batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi.
tgt_text: South Africa Green Hydrogen Summit (SAGHS).

src_text: Pegelo eno akgola gape le dipatlisiso tse di dirilweng ke UNDP mo ngwageng wa 2013 le wa 2015 tse di neng di sekaseka ka fao malapa a nang le batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi kakatletseng ka gona mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa fa go tla mo mererong ya matlole.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful conclusion of the country’s inaugural SAGHS 2022 held in Cape Town from 28 to 30 November 2022, which showcased our nation’s offerings as world-class green hydrogen production hub.

src_text: Pegelo eno tla phasaladiwa morago ga gore gatisiwe mo lekwalong la melao ya puso.
tgt_text: In creating the environment for the green hydrogen sector to flourish, government has developed Hydrogen SA Strategy that taps into our nation’s endowment of renewable energy and platinum catalyst in the hydrogen electrolysis process, to position South Africa as global leader in this new market.

src_text: Tshekatsheko e Potlakileng ye ka ga go Tsenya Tirisong Pholisi ya Puso e Buang ka go Tsaya Letlhakore fa go Rebolelwa Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi Dithendara tsa Puso.
tgt_text: The green hydrogen economy is part of our work under the ERRP to explore new sources of economic growth that have the potential to revolutionise our economy and create new jobs.

src_text: Kabinete reboletswe pegelo e sekasekang fa le gore mafapha puso ya naga le ya porofense ikobela ditaolelo tsa pholisi ya puso e buang ka go tsaya letlhakore fa go rebolelwa dikgwebo tse di laolwang ke basadi, bašwa le batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi dithendara tsa puso.
tgt_text: Launch of the Artificial Intelligence (AI) Institute of South Africa.

src_text: Tiro eno ya go sekaseka mafapha ano simolotse mo ngwageng wa 2018 mme ya garela mo ngwageng wa..  Tshedimosetso eno tserwe mo Sefalaneng sa Tshedimosetso ya Baabi ba Ditirelo mo Ditheong tsa Puso (CSD) seo se laolwang ke Lefapha la Matlotlo Naga mmogo le mo mafapheng ao arabileng dipotso tseo di neng di rometswe mo go ona mabapi le ntlha eo.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the collaboration between the DCDT, Tshwane University of Technology and the University of Johannesburg that resulted in the launch of the AI Institute of South at the Johannesburg Business School on Wednesday, 30 November..

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsotlhe tse di tshitshintsweng tse di tla dirang gore puso obamele taolelo e reng tshwanetse go neela bontsi jo bo ka dirang diphesente di le 40 tsa dithendara go dikgwebo bogolosegolo tsa basadi.
tgt_text: The first-of-its-kind institute ushers new era in South Africa’s digital transformation efforts.

src_text: Tse dingwe tsa dikgato tse di tshitshintsweng ke tsa go tlhabolola CSD, go katisa batlhankedi ba ba rwalang maikarabelo mmogo le Batlhankedi ba ba Rweleng Maikarabelo Tiriso ya Matlole Puso le Theko ya Dithoto le Ditirelo mo Pusong mo mafapheng puso mmogo le go ba tlhaba botlhale.
tgt_text: It will stimulate economic growth, address unemployment and create positive social impact.

src_text: Pegelo e feletseng tla phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya lefapha ya: www.dwypd.gov.za.
tgt_text: The AI Institute will expand the teaching of robotics and coding currently being offered in public schools.

src_text: Leano la go Diragatsa Matsholo Ngwagasome Saense le Thekenoloji (Leano la Ngwagasome la STI).
tgt_text: The institute is designed to ensure that government academia and industry work together in unique partnership to apply their collective knowledge, expertise and experience to implement coordinated solutions to some of South Africa and Africa’s most critical and long-standing challenges, and to take the continent forward.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la Ngwagasome la STI, le le dirisiwang jaaka tokomane e thusitseng go kwala Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela sa 2019 sa STI.
tgt_text: Government’s focus on digital skills includes creating platforms to support and promote the ability of youth, and small and medium enterprises, in particular start-ups, to develop digital content  Cabinet decisions.

src_text: Kabinete ka Mopitlwe 2021 ne ya nesetsa pula sekwalwa sa ntlha se se santseng se tlhoka gore se sekasekwe sa leano leno mme go tloga mo motsing oo le ne la fetisiwa le mo matlhong bannaleseabe ba ba matshwanedi gore ba konopele tlhware logong.
tgt_text: Research Report on the economic costs of disability for children with disabilities and persons with physical disabilities in South Africa.

src_text: Leano leno le na le dikarolo di le tlhano tse go tshwanetsweng go tsepamisiwa mogopolo mo go tsona: (1) go dira gore lephata la temothuo, la tlhagisodikuno le la moepo le tsamaisane le dinako tsa segompieno; (2) go sola mosola metswedi mentšhwa ya kgodiso ya ikonomi, segolobogolo ya didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji le ya go dirisa didirisiwa tse di neng di latlhilwe; (3) matsholo magolo dipatlisiso le boitlhamedi mo maphateng maokelo le metlakase; (4) Go sola mosola STI gore kgone go dira gore re nne le puso e dirang ka botswapelo mme ya bo (5) ka ga go samagana le dikgwetlho di le tharo tse dikgolo mo setšhabeng leng, ya go fetoga ga maemo loapi le go somarela tikologo, bokamoso jwa thuto, tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni le ka kitso ya tiro, mmogo le isago ya setšhaba.
tgt_text: Cabinet considered and approved the Research Report that was commissioned by the Department for Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities (DWYPD), in partnership with the United Nations (UN) Development Programme (UNDP).

src_text: Leano la ntlhantlha la go Diragatsa Matsholo Ngwagasome Saense le Thekenoloji go tloga ka ngwaga wa 2008 go fitlha ka wa 2018, mmogo le Leano la Naga la Dipatlisiso le la Tlhabololo la ngwaga wa 2002, ke ona a dirisitsweng gore go tsweng mo go ona go tlhodiwe Leano le re nang le lona ga jaana la go Diragatsa Matsholo Ngwagasome Saense le Thekenoloji.
tgt_text: The research provides information on disability-related costs on households with children with disabilities and adults with physical disabilities.

src_text: Maano ano godisa dikgato tsa puso tsa go tlisa boitlhamedi mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: The research insights provide evidence of cost estimates for, among others, the determination of social-security benefits subsidisation of services for persons with disabilities.

src_text: Tokomane eno tla phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi ya: www.dst.gov.za.
tgt_text: This report complements the study also done by the UNDP between 2013 and 2015 on elements of the financial and economic costs of disability households in South Africa.

src_text: Leano la Naga la go Sekaseka Matshosetsi a Leng Teng Mabapi le Dikgato tsa go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa go Tlhatswa Tšhelete ya Bogodu, go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa go Tlamela Digongwana tsa Menolopuso ka Madi mmogo le go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa go Tlamela Digongwana tsa go Reka Dilwana le Didiriswa tsa Maaka tse di Rekisiwang (AML/CFT/CPF).
tgt_text: The report will be published after it has been gazetted.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la Naga la AML/CFT/CPF mmogo le Dikgato tsa go Sekaseka Matshosetsi a Leng Teng ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Rapid Evaluation of the implementation of government policy on preferential public procurement towards women, youth and persons with disabilities.

src_text: Leano leno le kwadilwe go latela gore go kwadiwe dikgato tsa tshekatsheko ya matshosetsi tse di kwadilweng ke ditheo tsotlhe tse di amegang tsa pabalesego le tsa matlole.
tgt_text: Cabinet received an evaluation report that assessed the compliance rate by national and provincial departments on the preferential procurement application on businesses owned by women, youth and persons with disabilities.

src_text: Go tsenya tirisong leano leno – le le nang le dipeelo di le tharo tsa maemo a kwa godimo a tla samaganang le maano le 13 ditharabololo – gareng ga ba bangwe ba bantsi go tla tlhokagala thuso ya ditheo tsa molao, tsa go lwantshana le bosenyi, ditheo tsa matlole le tseo seng tsa matlole mmogo le batlhankedi ba ba direlang makala poraefete.
tgt_text: The evaluation covered the period from 2018 to..  Data was collected from National Treasury’s Central Supplier Database (CSD) and respondents from departments to the questionnaires sent to them.

src_text: Go tsenngwatirisong ga leano leno go tla thusa naga gore kgone go gagamatsa dithulaganyo tsa yona tsa matlole gore kgone go ema nokeng dikgato tsa yona tsa go thusa go godisa ikonomi ka go fokotsa bontsi jwa ditiragalo tsa bosenyi tse di amanang le tiriso ya madi.
tgt_text: The data did not, however, capture information from all the departments, but was sufficient enough to guide Cabinet on areas that need strengthening to ensure full compliance.

src_text: Leano leno gape le samagana le tse dingwe tsa ditshitshinyo di le 40 tse di tshitshintsweng morago ga gore naga ya Aforika Borwa sekasekiwe ke Sepodisi sa Ditirelo tsa Matlole leng mokgatlho o dirilweng ke ditheo tse di farologaneng tsa puso tse di kwalang dipholisi tse maitlhomo tsona leng go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa tlamelo ya digongwana tsa menolopuso ka ditšhelete mmogo le go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa go tlhatswa tšhelete ya bogodu.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved all the intervention recommendations that will ensure government complies with the 40% procurement to women in particular.

src_text: Dipegelo tse di sosobanngweng ka bobedi jwa tsona tseno di tla phalsaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha Lefapha la Matlotlo Naga ya: www.treasury.gov.za.
tgt_text: Some of the recommendations include the enhancement of the CSD software, and the training and awareness raising of accounting officers and Supply Chain Management practitioners in departments.

src_text: Leano la go Rekisa Leokwane la Gase le le sa Kgotlheleng Tikologo (GHCS).
tgt_text: The full report will be posted on the DWYPD’s website: www.dwypd.gov.za.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa GHCS gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga lona.
tgt_text: Science, Technology and Innovation (STI) Decadal Plan.

src_text: Maitlhomo leano leno ke go dira bonnete jwa gore naga sola mosola ditšhono tse di tlisiwang ke diintaseteri tse di dirisang motlakase o sa kgotlheleng tikologo..  GHCS tla dira bonnete jwa gore naga ya Aforika Borwa nna yona e gogang kwa pele tlhagiso le thekiso ya leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo tla thusa go godisa ikonomi ya naga ya rona mmogo le go ema nokeng dikgato tsa naga tsa go fetola metlakase eo e dirisang gore kgone go gokotsa mesi e kuelelang e kgotlhelang tikologo.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the 2022 STI Decadal Plan, which serves as an implementation guide of the 2019 White Paper on STI.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa ga a bolo go tlhoma Leano le le Buang ka Leokwane la Gase le le sa Kgotlheleng Tikologo le Kabinete le neseditseng pula mo ngwageng wa.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the draft plan in March 2021 and has since been enriched through further consultation with relevant stakeholders.

src_text: Maraka o leng teng ga jaana o goletseng ruri wa leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo tla neela naga ya Aforika Borwa ditšhono tse di seng kana ka sepe..  Leano la Puso la go Samagana le Ditiragalo tsa go Isana kwa Kgotlatshekelo la go Tloga ka Ngwaga wa 2021 go Fitlha ka wa.
tgt_text: The plan has five thematic focus areas: (1) modernisation of agricultural, manufacturing and mining sectors; (2) exploitation of new sources of growth, particularly the digital and circular economy; (3) large research and innovation programmes in the areas of health and energy; (4) utilising STI to support capable state and (5) addressing three societal grand challenges, namely climate change and environmental sustainability, the future of education, skills development and work, and the future of society.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la Puso la go Samagana le Ditiragalo tsa go Isana kwa Kgotlatshekelo la go Tloga ka Ngwaga wa 2021 go Fitlha ka wa.
tgt_text: The first Decadal Plan for 2008-2018, together with the 2002 National Research and Development Strategy, served as the basis of the current Decadal Plan.

src_text: Maitlhomo leano leno ke go fetola lephata la tsa melao ka mokgwa o rulaganngweng.
tgt_text: These plans advance the government’s approach to innovation in South Africa.

src_text: Leano leno le laela maphata puso gore tshwanetse go rebola jang dithendara tse di mabapi le ditirelo tsa molao go di neela ditlamo tsa babueledi; ka fao puso tla laolang madi a dirisiwang fa ya kgotlatshekelo; ka fao go ka tlhokomelwang bannaleseabe; go letlelela gore dithulaganyo le thekenoloji di dirisiwe ka bontsi jo bo kgonagalang..  Leano leno le samagana gape le go tlhatlhelela batho ka bokgoni jwa go diragatsa tiro ya go tlhatlhelela batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: The document will be made public through the Department of Science and Innovation’s (DSI) website: www.dst.gov.za.

src_text: Le tla thusa ditheo tsotlhe tsa puso mo ditirelong tsa puso tsa go isana kwa kgotlatshekelo.
tgt_text: National Strategy and Risk Assessment on Anti-Money Laundering, Counter Financing of Terrorism and Counter Financing of Proliferation (AML/CFT/CPF).

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula pula gape le dipholisi tse dingwe gape di le pedi tse di tshegetsang tiro ya go tsenya tirisong leano leno.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the country’s National Strategy on AML/CFT/CPF, together with the National Risk Assessment.

src_text: Pholisi e Buang ka go Loma Tsebe le go Rebolela Thendara ya Tiro ya go Isana kwa Kgotlatshekelo Dikgetse tsa Puso tla dira gore tiro ntshiwe ntle le go tsaya letlhakore mmogo le go dira gore go nne le diphetogo mo tirong e neelwang ditlamo tsa molao go sa kgonagaleng gore ka diriwa ke kantoro ya molao ya setheo seo sa puso.
tgt_text: The strategy was developed as response to the risk assessment prepared by all the relevant security and finance agencies.

src_text: Pholisi e buang ka go Tshwarisa, go Lwantshana le Ditatofatso le go Ganetsana le Ditatofatso kwa Kgotlatshekelo tla tlhalosa ka botlalo dikgato tse lefapha le le ntshitseng thendara le tshwanetseng go di tsaya mmogo le Kantoro ya Motlhankedimogolo wa Molao mo Pusong.
tgt_text: The operationalisation of this strategy – which provides three high-level goals with 13 strategic objectives – will involve law-enforcement agencies, intelligence agencies, financial and non-financial institutions, and private-sector representatives, among others.

src_text: Dipholisi ka bobedi jwa tsona – mmogo le dipholisi tse dingwe tse di neseditsweng pula ke Kabinete ka Ngwanaitseele 2021 mmogo le Molao wa Lekala la Ditirelo tsa Molao – di tla ema nokeng tiro ya go tsenya tirisong leano leno.
tgt_text: The implementation of the strategy will ensure the country strengthens its financial systems to support economic growth interventions by reducing levels of finance-related crimes.

src_text: Ditokomane tseno di tla dira bonnete jwa gore go nna le phetogo e utlwagalang mo go rarabololeng matsapa lekala la ditirelo tsa molao go dira gore go nne le kgolo e utlwagalang mo ikonoming ka ntlha ya dikgetse tsa Puso tsa go isana kwa kgotlatshekelo.
tgt_text: The strategy also responds to some of the 40 recommendations made after South Africa was assessed by the Financial Action Task Force, an intergovernmental policymaking body that strives to combat terrorist financing and money laundering globally.

src_text: Pholisi ya go Tlhokomela Maikarabelo Dikgetse tsa go Isana le Puso kwa Kgotlatshekelo.
tgt_text: The summarised two reports will be published on National Treasury’s website: www.treasury.gov.za.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Pholisi ya go Tlhokomela Maikarabelo Dikgetse tsa go Isana le Puso kwa Kgotlatshekelo leng yona e tlhagisang ditharabololo tse di ka dirisiwang mo go tlhokomeleng maikarabelo dikgetse tsa go isana le puso kwa kgotlatshekelo tlhagisa gore go tshwanetswe go tlhomiwe sefalanatshedimoso se segolo se le sengwe se se tla dirisiwang ke botlhe mmogo le ditsela tsa go abelana ka tshedimosetso mo go sona sefalana seno ya gore ke eng se se setseng se dirilwe mabapi le kgetse nngwe le nngwe e sekiwang.
tgt_text: Green Hydrogen Commercialisation Strategy (GHCS).

src_text: Pholisi eno letlelela gore go nne le dikgato tse di ka latelwang gore go tswalelwe kgetse e santseng butswe mme go se ko yang teng ka ntlha ya dikgato tse di senang bokao jo bo utlwagalang jwa tlhokomelo ya maikarabelo  Melaotlhomo.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the GHCS for public comments.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Naga wa Merero ya Metshameko le Boitapoloso wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: The strategy is aimed at ensuring that the country takes full advantage of the opportunities provided by green industrialisation.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Naga wa Merero ya Metshameko le Boitapoloso wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.
tgt_text: The GHCS will ensure South Africa becomes major producer and exporter of green hydrogen.

src_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa Molao wa Naga wa Merero ya Metshameko le Boitapoloso wa Ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 110 wa 1998)..  Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa dikarolo tse dingwe tsa ditlhaloso tsa molao ono mme gareng ga tse dingwe tsa ditsereganyo tse di tlhagisang tshitshinya gore go tlhomiwe Lekgotla la go Sekela Dikgetse tse di Amanang le Merero ya Metshameko tse di leng teng magareng ga ditheo tsa metshameko le tsa boitapoloso tlhagisa thulaganyo e tshwanetsweng go latelwa fa go tshwanetswe go tsewe karolo mo metshamekong e tla tshamekiwang mo maemong boditšhabatšhaba.
tgt_text: It contributes towards economic growth and supports the country’s just transition interventions towards the reduction of carbon emissions.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di neala gape Tona ya Metshameko, Botsweretshi le Setso maatla go ka kwala melawanataolo e tla emelelang batho ba ba palelwang ke go ikemelela gore le bona ba kgone go nna le seabe mo metshamekong le go sirelediwa gore ba se batliwe dikobo kgotsa go jewa ntshu.
tgt_text: South Africa already has the Hydrogen Strategy and the Hydrogen Society Roadmap adopted by Cabinet in.

src_text: Molaotlhomo wa Lekgotlakgaso la Aforika Borwa (SABC) wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: The rapidly growing green hydrogen market presents huge opportunities for South Africa.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo wa SABC wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore ye go sekasekiwa.
tgt_text: State Litigation Strategy for 2021 –.

src_text: Molaotlhomo yono ne wa phasaladiwa ka kgwedi ya Seetebosigo mo ngwageng wa 2021 gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the State Litigation Strategy for 2021 –.

src_text: Fa molaotlhomo yono sena go amogelwa ke Palamente gore jaanong ka nne ya nna molao, molaotlhomo yono tla tsena mo legatong la Molao wa Kgaso wa Ngwaga wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 4 wa 1999) yo dirisiwang ga jaanong go nna ona molao wa komang ka nna..  Gareng ga tse dingwe Molaotlhomo yono tshitshinya gore palo ya batlhankedi ba Maloko ao Seng Khuduthamaga mo Botong fokodiwe go tloga mo go ba le 12 gore nne ba le 11 mmogo le go fokotsa palo ya batlhankedi ba Maloko Khuduthamaga mo Botong go tloga mo go ba le bararo gore nne ba le babedi.
tgt_text: The strategy seeks to drive the transformation of the legal profession in systematic manner.

src_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalolotse le dikarolo tse di mabapi le ka fao sebopego se se busang SABC se tshwanetsweng go rulaganngwa ka teng mmogo le ka fao se tshwanetsweng go tlamelwa matlole ka gone.
tgt_text: It guides on how the State will distribute legal work to legal practitioners; manage the costs of the litigation; guides the management of stakeholders; provides for the maximisation of the use of technology and systems..

src_text: Molaotlhomo wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Phimola Molao wa Puso ya Transkei wa go Tlhaolwa Kgomo.
tgt_text: The strategy also addresses the development of human capacity management and development.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Phimola Molao wa Puso ya Transkei wa go Tlhaolwa Kgomo gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.
tgt_text: It will be applicable to litigation services of the State from all spheres of government.

src_text: Molaotlhomo yono phimola Molao wa Puso ya Transkei wa go Tlhaolwa Kgomo wa Ngwaga wa 1983 (Molao wa bo 9 wa 1983) yo neng wa dira gore molao wa botlhokotsebe nne selo se se tshelang mo pusong ya mo malobeng ya Transkei ga jaanong itseweng ka gore ke porofense ya Kapa Botlhaba)..  Molaotlhomoyo tshitshinngwang ono letla gore molao yo dirisiwang ke dikgotlatshekolo ga jaana nne ona tsenang mo legatong la melao e neng dirisiwa ke puso ya mo malobeng ya Transkei gore tsamaisane le dikgotlatshekelo tsa naga go dira gore re nne seoposengwe..  Molao wa Puso ya Transkei wa go Tlhaolwa Kgomo thulana le molao yo dirisiwang ga jaaka ka fa nageng go samagana le botlhokotsebe mo dikarolong tse di farologaneng ka fa nageng jaaka laola selo se le sengwe se se tshwanang le seo molao yono se laolang.
tgt_text: Cabinet also approved the two additional policies to support the implementation of this strategy.

src_text: Go fedisiwa ga molao yono go tla dira gore melao ya puso ya tlhaolele e santseng le teng le gompieno mo mafelo mo malobeng neng bediwa Puso ya Transkei fedisiwe mme go fetolwe ditsela tsa go samagana le melato go neng go samaganwa le yona ka molao yono.
tgt_text: The Briefing and Outsourcing of State Legal work Policy will introduce an element of fairness and drive the transformational allocation of litigation services that cannot be performed internally.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo.
tgt_text: The Initiating, Defending and Opposing of Matters Policy will provide clarity on processes to be followed by client departments and the Office of Solicitor-General.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.
tgt_text: The two policies – together with the other policies that were approved by Cabinet in November 2021 and the Legal Sector Code – will support the implementation of this strategy.

src_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa Karolo ya bo 6 ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 go dira gore Puo ya Diatla ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa gore go nne mo molaong semmuso gore le yona ke nngwe ya dipuo tsa naga.
tgt_text: These documents will ensure meaningful transformational intervention in the legal sector and also ensure the economies of scale in litigation matters that involve the State.

src_text: Mo kgweding ya Motsheganong monongwaga wa 2022 Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa le tsa go tsibosa setšhaba ka Molaotlhomo yono, mme bobedi ditiragalo tseno di ne tsa gatisiwa mo lekwalong la go gatisa Melao ya puso mo kgweding ya Phukwi gona monongwagwa wa.
tgt_text: Management of State Litigation Contingent Liability Policy.

src_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Botlhokotsebe (wa go Lwantshana le Ditiro tsa Petelelo le Melato ya Mothale oo) wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the State Litigation Contingent Liability Policy, which provides mechanisms to manage state litigation contingent liability.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Molaotlhomo yono gore setšhaba se ntshe se se mo mafatlheng sona ka ga ona.
tgt_text: It provides for the creation of central database and the reporting mechanism on the following-up of the cases in this database.

src_text: Molaotlhomo yono phimola Molao wa Ditlolo tsa Molao wa Thobalano mo pusong ya tlhaolele neng bediwa gore ke Molao wa Maitshwaro a Tswileng mo Tseleng) wa Ngwaga wa 1957 (Molao wa bo 23 wa 1957).
tgt_text: The policy provides for the mechanism to close dormant case files that were resulting in unreliable contingent liability figures in respect of accountability  Bills.

src_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa gape le Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditiro tsa Botlhokotsebe (wa go Lwantshana le Ditiro tsa Petelelo le Melato ya Mothale oo) wa Ngwaga wa 2007 (Molao wa bo 32 wa 2007) ka go dira gore fa batho ba bagolo ba rekisetsana ditiro tsa thobalano tiro eo se nne tlolo ya molao.
tgt_text: National Sport and Recreation Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Ditshitshinyo tse di leng mo Molaotlhomong yono di samagana le lenaane la dintlha tse di tshitshintsweng mo Kgaolong ya boraro ya Leano la Naga la go Loga Maano mo Mererong ya go Lwantshana le go Bogisiwa le go Bolawa ga Basadi (GBVF) (kgaolo eno bua ka go Sireletsa Setšhaba, go se Babalela le go se Phimolakeledi),mme di tla dira gore lephata lotlhe la go samagana le botlhokotsebe le phimolakeledi le dirisane mmogo gore le kgone go sireletsa, go babalela le go phimola keledi batho ba ba fetileng mo mathateng GBVF, mmogo le go dira gore ditlhokotsebe tse di amegang di digame di sa di tlhapela.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the National Sport and Recreation Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: Ka gang fa molaotlhomo ono amogelwa go nna molao tla emelela batho ba ba rekisang mebele mo ditirelong tsa thobalano gore ba se tlhole ba bogisiwa le go jewa ntshu.
tgt_text: The Bill amends the National Sport and Recreation Act, of 1998 (Act 110 of 1998).

src_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Poso ya Aforika Borwa (SAPO).
tgt_text: The Bill has already been published for public consultation.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa SAPO gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.
tgt_text: The Bill also amends certain definitions and amongst other interventions, it proposes the establishment of the Sports Arbitration Tribunal to resolve disputes between sport or recreation bodies.

src_text: Molaotlhomo yono, yo neseditsweng pula gore ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona mo ngwageng ono kwa tshimologong kwalola sešwa Molao wa SAPO wa Ngwaga wa 2011 (Molao wa bo 22 wa 2011).
tgt_text: It outlines procedures to be followed for bidding for international events.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di batla go dira gore SAPO mo ditirelong tsa yona tsa go tsamaisa merwalo simolole go dirisa dithekenoloji tse di dirisiwang mo lephateng la go tsamaisa merwalo tse di leng teng mmogo le go godisa tiro ya yona.
tgt_text: The proposed amendments also empower the Minister of Sport, Arts and Culture to make regulations for vulnerable groups to participate in sport and be protected from any form of sexual abuse or exploitation.

src_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di tsamaisana le Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela sa Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga Kgolaganngo ya Thekenoloji ya Didirisiwa tsa Tshedimosetso le Ditlhaeletsano ya Ngwaga wa  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: South African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC) Bill of.

src_text: Foramo ya Lefatshe ya Merero ya Saense (WSF) ya Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the SABC Bill of 2022 for processing.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tla dirisa Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi go tshwarela WSF kwa Cape Town International Convention Centre go simolola ka la bo 06 go fitlha ka la bo 09 Sedimonthole 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Re Dirisa Saense go Phimola Baagi Keledi”..  Foramo eno ke nngwe ya dirala tseo di di gogang kwa pele mo lefatsheng tseo di rotloetsang gore go nne le dipuisano mabapi le gore saense tshwanetse go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa mo setšhabeng sa rona.
tgt_text: The Bill was published for public comment in June.

src_text: Leno ke letsholo le le simolotsweng ke mekgatlho ya lefatshe ya saense mme bile gape le tsenyeletsa le Mokgatlho wa Dinagakopano (UN) wa Merero ya Thuto, Saense le Setso..  Baeteledipele ba ba itsegeng mo lefatsheng ba tla atlhaatlha ditlhogo tse di farologaneng tse di tsenyeletsang le tse di buang ka go dirisa saense go busetsa batho seriti; go dirisa saense go baakanya maemo loapi, go dirisa saense mo mererong ya botipolomate go dira gore naga nne le botsalano jo bo edileng le dinaga tse dingwe tsa boditšhaba, mmogo le go dirisa saense mo mererong ya Aforika le ya lefatshe ka bophara..  Dikopano di le dintsinyana tsa ka fa thoko le tse di tla tshwariwang ka mafaratlhatlha dikgokagano di tla tshwariwa ka go latelana, mme tse dingwe tsa tsona di tla tshwariwa ke mokgatlho wa Kopano ya Kgothakgothe ya Batho ba Aforika ya Barutegi ba Aforika mo Mererong ya Saense mme ponelopele ya mokgatlho ono ke go fetola matshelo batho mo kontinenteng ya Aforika ka go dirisa saense.
tgt_text: Once the Bill is passed into law by Parliament, the current Broadcasting Act, 1999 (Act 4 of 1999) will be repealed.

src_text: Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya AIDS.
tgt_text: The Bill amongst others proposes reducing the size of non-executive Board members from 12 to 11 and the executive members from three to two.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla keteka le lefatshe mmogo le go nna le seabe mo ditiragalong tsa go bontsha tlotlo Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya AIDS ka la bo 01 Sedimonthole 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Dira Gore Maemo Batho Lekalekane le go Golagana mo Mererong ya go Fedisa AIDS”.
tgt_text: It revised the governance structure and funding model of the SABC.

src_text: Mokete wa tlotlo o tla tshwarelwang kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Dr Petrus Molemela kwa Bloemfontein mo porofenseng ya Foreistata mo go ona batho botlhe ba tla gakololwa gore ba tshwanetse go nna le maikarabelo ka go dira bonnete jwa gore ba itlhatlhoba gore ba itse gore ba phetse sentle kgotsa jang leng seo se tla ba thusang gore ba tsaye ditshweetso ka maikarabelo..  Mokete ono tshwariwa mo nakong eo Aforika Borwa ipaakanyetsang go thankgolola letsholo la go lekelela moento wa melemo ya thibelotshwaetso (PrEP) mo tshimologong ya ngwaga yo tlang, jaaka Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Merero ya Boitekanelo (WHO) eleditse tiriso ya molemo ono.
tgt_text: Repeal of the Transkeian Penal Code Bill of.

src_text: Moento ono wa PrEP o tla tshwanelwang ke go tlhabiwa kgwedi nngwe le nngwe ka kgona go thibela bontsi jo bo kanaka batho ba le 52 000 go ka tshwaediwa ke HIV..  Letsatsi la Poelano.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Repeal of the Transkeian Penal Code Bill of 2022 for further processing.

src_text: Ka Labotlhano, 16 Sedimonthole 2022 naga tla keteka Letsatsi la Poelano go gagamatsa maikano rona mabapi le go nna seoposenngwe le go aga setšhaba.
tgt_text: The Bill repeals the Transkeian Penal Code, 1983 (Act 9 of 1983) which codified criminal law in the former Transkei (now Eastern Cape).

src_text: Ngwaga yo mongwe le yo mongwe re bona tšhono ya go kopana le go boelana le go itshwarelana mo diphosong tseo di dirilweng mo nakong e fetileng le go aga setšhaba se se ntšhwa..  Leeto la rona le re sa bolong go le thankgolola fa re ne re iponela kgololesego le temokerasi mo ngwageng wa 1994 le re bontshitse gore ga go na pelaelo epe gore fa re le ngatananngwe jaaka setšhaba re na le maatla le go feta.
tgt_text: The proposed Bill extends the current application of common laws to the former Republic of Transkei in line with our unitary system of the country’s judicial system..

src_text: Maitlhomo rona re le maAforika Borwa tshwanetse go nna mabapi le go tsholetsa dikgato tsa go aga setšhaba le go nna ngatana le nngwe..  Rotlhe re ka kgona go dira gore isago ya rona le batho ba bangwe botlhe nne e botoka go gaisa gompieno ka go dira ka natla gore re nne le setšhaba se se itumelelang go buisana fa go na le se ba sa utlwaneng ka sona, se se ipopang ngatana le nngwe, se se tlotlomatsang dikgato tsa go aga setšhaba le go keteka go farologana ga sona.
tgt_text: The Transkeian Penal Code is in conflict with the current common criminal law that regulates the same subject matter in different parts of the country.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo bathong botlhe go dirisana sentle mmogo re le setšhaba, mme re kopanye maatla rona gore re kgone go aga setšhaba sa Aforika Borwa se se tshwaraganeng bile se dira bontle.
tgt_text: This repeal will remove the continued existence of apartheid-era legislation in the areas that were formerly known as the Republic of Transkei and provide the transitional arrangements on matters dealt with by this code.

src_text: Letsholo la Naga la go Thibela Botsofe.
tgt_text: Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Lefapha la Thuso ya Baagi le tla tshwara Letsholo la Naga la go Thibela Botsofe kwa Germiston, Gauteng go tloga ka la bo 5 go fitlha ka la bo 7 Sedimonthole.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: Letsholo leno le kopanya batsofe go tswa mo diporofenseng tsotlhe di le robongwe mme maitlhomo lona ke go dira gore batsofe ba tshele botshelo jo ba ikatisang gore ba kgone go nna le seabe mo metseng ba tswang mo go yona..  Letsholo la Naga la go Thibela Botsofe le tla bula ka dipuisano ka go letlelela batsofe gore ba thube seo se leng mo dipelong tsa bona ka go bua ka matsapa ao ba kopanang le ona mo matshelong bona.
tgt_text: The Bill amends Section 6 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 to recognise South African Sign Language as one of the official languages.

src_text: Seno se tla latelwa ke Metshameko e Monate mo batsofe ba tla ntshang bokgoni jwa bona mo metshamekong ya diatleletiki..  Molao wa Batsofe wa Ngwaga wa 2006 (Molao wa bo 13 wa 2006) gatelela botlhokwa jwa go tlhokomela le go tsholetsa ditshwanelo tsa batsofe, tlotlo ya bona, maemo bona, seriti sa bona, pabalesego ya bona, tlhokomelo ya bona le boitekanelo jwa bona.
tgt_text: In May 2022, Cabinet approved the publication and giving of notice to this Bill, which together with the notice were subsequently gazetted in July.

src_text: Ka mafoko ano, Kabinete ikuela mo baaging botlhe mo setšhabeng go tlhokomela batsofe, go ba tlotla le go ba ema nokeng, segolo jang fa le gore ba boga, ba tshwarwa makgwakgwa, ga ba tlhokomelwe bile ba itemogela ditiragalo tsa GBV  MelaetsaMelaetsa ya go Akgola.
tgt_text: Criminal Law (Sexual Offences and Related Matters) Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Kabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: • Bafenyi ba Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa SADC.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of this Bill for public comments.

src_text: Rre Sandile Stevenson Ndlovu wa Lekwalodikgang la Sunday Times jaaka fentse maemo ntlha jaaka motsei wa ditshwantsho wa maemo a kwa godimo, Mme Zinhle Makhosazane Mugabe wa lekgotlakaso la SABC jaaka fentse maemo bobedi mo kgasong ya dithelebišene mmogo le Mme Melinda Shaw wa Makasine wa Dikgang tsa Dikgogo jaaka fentse maemo boraro mo makwalong a gatisiwang.Melaetsa ya Matshediso.
tgt_text: It repeals the Sexual Offences Act (previously Immorality Act), 1957 (Act 23 of 1957).

src_text: Kabinete romela matshediso yona kwa ba lelapa le ditsala tsa:• Rre John Henry Ernstzen, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 82, yo neng le segatlhamelamasisi mo mererong ya mekgatlho ya badiri le ya dipolotiki yo gape dirileng le mo pusong jaaka moeletsi wa Tona ya Tirelo le Tsamaiso ya Puso, Ngaka Zola Skweyiya ne gape direla Khomišene ya Tirelo ya Puso le Motlatsamonnasetulo mmogo le go direla Khomišene ya Ditirelo tsa Baatlhodi ba Dikgotlatshekelo.• Vho-Rashaka Frank Ratshitanga, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 89, yo neng le segatlhamelamasisi mo mererong ya go lwantshana le puso ya tlhaolele yo neng bogisiwa thata ke Mapodisi Puso ya Tlhaolele.
tgt_text: It also repeals Section 11 of the Criminal Law (Sexual Offenses and Related Matters) Amendment Act, 2007 (Act 32 of 2007) to decriminalise the sale and purchase of adult sexual services.

src_text: Jaaka le mokwadi yo dibuka tsa gagwe di phasaladitsweng, tse dingwe tsa dibuka tse dintsi tsa dipoko tse di phasaladitseng di ne tsa tseewa gore di dirisiwe kwa dikolong go ruta baithuti ba dikolo tse di godimo.
tgt_text: The proposals of this Bill respond to the list of interventions proposed in Pillar 3 (Protection, Safety and Justice) of the National Strategic Plan on GBVF, which enjoins the criminal justice system to provide protection, safety and justice for survivors of GBVF, and to effectively hold perpetrators accountable for their actions.

src_text: Morago ga ngwaga wa 1994 ne direla Ntlo ya Limpopo ya Theomolao ne neelwa Kabo ya Tlotla ya Baobab e betlilweng ka boronse mo leboga “go ikentsha setlhabelo ga gagwe ka go dira ka boineelo mo go emeng kgatlhanong le ditiro tse di busula tsa tsa tlhaolele mmogo le go nneng le seabe ga gagwe mo go ageng Aforika Borwa”  Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: Once passed into law, it will amongst others protect sex workers against abuse and exploitation.

src_text: Mme Funani Josephine Malatsi yo thapilweng go nna Motlhankedimogolo wa Matlole kwa Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo..  Ngaka Marcia Mabel Socikwa thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo lekaleng la Thuto le Katiso kwa Diyunibesiti mo Lefapheng la Ditheo tse Dikgolwane tsa Thuto le Katiso..  Ngaka Lisolomzi Assaph Fikizolo thapilwe go nna DDG: mo lekaleng la Mawatle le Mabopo Mawatle mo Lefapheng la Merero ya Dikgwa, ya Botshwaro jwa Ditlhapi le ya Tikologo..  Mme Boipuso Mmasediba Modise thapilwe go nna DDG: mo lekaleng la Dipholisi tsa Ikonomi mo Lefapheng la Matlotlo Naga..  Ngaka Kefiloe Doris Masiteng thapilwe go nna Mokwaledi mo lekaleng la Togo ya Maano mo Lefapheng la Tiromaano, Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Tiro..  Mme Jodi-Lynne Scholtz thapilwe go nna Mokhomišenara wa Khomišene ya Naga ya Dilotho..  Ngaka Phakamani Buthelezi thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) mo Botong ya Metsi ya Overberg (Konteraka ya gagwe ntšhwafaditswe)..  Ngaka Bongani Andy Mabaso thapilwe go nna CEO mo Setheong sa Puso sa Thekenoloji ya Tshedimosetso.
tgt_text: South African Post Office (SAPO) Amendment Bill.

src_text: Ngaka Gibson Mashilo Simon Boloka thapilwe go nna CEO mo Botong ya Ditshwantsho tsa Difilimi le tsa Makwalokgatiso (FPB).
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the SAPO Amendment Bill to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: Rre Mandisi Nkuhlu thapilwe go nna CEO mo Koporasing ya Inšorense ya Dikoloto tsa Diromelwantle.
tgt_text: The Bill, which was approved for public consultation early this year, amends the SAPO Act, 2011 (Act 22 of 2011).

src_text: Kabinete dumelane le ditshwetso tsa go thapa batho ba ba latelang:.
tgt_text: The proposed amendments seek to enable the SAPO to adapt to the technological developments in the courier-service space and expand its mandate.

src_text: Setheo sa Melao ya go Laola Dithulaganyo tsa go Agela Setšhaba Dintlo  Rre Sandile Luthuli thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo).
tgt_text: The changes are in line with the National Integrated Information and Communications Technology Policy White Paper of  Upcoming events.

src_text: Boto ya Setlamo sa Setheo sa Ditsela tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa  Rre Themba Barrange Mhambi thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Robert Alderman Haswell thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Thamsanqa Piet Matosa thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Refilwe Buthelezi; mmogo lee.
tgt_text: 2022 World Science Forum (WSF).

src_text: Mme Noluphumzo Leonora Noxaka.
tgt_text: South Africa will, through the DSI, host the WSF at the Cape Town International Convention Centre Cape from 6 to 9 December 2022 under the theme: “Science for Social Justice”.

src_text: Bakaedi bao seng ba khuduthamaga kwa Setheong sa Ditirelo tsa Taolo le Phofiso ya Difofane  Rre Zola Majavu thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Khulile Sympathy Boqwana  Mme Nomathemba Kubheka thapilwe sešwa)  Mogeneralemogolo Nhlanhla Lucky Ngema thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Christiaan Rudolph Burger thapilwe sešwa)  Ngaka Malindi Joy Neluheni  Rre Muhammed Ameen Ebrahim Amod  Rre Siyabonga Gcina Kudumela  Mme Precious Nompumelelo Sibiya; mmogo lej.
tgt_text: The forum is one of the leading global platforms that encourage dialogue on the role science should play in society.

src_text: Mme Princess Mngoma.
tgt_text: It is an initiative of global science organisations that also include the UN Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation.

src_text: Boto ya Koporasi ya Motlakase wa Nyutlelia ya Aforika Borwa  Rre David Nicholls thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Leshoene Joseph Shayi thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Senamile Masango thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Elsie Monale thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Charles Leornad Mavuso  Rre Hilton Darryl Lazarus  Rre Ashley Latchu  Ngaka Mosidi Makgae  Rre Suren Maharaj; mmogo lej.
tgt_text: Renowned thought leaders will be debating various topics that include science for human dignity; science for climate justice, science diplomacy for multilateralism, and science for Africa and the world number of side and satellite events will take place concurrently, and some of them will be hosted by the General Assembly of the African Academy of Sciences Pan-African organisation whose vision is to transform lives on the African continent through science.

src_text: Mme Bessie Makgopa thapilwe sešwa go nna tokololo e tsenang mo legatong la yo mongwe fa se teng).
tgt_text: World AIDS Day.

src_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Matlole go Tshegetsa Maano Merero ya Leokwane  Rre Sipho Mkhize thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Mmete Petrus Fusi  Mme Nosizwe Nokwe-Macamo  Mme Mary-Jane Morifi  Mme Samela Titus-Nabe thapilwe sešwa); mmogo lef.
tgt_text: South Africa will join the world in observing and participating in activities to mark the annual World AIDS Day on 1 December 2022 under the theme: “Equalise and Integrate to End AIDS”.

src_text: Rre Sechaba Thole thapilwe sešwa).
tgt_text: The national commemoration event that will be held at the Dr Petrus Molemela Stadium in Bloemfontein in the Free State will be used to remind everyone to be responsible by getting to know their health status so as to make informed life decisions.

src_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Isimangaliso Wetland Park  Rre Israel Mabhudu Tembe thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Mme Thulile Memory Sosibo thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo)  Rre Peter Christopher Small thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Gonesagren Ganesh Nair thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Maureen Sibusisiwe Ngcobo  Mme Nombuso Mlambo  Rre Boy Daniel Ngobeni; mmogo leh.
tgt_text: The commemoration comes as South Africa prepares to begin piloting the injectable pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) early next year, which is recommended by the World Health Organisation.

src_text: Rre Bongani Mzwakhe Mhlongo.
tgt_text: The PrEP injection, to be taken every other month, could prevent as many as 52 000 new HIV infections.

src_text: Ditokololo tsa Lekgotla la Madirelo Dikago  Mme Holovisa Amelia Mtshali thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)b. Mme Vangile Petronella Nene  Rre Anele Mahlawe  Mme Elizabeth Faith Nyaka  Mme Tinyiko Laurel Palesa Shipalana  Mme Mandisa Princess Pepeta-Daki  Ngaka Sitsabo Dlamini thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Thembinkosi Cedric Madikane  Mme Molefi Kubuzie  Rre Christopher Kobla Gavor  Rre Ngwako Edward Hutamo thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Chris Steynberg  Rre Ashley Latchu thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Ditaba Maraka thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Sinehlanhla Mthembu thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Salome Mabilane  Mme Snowy Makhudu  Ngaka Khangwelo Desmond Musetsho  Mme Modiehi Elisa Molebatsi  Rre Craig Silva  Rre Tshepo Albia Monakedi; mmogo lev.
tgt_text: Reconciliation Day.

src_text: Mme Seemole Angela Mohopo.
tgt_text: On Friday, 16 December 2022, the nation will celebrate Reconciliation Day to reaffirm our commitment to unity and nation-building.

src_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Metsi sa Magalies  Ngaka Keneilwe Sebego thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Mme Yvonne Malebo Motolong thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo)  Rre Stanley Ngobeni  Mme Yongama Pamla  Mme Priscilla Nomsa Mashaba  Ngaka Mosidi Makgae  Rre Muzuvukile Wiseman Mkhize  Mme Tebogo Magogodi Elizabeth Malaka thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Rudolph Martin Le Roux; mmogo lej.
tgt_text: Each year we have an opportunity to reach out to one another to deal with our past, reconcile and build new nation going forward.

src_text: Rre Itumeleng Mosala.
tgt_text: Our journey since the advent of freedom and democracy in 1994 has decisively shown that we are stronger as nation when we are united.

src_text: Bakomišenara ba Khomišene ya Taolo ya Melao ya Metsia.
tgt_text: Our goal as South Africans should be to promote inclusive nation-building and social cohesion.

src_text: Mme Davishinee Padayachee  Mme Mampiti Matsabu  Mme Nolubabalo Sondlo  Mme Karen van der Merwe  Rre Rolfe Eberhard  Ngaka Binganidzo Muchara  Rre John Alexander Conolly  Mme Karen Breytenbach  Rre Junior Potloane  Rre Itumeleng Brian Modiba; mmogo lek.
tgt_text: Together we can build better tomorrow for all by striving to ensure nation that encourages dialogue, fosters social cohesion, embraces nation-building and celebrates its diverse culture.

src_text: Mme Ntombokuqala Nokulunga Mnqeta.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on everyone to work together as nation, and harness our collective strengths to build united and prosperous South Africa.

src_text: Bakaedi bao Seng ba Khuduthamaga mo Botong ya Bankatlhabololo ya Dinaga tsa Borwa jwa Aforika  Mme Martie Jansen van Rensburg thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Dinao Lerutla  Mme Tasneem Essop  Rre Kenneth Brown; mmogo lee.
tgt_text: National Active Ageing Programme.

src_text: Rre Ebrahim Rasool.
tgt_text: The Department of Social Development will host the National Active Ageing Programme in Germiston, Gauteng from 5 to 7 December.

src_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Pabalesego ya kwa Mawatleng (SAMSA)  Rre Tau Morwe thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo).
tgt_text: The programme brings all nine provinces together and is aimed at promoting the independent and healthy lifestyle of older persons to ensure that they actively participate in their communities.

src_text: Ditokololo tsa Setheo sa Banamedi ba Diterene sa Aforika Borwa (Prasa)  Mme Sibongile Luthuli; mmogo leb.
tgt_text: The National Active Ageing Programme will open with national dialogue to allow older persons to engage on pertinent matters affecting them.

src_text: Moatefokate Johnny Motlogelwa.
tgt_text: This will be followed by the Golden Games where older persons will showcase their athletic abilities.

src_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Merero ya Leokwane  Rre Satish Roopa thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Mme Carmen Mpelwane  Ngaka Salome Chiloane-Nwabueze; mmogo led.
tgt_text: The Older Persons Act, 2006 (Act 13 of 2006) emphasises the importance of the protection and promotion of the rights, dignity, status, integrity, safety, security and well-being of older persons.

src_text: Rre Xolile Sizani.
tgt_text: In this regard, Cabinet calls upon all communities to care, respect and support older persons, especially against abuse, ill-treatment, neglect and GBV  MessagesCongratulations.

src_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Metsi sa Trans-Caledon Tunnel  Mme Precious Nompumelelo Sibiya thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Gerald Dumas thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo)  Rre Gregory Nigel Joseph White  Mme Zelda Ncedekile-Tshabalala  Mme Vidhu Nardev Vedalankar  Rre Neo Mooketsi Tladinyane  Mme Mmanare Evelyn Mamabolo  Rre Patrick Roy Mnisi; mmogo lei.
tgt_text: Cabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to:Prize winners of the 2022 SADC Media Awards.

src_text: Puo ya Maemo Setšhaba (SoNA).
tgt_text: Mulaedza wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Lushaka (SoNA).

src_text: Kabinete boeletsa mafoko ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa mo boikuelong jwa gagwe jo bo dirileng mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba (SoNA) ya ngwaga wa 2023 mo ikuetseng mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe go tshwarisana tiro mmogo le go dira bonnete jwa gore go se nne le ope yo ba mo tlogelang kwa morago fa go samaganwe le dikgwetlho tse di boima tse naga ya rona tobaneng natso.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza khuwelelo ye Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vha ita kha Mulaedza wavho wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Lushaka wa ṅwaha wa 2023 ya uri hu vhe na tshumisano kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe na uri hu si vhe na ane salela murahu zwenezwo musi hu tshi khou lingedzwa tandulula khaedu dzine shango ḽashu ḽa khou ṱangana nadzo.

src_text: Dikgato tse di sa tseweng ke phefo tsa ga moporesitente di beile kwa pele maano puso monongwaga go samagana le motlakase o tshabetseng ruri le go dira gore re se tlhole re sokodisiwa ke tlhaelo ya motlakase..  Kabinete ikuela mo maphateng otlhe setšhaba sa rona go ema nokeng matsholo otlhe go boletsweng ka ona mo puong ya SoNA ya Moporesitente, go nne botlhokwa mo go maswe mo go fokotseng botlhokatiro, tshokolo le ditlhwatlhwa tse di goletseng ruri tsa go reka dilo tse batho ba iphedisang ka tsona mmogo le go lwantshana le botlhokotsebe le bonweenwee.

Puso tloga ikemiseditse go potlakisa tiro go setseng go samaganwe le yona ya go oketsa motlakase ka fa nageng mme tiro re tobaneng le yona ke go sutisa sengwe le sengwe se se kgoreletsang gore seno se diragale.
tgt_text: Maga aya khwaṱhaho Phresidennde ndi ane vhea mafhungo zwa fulufulu phanḓa kha pulane dza shuma dza muvhuso kha uno ṅwaha itela lwa tshoṱhe na zwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana khathihi na swikela nyimele ya nḓisedzo ya fulufulu ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Fela jaaka Moporesitente Ramaphosa setse tlhalositse mo go SoNA ya gagwe, mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di tlang, ditlhotshwana tsa ditirelo tsa puso di tla abelana ka tshedimosetso ka botlalo ka ga Leano la Dikgato tse Puso tla di Tsayang (PoA) mo ngwageng yo re lebileng.
Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya Naga le yona ka Laboraro, 22 Tlhakole 2023 tla abelana ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng ka ga merero ya PoA.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza sekhithara dzoṱhe dza tshitshavha uri dzi tikedze maga sumbedziswaho kha SoNA nga Phresidennde ane vha maga ndeme kha ita uri ri kone bvela phanḓa na ndingedzo dzashu dza fhungudza shayea ha mishumo, vhushai khathihi na zwa engedzea ha mitengo ya zwirengwa hu tshi katelwa na fhelisa vhugevhenga na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.

src_text: Kopano Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika ya Ngwaga wa.

Kabinete sekegetse tsebe dintlha tse di tšhotlhilweng kwa Kopanong Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika e neng tshwaretswe kwa Cape Town International Convention Centre go tloga ka la bo 6 go fitlha ka la bo 9 Tlhakole 2023 mo molaetsamogolo neng re: “Go Bulela Dipeeletso mo Meepong ya Aforika: Go Tlisa Tsetsepelo, Polokesego le Tlamelo e sa Kgaotseng”.
tgt_text: Muvhuso wo ḓiimisela engedza luvhilo kha mishumo ine ya vha kati zwazwino itela uri hu vhe na engedzea ha nḓisedzo ya fulufulu kha sisteme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya lushaka nahone vhuḓifhinduleli hashu ndi fhelisa zwikhukhulisi zwoṱhe zwine zwa ri ima phanḓa kha swikela mvelaphanḓa yeneyo.

src_text: Kopano Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika tsenetswe ke beng ba meepo go tswa mo kontinenteng le mo lefatsheng ka bophara bile itiretse leina ka go itsege jaaka khonferense e di gogang kwa pele mo dipeeletsong tsa meepo mo kontinenteng.

Moepo tswelela go nna le seabe se segolo mo go tliseng tlhabologo le mo go ageng diintaseteri mo kontinenteng ka bophara botlhokwa thata fa go tla mo go tlholeng ditiro le mo go direng gore batho ba se latlhegelwe ke ditiro bile ke ona o dirileng gore go nne le ditiro di ka nna halofo ya milione mo meepong le ditiro tse dingwe di ka nna milione tse di ikokotletseng ka ditiro tsa meepo mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Kha vhege dzi si gathi dzi ḓaho, miṱangano ya zwigwada zwa mihasho kwameaho ḓo ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo nga ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Mashumele (PoA) ya muvhuso kha ṅwaha tevhelaho sa zwe zwa sumbedziswa nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa kha mulaedza wavho wa SoNA.

src_text: Dilo tse di tlhagisitsweng mo meepong ya Aforika Borwa mo ngwageng yo fetileng di fitlhile kwa mankalankaleng mo di dirileng bokanaka  18 trilione, tsa godisa dilo tse di tlhagisiwang ka fa nageng, ditlhagisiwa tsa naga ya rona tse di rekisediwang dinaga tsa boditšhaba mmogo le letseno la rona.
tgt_text: Mugaganyagwama wa Lushaka une wa ḓo ṋetshedzwa nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 22 Luhuhi 2023 ḓo ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa zwinzhi nga ha PoA ya muvhuso..   Indaba ya zwa Migodi ya ḽa Afrika ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba nang le seabe mo intasetering eno go tswelela go tshwarisana tiro le puso gore re kgone go nna le intaseteri e itsegeng mo lefatsheng e kgonang go ema nokeng kgolo ya ikonomi, go tlhola ditiro le go tlisa tlhabololo e tsepameng.
