tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha mawanwa Indaba ya zwa Migodi ya ḽa Afrika ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Sentharani ya zwa Miṱangano ya Dzitshaka ya Cape Town bva nga ḽa 6 swika ḽa 9 Luhuhi 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U bvukulula Vhubindudzi ha zwa Migodi ya ḽa Afrika: Vhudziki, Tsireledzo na Nḓisedzo”..   Indaba ya zwa Migodi ya ḽa Afrika yo kuvhanganya fhethu huthihi zwiimiswa zwi shelaho mulenzhe kha nḓowetshumo iyi bva kha dzhango ḽa Afrika na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nga angaredza he ya fhedza nga khwaṱhisa vhuimo hayo ha vha muṱangano muhulwane wa vhubindudzi kha zwa migodi kha dzhango.

src_text: Merwalela.
tgt_text: Migodi khou bvela phanḓa na shela mulenzhe muhulwane kha zwa mveledziso na vhubveledzanḓowetshumo kha dzhango ḽoṱhe.

src_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa malapeng bao ba latlhegetsweng ke ba malapa bona mo merwaleleng ya mo malobanyaneng e gogotseng mafelo le mantsinyana ka fa nageng..  Re leboga go menagane go ba ditirelo tsa tshoganyetso go ralala le naga ya rona ba ba neng ba tshwere phage ka dingana go pholosa matshelo batho.
tgt_text: Ndi nḓowetshumo ine ya shela mulenzhe wa ndeme kha sikwa na vhulungwa ha mishumo, hune ya sika mishumo ya vhukuma swikaho hafu ya miḽioni khathihi na miṅwe ya nga thungo swikaho miḽioni fhano Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Re le naga tla re ipopeng seoposengwe mme re tswe thuso bao ba tlhokang tlhokomelo le kemonokeng.

Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging gore ba nne ka fa dintlong fa pula tshologa le fa go na le merwalela, mmogo le go gakolola bao ba nnang mo mafelong ao metsi tamang mo go ona fa pula nele thata gore ba itlhokomele..  Baagi ba elediwa gore ba se tsamaele gaufi le mo metsi mantsi sianang ka lobelo, ba se thumele mo go ona kgotsa ba se kgabaganye mo metsing ano ka dijanaga tsa bona kgotsa gona go leka go kgabaganya ditsela, maborogo le dinoka mo metsi tletseng.
tgt_text: Ṅwaha wo fhelaho vhubveledzi ha zwa migodi fhano Afrika Tshipembe ho swika kha rekhodo ya nṱhesa ya masheleni linganaho  18 triḽioni, zwe hezwi zwa engedza zwibveledzwa zwashu zwa fhano hayani, thundu dzine dza rengiselwa nnḓa khathihi na mbuelo.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go dira bonnete jwa gore ka gale bana ba bona ba bolokesegile bile ga go na kgonagalo ya gore ba ka gogolwa ke metsi fa go na le merwalela..  Tirisodikgoka ka Ditlhobolo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhoṱhe vha kwameaho kha nḓowetshumo iyi ya uri vha bvele phanḓa na shumisana na muvhuso itela bveledza nḓowetshumo ya maimo nṱha ḽifhasini nahone ine ya engedza nyaluwo ya ikonomi sika mishumo khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso yona kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga seopedi sa mmino wa hip-hop Rre Kiernan Forbes, yo tumileng thata ka leina la AKA, mmogo le ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga tsala ya gagwe yo neng le seapei se se tumileng bong Rre Tebello Motsoane, bao bobedi bo jelweng ka tlhobolo kwa Durban..  Kabinete batla gape le go romela matshediso yona kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga molwelakgaratlho ya go lwantshana le bosenyi bong Rre Ayob Mungalee, yo mo malobanyaneng jelweng ke tlhobolo kwa Eldorado Park kwa Johannesburg ne le Mokaedi wa mokgatlho o rotloetsang baagi go ema ka dinao kgatlhanong le digongwana tsa bosenyi le thekiso ya diritibatsi wa People Seeking Justice Action Group..  Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa batho bao ba jelweng ka ditlhobolo kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima, KwaZulu-Natal le ya Kapa Botlhaba.

Ditiragalo tse di setlhogo tseno tsa go tlhasela batho ba bangwe, tseo ba sepodisi ba setseng ba weditse diphuruphutso tsa tsona, di re bontsha ka fao tirisodikgoka ka ditlhobolo setseng aname ka gona mmogo le dikotsi tse nang le tsona mo baaging..  Kabinete netefaletsa maAforika Borwa gore go samaganwe le dikgato tse di tla matlafatsang Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) gore kgone go lwantshana le bosenyi.
tgt_text: Miḓalo.

src_text: Tsona di tsenyeletsa go oketsa palo ya mapodisi mo mebileng mmogo le go tlhoma ditlhopha tse di tla lwantshanang le bosenyi jo bo rileng.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱahisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhafunwa vhavho nga tshifhinga tsha miḓalo ya tshinyalelo khulwane ya zwenezwino ye ya kwama zwipiḓa zwo fhambanaho zwa shango ḽashu..   Ri khou livhuwa vha tshumelo dzashu dza shishi na dza phuluso mona na shango vhe vha shuma vha sa neti itela vhulunga matshilo.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tla dirisa gape le dikgato tsa go dirisa tshedimosetso ka mokgwa o tlhalefileng go itse gore ke mafelo fe a tumileng ka bosenyi le bosenyi bo itaolang mo go ona..  SAPS samagane le go gagamatsa matsholo go utolola ditlhobolo le dikolo le go thopa tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong tse di leng mo diatleng tsa ditlhokotsebe.
tgt_text: Kha ri vhe tshithu tshithihi sa lushaka itela uri ri kone ṋetshedza thuso kha avho vhane vha vha na ṱhoḓea khulwane ya thikhedzo na ndondolo..   Khabinethe yo eletshedza vhathu uri vha dzule ngomu nḓuni dzavho arali hu na mutsho wa mvula khulwane na zwirulu, ya dovha hafhu ya tsivhudza avho vhane vha dzula kha vhupo ho tselaho fhasi uri vha vhe na ṱhogomelo khulwane vhukuma.

src_text: Mo dikgweding di le 12 tse di fetileng mapodisi ne thopa ditlhobolo di le 65 519 tse di neng di le mo diatleng tsa batho..  Puso ikuela mo baaging botlhe mmogo le mo mekgatlhong ya baagi go sikara mmogo tiro eno le ba sepodisi go fedisa botlhokotsebe mo metseng ya rona.

Fa go na le sengwe se se itseng se se ka romelang kwa kgolegelong batho ba mo motseng ba ba dirang dilo tse di seng mo molaong, loma mapodisi tsebe ka go letsetsa Mogala wa go Lwantshana le Ditiro tsa Bosenyi mo go 0800. .
tgt_text: Vhathu vha khou tsivhudzwa uri vha songo tshimbila bambela kana reila ngomu kha maḓi mikumbela ane khou elela nga luvhilo kana pfuka vhukati ha bada, dziburoho na milambo yo ḓalaho maḓi.

src_text: Masepala wa Selegae wa Enoch Mgijima (EMLM).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya tsivhudza miraḓo ya tshitshavha uri vha vhone uri vhana vhavho vha khou dzula vho tsireledzea kha nga kumbiwa nga maḓi musi hu na miḓalo..   Khakhathi dza zwigidi .

src_text: Tona ya Pusoselegae le Merero ya Setso Mme Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma mmogo le Tona ya Matlole Rre Enoch Godongwana ba ne ba sedimosetsa ditokololo tsa Kabinete ka maeto bona go buisana le bannaleseabe ba ba nang le dikarolo le seabe se se botlhokwa mo masepaleng ono wa Enoch Mgijima.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱahisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza muimbi wa muzika wa hip-hop Vho Kiernan Forbes, vhe vha vha vha tshi ḓivhiwa sa AKA khathihi na mubikimakone Vho Tebello Motsoane, vhe vha thuntshwa vha lovha zwenezwino fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban..   Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱahisa maipfi ayo ndiliso na kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza Vho Ayob Mungalee, vhe vha vha vha tshi lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga vhane vha kha ḓi tou bva thuntshwa vha vhulawa zwenezwino fhaḽa Eldorado Park kha ḽa Johannesburg.

src_text: Ka kgwedi ya Moranang, Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula dikgato tse di ka tsewang go rarabolola matsapa mo masepaleng ono go ya ka Karolo ya bo 139(7) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996, fa buisiwa mmogo le Karolo ya bo 150 ya Molao wa Taolo ya Matlole Dimasepala wa ngwaga wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).
tgt_text: Vho vha vhe mulangi wa lushaka wa tshigwada tshi ḓivhiwaho sa People Seeking Justice Action Group, ḽine ḽa vha dzangano ḽi ṱuṱuwedzaho miraḓo ya tshitshavha uri vha imedzane na zwiito zwa dzigennge khathihi na rengiswa ha zwidzidzivhadzi.

src_text: Masepala ono wa Enoch Mgijima ga a bolo go nna mo tobetobeng ya matlole le ya go retelelwa ke go tlamela setšhaba ka ditirelo pele ga ka tseelwa dikgato..  Kabinete dumelana le matsapa a utolotsweng ke bannaleseabe mme solofeditse baagi ba masepala yono gore go tla tsewa ditshwetso mabapi le gore ke dikgato dife tse di tshwanetsweng go tsewa go samagana le dikgwetlho tse masepala yono tobaneng le tsona mme tsona tla re mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo tsa bolelelwa baagi..  Pabalesego mo Dikolong.

Pabalesego mo dikolong tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa santse le ntlha e botlhokwa thata mo pusong ya rona mme bile gape ditiragalo tsa tirisodikgoka tse di begiwang kwa dikolong magareng ga barutwana le barutabana ke selo se se re tlhobang boroko.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱahisa maipfi ndiliso na kha vha miṱa na dzikhonani dza avho vhe vha vhulawa kha zwiito zwa zwenezwino zwa thuntshwa ha vhathu vhanzhi ngei Kapa Vhukovhela, KwaZulu-Natal na Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha.

src_text: Le fa Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le tsentse tirisong dikgato tsa go samagana le bothata jono santse le maikarabelo batsadi le bagodisi ba bana go tshwarisana tiro le ditlhogo tsa dikolo mmogo le barutwana go netefatsa gore kwa dikolong go rena polokesego gore barutwana ba rona ba kgone go rutiwa mme tle nne batho mo setšhabeng.
tgt_text: Haya mabulayo tshiṱuhu nahone ofhisaho ngaurali ane kha ḓi vha nga fhasi ha ṱhoḓisiso nga vha maanḓalanga zwa mulayo bvisela khagala anda ha khakhathi dza zwigidi khathihi na masiandaitwa hone kha zwitshavha zwashu..   Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya fulufhedzisa vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe uri Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe (SAPS) khou khwaṱhiswa itela thivhela vhugevhenga.

src_text: Se sengwe se se botlhokwa thata mo go rona ke pabalesego ya barutabana ba rona kwa dikolong.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi katela rumelwa ha mapholisa manzhi zwiṱaraṱani khathihi na vhumbwa ha zwigwada zwo khetheaho zwine zwa ḓo sedzesa nga maanḓa kha tshaka dza vhugevhenga ho khetheaho.

src_text: Pabalesego mo Mebileng.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa shumisa maitele ane shumisa data nga nḓila songo ḓoweleaho itela ṱalusa na posa iṱo kha vhupo vhune ha vha tshivhilela tsha zwiito zwa vhugevhenga.

src_text: Kabinete santse tshwenngwa ke dikotsi tse di diragalang go ralala le naga mo mebileng ya rona.

Puso tla tlhotlhomisa melao mentšhwa e tla fokotsang dikotsi tsa diteroko mongwe wa melao eno ke go dira gore dithoto di se tlhole di tsamaisiwa mo mebileng mme di tsamaisiwe ka diterene mo diporong, mme go solofelwa gore ka go dira jalo seno se tla fokotsa dirori tse di rwalang dithoto mo mebileng.
tgt_text: Vha ha SAPS vha khou khwaṱhisa mafulo avho u wanulusa na dzhia zwigidi na dzigulu zwi siho mulayoni bva kha ndango ya zwigevhenga.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba dirisang ditsela go obamela melao ya mo mebileng ka go ntsha matlho dinameng, ka go naganela batho ba bangwe ba le bona ba dirisang mmila oo le go se ba felele pele.
tgt_text: Mapholisa kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi ya 12 yo fhiraho vho kona dzhia lwa tshoṱhe zwigidi zwe zwa vha zwi tshi khou monamona na shango zwi linganaho 65. .

src_text: Botlhe ba ba kgannang ba itshietse kgotsa ba gabotse diritibatsi mmogo le ba ba kgannang boatla, mmogo le ba ba kgannang ka lebelo le le kwa godimo, ke bona ba ba tlholang bontsi jwa dikotsi tseno mo mebileng  Melaotlhomo.
tgt_text: Muvhuso khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe khathihi na madzangano zwitshavha ya uri vha shumisane na vha SAPS ya henefho vhuponi ha havho itela fhelisa vhugevhenga kha zwitshavha zwavho.

src_text: Molaotlhomo wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Tlhoma Lefelo le le Lengwe la go Abelana ka Ditirelo Tsotlhe tsa go Kgabaganya Melelwane (OSBP).
tgt_text: Arali vha na zwidodombedzwa zwine zwa nga thusa kha bvisela khagala vhathu vhane vha khou ḓidzhenisa kha zwiito zwi siho mulayoni, kha vha founele Crime Stop kha 0800. .

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Molaotlhomo wa OSBP gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.
tgt_text: Masipala Wapo wa Enoch Mgijima (EMLM).

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono latela gore go nesediwe pula pholisi ya OSBP mmogo le maano go tsenya tirisong ka Mopitlwe.
tgt_text: Minisṱa vha Tshumisano ya Mavhusele na Mafhungo zwa Sialala Vho Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma na Minisṱa wa zwa Gwama Vho Enoch Godongwana vho ḓivhadza Khabinethe nga ha miṱangano ya vhukwamani ya zwenezwino ye ya farwa na vhashelamulenzhe vha ndeme khathihi na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho kha mafhungo fhaḽa EMLM.

src_text: Maitlhomo ona ke go dira gore go nne bonolo go tsenya batho le dithoto mo mafelong botseno jwa naga ya Aforika Borwa le kwa mafelong dinaga tsa baagisani..  Seno se tla fokotsa tshubetlhelano e tleng nne gone kwa mafelong go tsena le go tswa ka fa nageng e diriwang ke batho ba ba kgabaganyang melelwane le ba ba gwebisanang.

Dikgato tseno di botlhokwa gape le mo dikgatong tsa naga ya rona mo go diragatseng Tumelano ya Kgwebisano e Senang Dikgoreletsi mo Dinageng tsa Kontinente ya Aforika (AfCFTA)..  Ditumelano tse di tlhalosiwang mo Molaotlhomong ono di tla thusa gore ditiro tsa go tlhatlhoba dithoto, dijanaga le batho kwa melelwaneng di se opise tlhogo mme di diriwe ka bonako.
tgt_text: Nga ṅwedzi wa Lambamai 2022, Khabinethe yo tendela hu tshi shumiswa maga u dzhenelela fhaḽa EMLM ya nga Khethekanyo 139(7) ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996, musi tshi vhalwa khathihi na Khethekanyo 150 ya Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya zwa Masheleni ha Masipala, wa 2003 (Mulayo 56 wa 2003).

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono samagana gape le didirisiwa tse di matshwanedi tsa maemo boditšhabatšhaba fa go tla mo go laoleng metsamaong ya go gwebisana, mmogo le ya batho le ya dithoto..  Molaotlhomo wa Naga wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa wa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Hoyu Masipala Wapo wa Enock Mgijima wo ḓi dzulela ṱangana na thaidzo khulwane vhukuma dza kundelwa siani ḽa zwa masheleni khathihi na nḓisedzo ya tshumelo lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu phanḓa ha musi hu tshi vha na maga aya u dzhenelela.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasaladiwa ga Molaotlhomo wa Naga wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.

Molaotlhomo ono neela maatla Pholisi ya Taolo ya Makwalo Boitshupo Semmuso mmogo le go tla ka leano la go tlhoma thulaganyo ya dikhomphiutha le nngwe fela ya naga ya makwalo boitshupo mo go yona batho botlhe ba ba nnang ka fa nageng kgotsa ba ba kileng ba nna ka fa nageng maina bona tla bolokwang mo go yona..  Sekwalwa se iseng se butswe sa Molaotlhomo ono se tla thusa gore go tlhomiwe sefalanatshedimoso sa go kwadisa baagi le bao seng baagi ba naga eno mme ba neilwe tetla ya go nnela ruri ka fa nageng mmogo le go se tlhokomela.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo sumbedza takalela zwa bviselwa khagala ha nyimele iyi vhavhaho ye ya ṱaluswa nga vhathu vha kwameaho nahone yo fulufhedzisa vhadzulapo vha EMLM uri tsheo ya nga ha uri khaedu idzi dzine dza vha hone zwazwino kha masipala uyu dzi ḓo tandululwa hani ḓo ḓivhadzwa hu si kale.

src_text: Se tla thusa gape le gore go tlhomiwe le sefalanatshedimoso se sengwe gape sa go boloka ditokomane tsa boitshupo tsa baagi ba ba tlang go nna sebakanyana ka fa nageng.

Sekwalwa seno se tla thusa gape le ka go tlhoma Thulaganyo ya Naga ya go Dirisa Dikarolo tsa Mmele go Tlhagisa Boitshupo jwa Motho (NIS) mme thulaganyo eno tla dira gore go nne bonolo go bona dintlha tsa motho tsa boitshupo ka tswa di le mo sefalanatshedimosong sa go kwadisa baagi kgotsa mo go sa go boloka ditokomane tsa boitshupo tsa baagi ba ba tlang go nna sebakanyana ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Tsireledzo zwikoloni.

src_text: NIS tla kgona gape le go dirisana le dithulaganyo tse dingwe tsa boitshupo tsa maphata mangwe puso le poraefete..  Melaotlhomo ya naga ka bobedi leng wa OSBP le wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa ya ngwaga wa 2022 tla phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae mo go: www.dha.gov.za.
tgt_text: Tsireledzo ya zwikolo fhano Afrika Tshipembe kha ḓi vha tshipikwa tshihulwane tsha muvhuso nahone mivhigo ya zwiito zwa dzikhakhathi dzi bvelelaho vhukati ha vhagudi na vhadededzi ndi thaidzo khulwane vhukuma..   Naho muhasho wa Pfunzo dza Mutheo wo vhea maga teaho u fhelisa thaidzo iyi, ndi vhuḓifhinduleli ha vhabebi na vhaunḓi uri vha shumisane na vhurangaphanḓa ha zwikolo khathihi na vhagudi itela vhona uri zwikolo zwi khou dzula zwi fhethu ho tsireledzeaho hune vhana vhashu vha nga kona aluwa na vha vhadzulapo vha re na vhuḓifhinduleli tsireledzea ha vhadededzi vhashu zwikoloni ndi zwithu zwa ndeme..   Tsireledzo dzibadani.

src_text: Baagi ba rotloediwa go romela ditshwaelo tsa bona tse ba di kwadileng mo atereseng e latelang: The Director-General of Home Affairs, Private Bag X114, Pretoria,.
tgt_text: Khabinethe kha ḓi pfa yo kwamea vhukuma nga tshivhalo tsha khombo dza badani dzine dza khou bvelela mona na shango.

src_text: Mogala: 012 406  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
tgt_text: Muvhuso ḓo lavhelesa kha sima miṅwe milayo miswa ya thusa fhelisa khombo dzi vhangwaho nga maṱhiraka, hune muṅwe wa hone wa ḓo vha bviswa badani ha mihwalo ya thundu ya vho ḓo thoma endedzwa nga tshiporo muhumbulo wa uri zwi ḓo thusa fhungudza mutsiko kha mihwalo ya thundu dzi endedzwaho nga bada.

src_text: Samiti ya Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU).

Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa tla tsenela Kopano ya bo 36 ya Pulo ya Palamente ya Dinaga tsa Aforika e tla tsenelwang ke Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le tsa Mebuso eno e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 18 go fitlha ka la bo 19 Tlhakole kwa Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhashumisi vha bada vhoṱhe ya uri vha tevhedze milayo ya badani nga vha na ṱhogomelo humbulela vhaṅwe vhathu khathihi na sa fhelela mbilu vhaṅwe vhashumisi vha bada.

src_text: Pulo ya Palamente ya AU e tla bulwang ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “Go Potlakisiwa go Tsenngwa Tirisong AfCFTA” tla bulelwa ke Kopano e Edileng ya bo 42 ya Lekgotlakhuduthamaga e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 16 Tlhakole.
tgt_text: Vhareili vhane vha reila vho kambiwa kana vho shumisa zwidzidzivhadzi khathihi na vhareili vhane vha reila nga sa londa hu tshi katelwa na avho vhane vha reila nga luvhilo lwo kalulaho, ndi vhone vhane vha vhanga vhunzhi ha khombo dza badani   Milayotibe.

src_text: Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le tsa Mebuso ya AU di tla dirisa molaetsamogolo yono go totobatsa maikano bona go tsenya tirisong ka botlalo AfCFTA..  Leeto la Semmuso la ga Moporesitente wa Naga ya Uganda.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Mukaṋo wa Shango wa Mishumo Minzhi (OSBP) wa ṅwaha wa 2022 .

src_text: Motlotlegi Moporesitente Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa kwa Uganda tla etela naga ya Aforika Borwa ka Labobedi wa la bo 28 Tlhakole 2023, go latela gore Moporesitente ka ene Rre Ramaphosa mo laletse.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mulayotibe wa OSBP hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: Maitlhomo leeto leno ke go gagamatsa botsalano jwa dinaga ka bobedi.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou vha hone nga murahu ha ṱanganedzwa ha mbekanyamaitele ya OSBP khathihi na maano u thoma shumiswa hayo nga ṅwadzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe.

src_text: Leeto leno le tla garelwa ka go tshwarwa ga dikopano tsa beng ba dikgwebo ba ba batlang go gwebisana le go beeletsa mo dinageng ka bobedi..  Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa Ngwaga wa 2023 tsa Dinaga tsa Mokgatlho wa Tlhabololo ya Borwa jwa Aforika (SADC).
tgt_text: Ndi une wa khou lavhelela leludza zwa enda ha vhathu na thundu vhukati ha mikaṋo ya shangoni ya Afrika Tshipembe na mashango vhahura..   Hezwi zwi ḓo fhungudza tsitsikano ine ya vha hone zwazwino kha mikaṋo yashu vhangwaho nga vhaendi na vhavhambadzi vha pfukekanyaho mikaṋo.

src_text: Kabinete gakolola badiredi botlhe ba bobegakgang gore Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa Ngwaga wa 2023 tsa SADC di butswe gore mmegadikgang mongwe le mongwe go tswa mo nageng nngwe le nngwe ya SADC yo batlang go di tsenela ka dira jalo mme di tla tswalelwa ka Labobedi wa la bo 28 Tlhakole..  Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa SADC di keteka tiro e tswileng diatla mo bobegakganyeng jwa makwalodikgang, jwa ditshwantsho, jwa go gasa tshedimosetso mo thelebišeneng le mo seyalemoweng mo dinageng tsa SADC ka maitlhomo go ema nokeng dikgato tsa go dirisana mmogo ga dinaga tsa kgaolo le go tshwaragana ga tsona  Melaetsa ya go Akgola.
tgt_text: Haya maga dovha vha ndeme kha ndingedzo dza shango dza ṱuṱuwedza Thendelano dza Vhupo ha Mbambadzo yo Vhofholowaho ya Dzhango ḽa Afrika (AfCTA)..   Thendelano dzine dza khou lavhelelwa kha Mulayotibe dzi ḓo ita uri zwa senguluswa ha thundu, zwiendedzi na vhathu zwi itwe nga nḓila yo leluwaho nahone ya tshihaḓu.

src_text: Kabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Nomcebo Zikode, Zakes Bantwini mmog le Wouter Kellerman jaaka kwa Dikabong tsa bo 65 tsa Ngwaga le Ngwaga tsa Grammy ba kgonne go fenya maemo go diragatsa pina ka botswerere mo lefatsheng ka bophara fa ba ne ba diragatsa pina ya bona e bidiwang Bayethe  Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: batho botlhe ba ba thutseng botala ka tlhogo fa bese ba neng ba nametse ne sugagana le sejanaga se se rwalang tšhelete kwa tselafefong ya N1 kwa porofenseng ya Limpopo.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe dovha hafhu wa elana na zwishumiswa zwa milayo zwa ḽifhasi zwo teaho zwine zwa amba nga ha tshimbidzwa ha mbambadzo khathihi na enda ha vhathu na thundu..   Mulayotibe wa Ṱhalusavhuṋe na Vhuḓiṅwalisi wa Lushaka wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletsa botlhe ba ba nnileng le dikgobalo mo kotsing eno pholo ya ka bonako.Rre John Moeti (yo neng na le dingwaga di le 56), yo kileng tshamekela setlhopha sa kgwele ya dinao sa Bafana Bafana le sa Orlando Pirates, yo gape nnileng le seabe se se botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore ka ngwaga wa 1996 re kgone go fenya Sejana sa Baganka ba Kgwele ya Dinao mo Dinageng tsa Aforika.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Ṱhalusavhuṋe na Vhuḓiṅwalisi ha Lushaka wa ṅwaha wa 2022 itela vhuḓipfi ha tshitshavha.

src_text: Kabinete rometse gape le matshediso kwa pusong ya Türkiye le ya Syria mmogo le kwa baagi ba dipuso ka bobedi jaaka ba latlhegetswe ke matshelo batho ba bo bona ba bantsi mmogo le go senyegelwa ke mafaratlhatlha bona a leng botlhokwa mo baaging le mo ikonomng ya bona leng seo se tlhodilweng ke thoromo kgolo ya lefatshe ka la bo 6 Tlhakole 2023 bogolo jwa yona bo balelwang go.
tgt_text: Hoyu mulayotibe ndi une wa ita uri Mbekanyamaitele ya Ndangulo ya Ṱhalusavhuṋe ya Tshiofisi thome shuma nahone khou lavhelela ṋetshedza sisteme nthihi ya ṱhalusavhuṋe ya lushaka ya didzhithaḽa katelaho nahone yo ṱanganelaho kha vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha dzula kana vhe vha vhuya vha dzula kha ḽino shango.

src_text: 8 mo Sekaleng sa go Meta Dithoromo tsa Lefatshe.
Re utlwela botlhoko malapa ao latlhegetsweng ke ba bo bona le bao ba santseng ba batlana le ba bo bona.
tgt_text: Iyi mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe ḓo ita uri hu kone vha na dzudzanywa khathihi na vhulungwa ha redzhisiṱara ya vhadzulapo hu tshi itelwa vhathu vhane vha vha na tshidzulapo tsha fhano khathihi na avho vhane vha tou vha vhadzuli vha tshoṱhe kha ḽino ḓo dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu kone bveledzwa dathabeizi ya ṱhalusavhuṋe hu tshi itelwa tshiṅwe tshigwada tsha vhabvannḓa vhane vha dzula kha ḽino lwa tshifhinganyana dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu vhe na Sisteme ya Vhuṋe ya Lushaka (NIS) shumisaho magunwe ine ya ḓo ita uri hu vhe na tsenguluso nthihi ya muthu nga tou ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa zwine zwa tea dzheniswa kha redzhisiṱara ya vhadzulapo khathihi na dathabeizi ya ṱhalusavhuṋe.

src_text: Kabinete rolela hutshe mekgatlho ya naga ya Aforika Borwa e samaganang le ditiro tsa go tswa baagi thuso le yona ileng koo go tswa baagi ba koo thuso.

Kabinete rolela hutshe yo mongwe wa mapodisi Aforika Borwa setlhopha sa yuniti ya K-9 yo bogatlhamelamasisi jwa gagwe, gareng ga dilo tse dingwe tse dintsi, bo dirileng gore go feletswe go kgonnwe go ribolola mosadimogolo wa dingwaga di le 80 yo falotseng kotsi eno yo neng santse le ka fa gare ga dithothobolo tsa moago o ba wetseng kwa Türkiye yo ntseng ka fa teng ga mpa ya dithothobolo tseno sebaka sa go feta matsatsi le robedi  Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: NIS ḓo dovha hafhu ya kona shumisana na dziṅwe sisteme dza vhuṋe dza sekhithara ya muvhuso na ya phuraivethe..   Vhuvhili hayo, Mulayotibe wa OSBP wa 2022 na Mulayotibe wa Ṱhalusavhuṋe na Vhuḓiṅwalisi wa Lushaka wa 2022 ḓo anḓadzwa kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa zwa Muno ine ya vha: www.dha.gov.za.

src_text: Mme Azola Mayekiso thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) wa Koporasi ya Tlamelo ka Matlole Ditheo tsa go Agela Setšhaba Dintlo..  Rre Lucas Thabiso Thiti thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG) wa Lephata la Tlhabololo le Kemonokeng ya Setheo ka fa Lefapheng la Bosiamisi le Tlhabololo ya Molaotheo..  Mme Boitumelo Mosako thapilwe go nna CEO kwa Bankatlhabololong ya Dinaga tsa Borwa jwa Aforika (DBSA)..  Rre Kabelo Rikhotso thapilwe go nna Mokaedi yo Mogolo mo Botong ya Koporasi ya Dipeeletso tsa Puso (PIC)..  Rre Matsemela Moloi thapilwe go nna Motlhankedimogolo wa Setheo sa Ditlolo tsa Molao mo Mebileng.
tgt_text: Miraḓo ya tshitshavha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri vha rumele vhupfiwa havho nga tou ṅwala kha aḓirese tevhelaho: Mulangi Muhulu wa Muhasho wa zwa Muno, Private Bag X114, Pretoria,.

src_text: Moatefokate Sonwabile Mancotywa thapilwe go nna Mokaedi yo seng wa Khuduthamaga mmogo le go nna gape Monnasetulo mo Botong ya Setheo sa Dijanaga tse di Putlang Mebila go Kgabaganya Melelwane ya Dinaga.
tgt_text: Nomboro ya luṱingo: 012 406   Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya.
tgt_text: Issues In The Environment.

src_text: Kabinete leboga Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya 2023 e letlelelang gore dikgato tse di botlhokwa tseo di itsisitsweng ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba di ka tlamelwa ka matlole gore di phetagadiwe.
tgt_text: 2023 Budget Speech.

src_text: Mo puong eo go builwe ka maano a tseneletseng go samagana le dikgwetlo tsa motlakase go fokotsa botlhokatiro, tshokolo le dikgwetlho tsa ditlhwatlhwa tse di goletseng ruri tsa dilo tse di botlhokwa, mmogo le go lwantshana le botlhokotsebe le bonweenwee.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the 2023 National Budget giving effect to critical interventions outlined by President Cyril Ramaphosa’s State of the Nation Address.

src_text: Fa re tswelela go ema nokeng maikano rona go sonaga matlole, kgolo ya ikonomi le peeletso mmogo le megolo ya go thusa baagi ke tsona bontsi tse matlole puso diragadiwang mo go ona mo re boneng R66 bilione abelwa lephata la Thuso ya Baagi mmogo le R36 bilione e abilweng gore tlamele Megolo ya go Thusa Baagi ba ba sa Direng ba ba Wetsweng ke Mathata Ditšhelete ka Ntlha ya COVID-19 go fitlha ka la bo 31 Mopitlwe..  Mo godimo ga seno, matlole a okeditsweng mphata puso ka boraro jwa ona tla thusa go fokotsa boima jo matlole ano bo bo rweleng, segolobogolo mo go mo mererong ya boitekanelo, ya thuto, mmogo le ya ditirelo tse di botlhokwa tse di abelwang setšhaba ntle le gore se di duelele.
tgt_text: The Speech detailed plans to tackle the energy challenge, reduce unemployment, poverty and the rising cost of living, including combating crime and corruption.

src_text: Pegelo ya Dipatlisiso tsa Palo ya Badiri mo Kotareng.
tgt_text: While balancing our commitments to fiscal discipline, the economic growth and investment and the social wage continues to receive the bulk of public resources, with R66 billion allocated to Social Development and R36 billion to fund the extension of the COVID-19 social relief of distress grant until 31 March..

src_text: Kabinete leboga Pegelo ya ngwaga wa 2022 ya kotara ya bone ya Dipatlisiso tsa Palo ya Badiri mo Kotareng, mme yona le fa go se gokalo bontsha phokotsego ya dipalo tsa batho ba ba sa direng ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Furthermore, the increased allocations for all three spheres of government will help alleviate some of the financial pressures, particularly in health, education, and free basic services where the costs of providing services are rising.

src_text: Palo eno fokotsegile ka diphesente di le.
tgt_text: Quarterly Labour Force Survey.

src_text: 2 go tloga mo diphesenteng di le.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the Stats SA Quarterly Labour Force survey for fourth quarter of 2022, which showed slight but significant decrease in the rate of unemployment in the country.

src_text: 9 go fitlha mo go di le.
tgt_text: The official rate decreased by.
2 per cent from.

src_text: Makala otlhe mo setšhabeng go ikuelwa mo go ona go nna le seabe mo go tlholeng ditiro gore re kgone go tswelela go fokotsa dipalo tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro tse di rekotileng mo tsamaong ya nako ya dikotara di le tharo tse di fetileng.
tgt_text: 9% to.

src_text: Ka go emana nokeng re ka kgona go phutlhamisa bongangabele jwa botlhokatiro ka fa nageng ya rona.
tgt_text: 7 per cent..  All sectors of society are called to drive job creation opportunities so that we can continue the downward trend in the unemployment rate as recorded over the last three quarters.

src_text: Puso santse eme ka boikano jwa yona jwa Leano la Tsosoloso le Kagosešwa ya Ikonomi (ERRP), leo le tsenyeletsang letsholo la rona le legolo la go thapa batho ba bantsi mo ditirelong tsa setšhaba mmogo le dikgato tsa go ema nokeng kgolo ya ikonomi e oketsang ditiro go latela gore re sutlhe mo dinaleng tsa phage ya COVID-.
tgt_text: Through our collective effort, we can break the stubborn cycle of unemployment in our nation..  Government remains committed to the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP), which includes our mass public employment programme and efforts to support economic growth that bolsters employment after the devastation of COVID-.

src_text: Dikgang tse di ka ga Motlatsamoporesitente.
tgt_text: Deputy President.

src_text: Kabinete totobatsang kgang ya gore ke boammaruri gore Motlatsamoporesitente Rre David Mabuza rotse tiro jaaka Tokololo ya Palamente, mme paka ya gagwe ya go nna Motlatsamoporesitente wa naga fitlhile kwa bokhutlhong.
tgt_text: Cabinet confirms that Deputy President David Mabuza has resigned as Member of Parliament, ending his term as Deputy President of the country.

src_text: Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ka go leboga go menagane Motlatsamoporesitente ka tiro e tswileng diatla a diretseng naga mo sebakeng sa go feta dingwaga di le tlhano.
tgt_text: Cabinet joined President Cyril Ramaphosa in thanking him for his exceptional service to the country over the last five years.

src_text: Motlatsamoporesitente Mabuza diretse naga ka botswapelo mme tiro a diretseng setšhaba mo go ageng naga ya rona tla nna mo megopolong ya baagi ba Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Deputy President Mabuza served with distinction and his contribution in building the country we want will forever be remembered by the people of South Africa.

src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: Energy.

src_text: Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya baagi le dikgwebo mabapi le ditshitiso le dikgoreletsi tse di tlhodiwang ke motlakase o tshabetseng ruri.
tgt_text: Cabinet understands the frustration of citizens and businesses over the inconvenience and disruptions caused by persistent load shedding.

src_text: Ditsholofetso tse di dirilweng mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba mmogo le matlole a rebotsweng ke Tekanyetsokabo di tla dira gore puso kgone go phetagatsa ka bonako ditharabololo tse di kwadilweng mo Leanong la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato.
tgt_text: The commitments from the State of Nation Address and the Budget allocations strengthen the capability of the state to fast track interventions outlined in the Energy Action Plan.

src_text: Melawanataolo e senang go phasaladiwa ke Tona ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso ya Molao wa Maemo Masetlapelo Naga neela puso maatla go ka samagana ka tshwanelo le matsapa a gaketseng re tobaneng le ona tlhaelo ya motlakase mmogo le go dira jalo ka bonako jo bo tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: The recently published National State of Disaster regulations by the Minister of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs allows government to respond more effectively and with the necessary pace to deal with the severe electricity supply constraints.

src_text: Se sengwe gape se se botlhokwa ke gore dira gore go nne le go rwala maikarabelo le go tlhoka lehunelo ka go dira gore mafapha nne ona a disang makala ano.
tgt_text: Moreover, it ensures transparency and accountability by enabling departments to guide their sectors.

src_text: Gangwe le gape go tla tshwanelwa gore go rebolwe dipegelo ka sengwe le sengwe seo se dirilweng.
tgt_text: Regular progress updates will be provided.

src_text: Go phimolwa ga sekoloto sa bokanaka R254 bilione sa Eskom, go go tla diragadiwang fa setheo seno se dumela gore se tla ikobela dikgato tse di gagamaditsweng, se tla fokoletsa setheo seno matsapa mantsi mme sa kgona gore se simolole go tsaya dikgato tse di tlhokengang go tsewa tsa go beeletsa le go tlhokomela le go tsosolosa meago le dithoto tsa setheo seno.
tgt_text: The debt relief of R254 billion, subject to strict conditions will relieve extreme pressure on Eskom and enable it to undertake necessary investment and maintenance.

src_text: Go se duedisiwe lekgetho gore letsholo la go tsenya dirisiwa tse di pegiwang mo marulelong tsa motlakase o fetlhiwang ka letsatsi le kgone go diragadiwa go tla thusa seng fela malapa batho le dikgwebo gore ba kgone go iphetlhela motlakase mme gape go tla thusa le gore diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase ka fa nageng di nne le motlakase.
tgt_text: Tax incentives to rollout rooftop solar panels, not only assist households and businesses in generating electricity for their own use but also supports the national grid.

src_text: Ka letsholo la go oketsa merokotso ya dikgwebo, fa dikgwebo di beeletsa mo motlakaseng wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa, di tla kgona go dira kopo ya gore mo diporojekeng tsotlhe tsa motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa di fokolediwa lekgetho ka diphesente di le 125 mo ngwageng wa ntlha, mme go se nne le methamo e beewang ya gore ba ba tlhagisang motlakase ba se fete.
tgt_text: Under the expanded incentives for businesses, investments in renewable energy will allow businesses to claim 125 per cent deduction in the first year for all renewable energy projects, with no thresholds on generation capacity.

src_text: Dipuisano tse di ka ga Megolo ya Badiredipuso.
tgt_text: Wage Negotiations.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba tsayang karolo mo dithulaganyong tsa Ditumelano tsa Lekgotla la Ditharabololo tsa Dipuisano tsa Merero ya Ditiro tsa Badiredipuso mo go Fitlhelele Ditumelano tse Maphata Otlhe Dumelanang ka Tsona go se iphapose dithulaganyo tseno, gore go fitlhelelwe ditharabololo tse di tla tswelang naga mosola.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls upon all parties to remain committed to the process of the Public Service Co-Ordinating Bargaining Council Collective Agreement, and to arrive at solution that serves the best interests of the country..

src_text: Go botlhokwa gore re dirisane sentle mmogo gore naga ya rona le setšhaba sa rona re di tswele mosola.
tgt_text: It is vitally important that we all work together for the good of our nation and her people.

src_text: Le fa le gore molao letleletse gore batho ba ka tsenela megwanto, megwanto eno tshwanetse go diragadiwa ka tsela e nang le maikarabelo e ikobelang melao ya rona ya temokerasi.
tgt_text: While the right to strike is protected, it must be done in responsible manner that upholds our democracy and rule of law.

src_text: Kabinete gakolola bao ba leng mo maanong go tsenela megwanto gore ba tshwanetse go dira jalo ka tsela e senang mmodubudu, mme ga ba tshwanela go rumulana le batho ba bangwe kgotsa go tlhatlhamolola mafaratlhatlha le dithoto tsa naga le tsa batho ba bangwe.
Go Lwantshana le Bonweenwee.
tgt_text: Cabinet reminds everyone that those who are planning to strike must do so in peaceful manner, and should refrain from any form of intimidation and destruction of infrastructure and properties..  Anti-Corruption.

src_text: Kabinete eme ka lefoko le le lengwe le Moporesitente mo go direng boikuelo jwa gagwe mo go Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo wa Eskom Rre Andre de Ruyter gore lebe kwa mapodising go ya go tlhatlhela kgetse.
tgt_text: Cabinet joins President Cyril Ramaphosa in his call to the former Eskom CEO Andre de Ruyter to report allegations of corruption at Eskom to the police.

src_text: Ditheo tsa naga ya rona tsa go lwantshana le botlhokotsebe di malalaalaotswe go tshwara le go sekisa bao ba tlolang molao.
tgt_text: Our crime fighting institutions stand ready to arrest, and prosecute those who break the law.

src_text: Re ikuela mo go motho yo mongwe le yo mongwe yo go nang le sengwe se se itseng ka bogodu le bonweenwee jo batho ba bangwe ba bo dirang go loma mapodisi tsebe.
tgt_text: We call on anyone with information related to crime and corruption to report what they know to the relevant law enforcement authorities.

src_text: Yo mongwe le yo mongwe wa rona na le maikarabelo go lwantshana le bonweenwee ao motlhankedi yo mongwe le yo mongwe yo leng mo maemong a kwa godimo mo ditheong tsa puso le tsa poraefete a rwesiwang ke Molao wa go Thibela le go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa Bonweenwee, go bega ditiragalo tseno tsotlhe tsa bonweenwee.
tgt_text: All of us are duty bound to fight corruption and to the prescripts of the Prevention and Combating of Corrupt Activities Act, which requires people in “positions of authority” in the public and private sectors to report, all corrupt activities.

src_text: Sepodisi sa Ditirelo tsa Matlole (FATF).
tgt_text: Financial Action Task Force (FATF).

src_text: Kabinete sekegela tsebe tshwetso e tserweng ke ba FATF e ka ga go baya naga ya Aforika Borwa mo maemong a kwa godimo dinaga tseo tsamaiso ya madi mo go tsona tshwanetsweng go lebelelwa ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho gore madi go tswa mo nageng eno ga romelwe digongwana tsa dimenolopuso mme seno se itsegwe ka gore ke FATF’s “grey list”.
tgt_text: Cabinet noted the decision by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) to list South Africa as jurisdiction under increased monitoring or more commonly referred to as FATF’s “grey list”.

src_text: Le fa FAFT dumela gore naga eno setse dirile go tlala seatla mo go samaganeng le matsapa a nopotsweng mo Pegelong ya Ditshekatsheko tsa Dikarolo tse go Dumelanweng ka Tsona (MER) tlhomamisitse gore go santse go na le dilo tse dintsi tse di santseng di tlhoka go diriwa.
tgt_text: While the FATF recognised the significant progress made by the country in addressing the shortcomings highlighted in its mutual evaluation report (MER), it assessed that there is more needed to be done.

src_text: Kabinete itse sentle gore go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di santseng di tlhoka go rarabololwa tseno go tla tswela naga ya Aforika Borwa mosola o seng kana ka sepe.
tgt_text: Cabinet is cognisant that addressing the identified shortcomings will be in the best interest of South Africa.

src_text: Puso ikemiseditse go pheta ka pejana tiro eno gore kgone go tokafatsa maemo yona go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa go tlhatswa tšhelete ya bogodu mmogo le tsa go fetisetsana madi go neelwa digongwana tsa menolopuso.
tgt_text: Government is committed to work swiftly to strengthen the effectiveness of its anti-money laundering and counter-terrorist financing regime.

src_text: Leeto la Moporesitente wa Naga ya Ugandan go Etela ka fa Nageng ka Mabaka Tiro.
tgt_text: Ugandan State Visit.

src_text: Kabinete itumeletse leeto le le tsamaileng sentle la semmuso go jelwa nala ke Moporesitente Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa naga ya Rephaboliki ya Uganda go jela nala naga Aforika Borwa ka la bo 28 Tlhakole..  Mo leetong leno Ditlhogo tsa Mebuso ka bobedi ga bona ba ne ba ema ka lefoko Kopano ya Beng ba Dikgwebo, mmogo le go sekaseka ka fao dinaga tseno di ka gwebisanang ka gona le go beeletsana.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful State Visit by President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni of the Republic of Uganda to South Africa on 28 February..  During the visit, the two Heads of State addressed Business Forum, and explored trade and investment opportunities.

src_text: Ba ne gape ya nna dipaki tsa fa go saeniwa Memorantamo wa go Utlwanela Ditumelano (MoU) mo maphateng mantsinyana a farologaneng a akaretsang: Koporasi ya Tlhabololo ya Diintaseteri (IDC), Bojanala; Dipalangwa; Didirisiwa tsa Thekenoloji ya Ditlhaeletsano; Ditirelo tsa kwa Kgolegelong tsa go Thusa Batshwariwa go Nna Batho mo Setšhabeng; mmogo le le mo go Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi.
tgt_text: They also witnessed the signing of Memorandums of Understanding (MoU) on number of areas, which included: Industrial Development Cooperation, Tourism; Transport; Communication Technologies; Correctional Services; and Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities.

src_text: Naga ya Rephaboliki ya Uganda ke naga e leng mo maemong bo 15 mo dinageng tseo di gwebisanang le naga ya Aforika Borwa mo Kontinenteng bile gape mo maemong bobedi mo dinageng tse di gwebisanang le rona tsa kwa Borwa ja Aforika.
tgt_text: The Republic of Uganda is South Africa’s 15th largest trading partner on the Continent and the second largest in East Africa.

src_text: Magare ga ngwaga wa 2017 le wa 2021 kgwebisano mo dinageng tseno ka bobedi ne ya oketsega go fitlha go R3 bilione.
tgt_text: Between 2017 and 2021, total trade between the two countries reached R3 billion.

src_text: Samiti ya Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU).
tgt_text: African Union (AU) Summit.

src_text: Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele baromiwa ba naga ya Aforika Borwa kwa Samiting ya AU e neng tshwaretswe kwa Ethiopia ka molaetsamogolo o reng, “Go Potlakisa Lebelo la go Tsenya Tirisong Letsholo le le Sutisang Dikgoreletsi mo Kgwebisanong ya Dinaga tsa Aforika (AfCFTA).
tgt_text: President Cyril Ramaphosa led the South African delegation at the African Union Summit in Ethiopia under the theme “Acceleration of Africa Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) Implementation”.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa neelane ka tshedimosetso ya go baya mo dinakong maloko AU gore yona ke eng se setseng se dirile mo go tsenyeng tirisong AfCFTA.Jaaka naga ya rona le Monnasetulo mo Lekgotlheng la Merero ya Kagiso le Pabalesego la AU, naga ya rona neelane gape le ka tshedimosetso e ka ga seo setseng se dirile mo go thuseng go diragatsa Letsholo la 2030 la go Fedisa Dintwa mo Kontinenteng ya Aforika.
tgt_text: South Africa provided updates on the implementation of the African Continental Free Trade Area.

src_text: Jaaka Moporesitente Ramaphosa le ene yo di gogang kwa pele mo Letsholong la AU la Merero ya COVID-19 ne tlhalosa gape le gore ke eng se se ka diriwang go matlafatsa Setheo sa Aforika sa Twantsho le Thibelo ya Malwetse gore kontinente kgone go ithulaganya sentle gore kgone go ema sejaro kgatlhanong le maroborobo mangwe.
tgt_text: As Chair of the AU Peace and Security Council, the country also provided an update on progress towards Silencing the Guns in Africa by..  As AU COVID-19 Champion, President Ramaphosa presented proposals on how the Africa Centres for Disease Control (CDC) can be strengthened and measures adopted to better prepare the continent for pandemics.

src_text: Ka ntlha ya boeteledipele jwa Moporesitente Ramaphosa, Setlhopha sa Tiro ya go Rekela Kontinente ya Aforika Meento ya COVID-19 se sele sa tlhomiwa gore se eme nokeng Leano la Meento la Aforika.
tgt_text: Under the leadership of President Ramaphosa, the COVID-19 African Vaccine Acquisition Task Team was established in support of the Africa Vaccine Strategy.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa ne gape ya rekela kontinente mabotlolwana meento ya COVID-19 le dimilione di feta di le dimilione di le.
tgt_text: South Africa also secured over 500 million COVID-19 vaccine doses for the continent.

src_text: Mo godimo ga tseno tsotlhe, go ne gape ga tlhomiwa le Letlole la Aforika la go Lwantshana le Leroborobo leo le kgonneng go bokeletsa madi le kanaka ditolara di le dimilione di le 137 gore dirisediwe go tlhagisa meento ka fa nageng, go tlhatlhoba, go reka didirisiwa tsa go itshireletsa mo bolwetseng jwa COVID-19, metšhini ya go thusa balwetse go hema le melemo mengwe e botlhokwa.
tgt_text: Further, the African Pandemic Response Fund was established, which mobilised $137 million for local production of vaccines, diagnostics, personal protective equipment, oxygen and critical medicines.

src_text: Setheo sa go Tlamela Aforika ka Melemo le sone se ne sa tlhomiwa gore se dire bonnete jwa gore dinaga tsotlhe tsa Aforika di tlamelwa ka melemo e botlhokwa.
tgt_text: The Africa Medical Supplies Platform was also launched, to ensure access to vital medical supplies for all African countries.

src_text: Ditiragalo tsa go Bogisa le go Bolaya Batho ba Sesadi.
tgt_text: Gender-Based Violence and Femicide.

src_text: Puso kgalema ka mafoko a bogale ditiragalo tse di sa khutseng tsa go bogisa le go bolaya batho ba sesadi mme tsweletse go gagamatsa dikgato tsa yona tse dintsinyana tsa go lwantshana le seno.
tgt_text: Government condemns the persistent cases of gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF) and continues to intensify its fight through several interventions.

src_text: Tsona di tsenyeletsa dikgato tse dintsi tsa go kwalola sešwa melao, go tlhoma Letlole la go Lwantshana le GBVF mmogo le go ema nokeng Mafelo go Gomotsa le go Thoba Maikutlo Bao ba Fetileng mo Mathateng go Bogisiwa mo Dikgolaganong tsa Lorato leng mafelo a abelang batswasetlhabelo bano thuso kgolo tota.
tgt_text: These include extensive legal reform, the establishment of GBVF Response Fund, and support for Thuthuzela and Khuseleka Care Centres, which provide vital services for GBV survivors..

src_text: Mo godimo ga seno, tirisanommogo puso e tlhomileng magareng ga yona le mekgatlho ya baagi, badirisanimmogo ba yona mo mererong ya tlhabololo, dikereke le mo makaleng mangwe ka go sikara mmogo tiro eno go lwantshana le bothata jono jwa GBVF santse le botlhokwa mo go maswe.
tgt_text: Furthermore, partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF, remain critical.

src_text: Boitekanelo.
tgt_text: Health.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dipuisano tse dikgolo tsa Kopano ya go Atlhaatlha Dikgato tsa Baoki mo Lefatsheng tsa go Thibela Maroborobo mme kopano eno ne eteletswe kwa pele ke naga ya rona le nngwe ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “Go dumelana ka go nna le serala se se tshwarang batho ka go lekana se se tla nnelang ruri sa dikgato tsa baoki mo lefatsheng tsa go thibela maroborobo gore ke nne mosola mo maroborobong a ka nnang teng kamoso.”.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the deliberations of the historic International Medical Countermeasures Meeting that the country co-hosted under the theme “Building consensus for an equitable and sustainable medical countermeasures platform for the next pandemic.”.

src_text: Mo kopanong eno go tšhotlhilwe kgang e ka ga ka fao mo isagong meento e pholosang matshelo batho ka abelwang dinaga ka go lekalekana, go abelana ka ditirelo tsa go tlhatlhobiwa le go neelwa melemo go ya ka gore di tlhokagala go le go kanakang seng go ya ka gore ke mang yo itsholetseng.
tgt_text: The meeting explored options to secure equitable access to lifesaving vaccines, diagnostics and therapeutics for future pandemics based on need and not on wealth.

src_text: Seno se ne sa dira gore go nne le dilo tse go dumelanwang ka tsona pele go ka simololwa ka Kopano ya Maemo a kwa Godimo e ka ga go Thibela Leroborobo, go Ipaakanyetsa Lona le go Samagana le Lona kwa Kopanokgothakgotheng ya bo 78 ya Dinagakopano monongwaga.
tgt_text: This began consensus building exercise ahead of the High Level Meeting on Pandemic Prevention, Preparedness and Response at the 78th United Nations General Assembly this year.

src_text: Mo go nngwe ya ditiragalo seng tse di tsamaisanang le se re buileng ka sona mo godimo, ke tshwetso ya go dira gore melemo ya setso le yona dirisiwe mo maokelong mme tshwetso eno tserwe mo Kopanong ya mo malobeng ya Melemo ya Setso e neng tsenetswe ke Lefapha la Boitekanelo, Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Merero ya Boitekanelo (WHO), Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU) mmogo le Dinaga tse di Dirisanang Mmogo tse di kwa Borwa jwa Aforika (SADC).
tgt_text: In separate but related development, the recent Traditional Medicine Summit hosted by the Department of Health is part of the resolutions taken at the World Health Organisation (WHO), African Union as well as Southern Africa Development Community (SADC) to integrate traditional medicine into health systems.

src_text: Go Tlhabela Bana Moento wa Mmoko le Kholera.
tgt_text: Child Immunisation and Cholera.

src_text: Mmoko yo weleng ka nna kotsi mo baneng ba ba iseng ba tlhabele moento wa mmoko.
tgt_text: The measles outbreak poses risk to children who are not immunised.

src_text: Go ikuelwa mo batsading le mo bagodising ba bana go dira bonnete jwa gore bana ba bona ba tlhabelwa moento jaaka go na le letsholo la go tlhabela bana botlhe moento ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Parents and legal guardians are urged to ensure that their children are immunised as part of the nationwide child immunisation campaign.

src_text: Matshwao mmoko ke a akaretsang go fisa mo mmeleng, go hibila matlho, go elaela dinko le go gotlhola, go tšhipoga diso tse disesane.
tgt_text: Measles symptoms include fever, red eyes, runny nose and cough, typically appearing before the characteristic rash.

src_text: Ka ntlha ya dikgetse tse di ntseng di begiwa sešweng jaana tsa batho ba ba tshwerweng ke kholera, Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go ikelatlhoko gore ga ba na matshwao ape go tshwana le go felelwa ke metsi mo mmeleng ka ntlha ya letshololo, go tlhatsa le go tlhoka maatla mo mmeleng.
tgt_text: Following the recent rise in cholera cases, Cabinet urged citizens to be vigilant of any symptoms, which include diarrhoea dehydration, vomiting and body weakness.

src_text: Ka ntlha ya fa bolwetse jono bo anama ka ntlha ya go dirisa metsi a kgotlhelegileng le dijo tse di tshwaetsegileng, baagi ba elediwa gore ba bedise metsi, ba buduse dijo le go itlwaetsa go tlhapa diatla ka metsi sesepa gore ba nne phepa gore ba kgone go thibela go anama ga bolwetse jono.
tgt_text: Spread mainly through polluted water or contaminated food, the public is reminded to boil water, cook food thoroughly, and practice basic hygiene of washing hands with soap and water to prevent transmission.

src_text: Batho botlhe ba ba ikutlwang ba na le matshwao a tshwanang le kholera ka tswa ba kile ba tswa ka fa nageng kgotsa ba ise ba tswe ka naga, ba tshwanetse go leba kwa bookelong jo bo gaufi le bona.
tgt_text: All people who experience cholera-like symptoms, with or without local or international travel history, must immediately visit their nearest health facility.

src_text: Go se Felelwe ke Metsi.
tgt_text: Water security.

src_text: Kabinete itumeletse go thakgololwa ga bodutelo jo bogolo ka fa nageng jwa metsi jwa Vlakfontein Reservoir kwa Gauteng, jo bo kgonang go boloka dilitara di le dimilione di le 210 tsa metsi tse di kgonang go tlamela metsi bosigo le motshegare mme tiro e setseng mo bodutelong jono jwa metsi go solofetswe gore tla garela ka Moranang.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the launch of the country’s largest reservoir, the Vlakfontein Reservoir in Gauteng, which can store up to 210 million-litres of water equivalent to 24 hours of water demand, and is expected to be completed in April.

src_text: Porojeke eno tlhodile ditiro di le 220 tseo mo go tsona go thapilweng baagi ba ba tswang mo lefelong leo mmogo le tse dingwe di le 110 mo Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Ekurhuleni.
tgt_text: The project has created about 220 job opportunities for the local communities and 110 jobs in the Ekurhuleni Local Municipality.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo go maAforika Borwa gore ba tlhokomele mafaratlhatlha naga ya rona metsi ka go loma sepodisi tsebe fa go na le bao ba senyang mo go 0800 10111 mmogo le go itsise masepala wa gaeno fa go na le mafaratlhatlha a dutlang metsi.
tgt_text: Cabinet called on South Africans to protect our water infrastructure by reporting vandalism to the police on 0800 10111 and water leaks to your local municipality.

src_text: Baagi le bona ba ka thusa ka go sonaga metsi.
tgt_text: Citizens can also play their part in using water sparingly.

src_text: Dipula tse di Bogale.
tgt_text: Severe weather.

src_text: Ka ntlha ya go ema sejaro ga ditlhopha tsa Tlhokomelo ya Masetlapelo, naga kgonne go fokotsa bogale jwa ditshenyegelo tse di bakilweng ke dipula, tseo di galefisitsweng ke ditsuatsue tsa cyclone Freddy tseo di setlileng dikarolo tsa ka fa bokone le botlhaba jwa Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: The preparedness of Disaster Management teams, limited the impact of heavy rains, exacerbated by cyclone Freddy that affected the north-eastern parts of South Africa.

src_text: Puso tswelela go bokeletse metswedi yotlhe e ka re tswang thuso re nang le yona go nna karolo ya letsholo la maemo masetlapelo ka fa nageng go thusa go busetsa maemo sekeng mo mafelong a gogotsweng ke merwalela e nnileng teng.
tgt_text: Government continues to mobilise all available resources as part of the national state of disaster to support recovery efforts in areas impacted by flooding.

src_text: Re bone Mekgatlho e Seng ya Puso (di-NGO) mentsi dira Botho mmogo le baagi le dikgwebo le mekgatlho e thusang batho e thusitseng batho ba ba neng ba tlhoka thuso.
tgt_text: The spirit of Ubuntu was shown by the many NGOs, community, business and relief organisations who have assisted those in need.

src_text: Go busetsa maemo sekeng go tla tlhoka gore re tsaye matsapa magolo, re tla tlhoka go sola mosola sengwe le sengwe se re nang le sona le bokgoni bongwe le bongwe jo sešhaba sa rona se nang le jona.
tgt_text: Our recovery is going to take massive effort, drawing on the resources and capabilities of our entire nation.

src_text: Go ikuelwa mo baaging gore ba nne ka fa dintlong fa dipula di tshologa, ba seke ba leka go kgabaganya ka maoto, go thuma kgotsa go kgabaganya ka dijanaga metsi a sianang kgotsa dinoka, mme le baagi ba ba nnang mo mafelong a tamang metsi ka bontsi ba tshwanetse go tsaya tsia melaetsa ya go lemosa baagi ka dipula tsa matlakadibe mme ba tsaye dikgato go itlhokomela.
tgt_text: Residents are urged to stay indoors during stormy weather, never try to walk, swim or drive through fast-moving floodwater or rivers, and people living in low-lying areas should be aware of weather warnings and take the necessary precautions.

src_text: Sekema sa Bosetšhaba sa Thuso ya Ditšhelete ya Baithuti (NSFAS).
tgt_text: National Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).

src_text: NSFAS ke letsholo le le mosola la puso le maitlho lona leng go fedisa khumanego le go se lekalekane mo baaging fa ba tshnwanetse go tsweletsa dithuto kwa ditheong tse digolwane tsa thuto le katiso.
tgt_text: NSFAS represents progressive programme by government to systematically break the legacies of inter-generational social inequality of post school education and training.

src_text: Le fa go na le dikgwetlho, NSFAS kgonne go tokafatsa maemo tota, ya tlamela baithuti ba feta ba le milione ka madi a kanaka R47 bilione a beetsweng tiro eno.
tgt_text: Despite the challenges, NSFAS has made significant improvements, funding more than one million students with projected budget of R47 billion.

src_text: Baithuti botlhe ba dikopo tsa bona di sa atlegang ba ka dira boikuelo mo inthaneteng gore di sekasekiwe sešwa ke Bothati jwa go Dira Boikuelo jo bo seng ka fa Tlase ga Setheo Seno ka go dirisa Serala sa Webesaete sa myNSFAS mo go https://my.nsfas.org.za/.
tgt_text: Students, with declined applications for funding, can lodge appeals online with the Independent Appeals Tribunal via the myNSFAS Portal (https://my.nsfas.org.za/).

src_text: Ikwadiso mo Inthaneteng ya go Tsenela Ditlhopho.
tgt_text: Online Voter Registration.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo batlhophing botlhe ba ba nang le matshwanedi go ikwadisetsa ditlhopho tsa ngwaga wa 2024 tsa go tlhopha lekoko le le tla busang mmuso wa Naga le wa Porofense mo go https://registertovote.elections.org.za.
tgt_text: Cabinet called on all eligible voters to register online at https://registertovote.elections.org.za for the 2024 National and Provincial Elections.

src_text: Khomišene ya Ditlhopho thankgolotse lenaneo la go ikwadisetsa ditlhopho ka inthanete ka la bo 20 Tlhakole 2023, mme ikuetse mo bašweng ba dingwaga tsa bona di ba letlang go ka dira ditlhopho gore ba ikwadisetse gore ba kgone go sola mosola tshwanelo ya bona ya temokerasi ya go itlhophela moeteledipele.
tgt_text: The Electoral Commission launched an online voter registration campaign on 20 February 2023, and appealed to the youth who are eligible to vote to register so that they can exercise their democratic right to vote.

src_text: Baagi ba leng gore ba setse bona ba ikwadisitse bona ba rotloediwa gore ba lekole maina bona mo lenaneong la badiradikopo, mme ba baye dintlha tsa bona mo dinakong fa le gore go sengwe se se fetogileng mo dintlheng tsa bona tse di leng mo lenaneong leno.
tgt_text: Citizens already registered to vote are also encouraged to check their voters’ roll address, and update their address if they have moved since the last general elections.

src_text: Badiraditlhopho ba tshwanetse go ikwadisa mo mafelong mo metseng ba nnang mo go yona mmogo le go dira ditlhopho tsa bona mo mafelong ao ba ikwadisitseng mo go ona.
tgt_text: Voters must register where they reside, and vote where they are registered.

src_text: Motho letleletswe go dira ditlhopho fa le gore:Ke moAforika Borwa na le dingwaga di le 16 kgotsa tse di kwa godimo ga tseo (mme tla letlelelwa go ka dira ditlhopho fa sena go nna le dingwaga di le 18) bile gapeO na le bukana tala ya lekwaloitshupo kgotsa karata ya lekwaloitshupo kgotsa setlankana se se leng mo molaong sa go dirisiwa nakwana sa lekwaloitshupo.
tgt_text: You are eligible to register to vote if you are South African citizen;At least 16 years and older (you can only vote from age 18); andIn possession of green bar-coded ID book, smart ID card or valid temporary identity certificate.

src_text: Molaetsa wa Puso ya Amerika go Baagi ba Naga ya Bona ba ba Leng ka fa Nageng.
tgt_text: United States (US) Alert.

src_text: Kabinete sekegetse tsebe molaetsa wa puso ya Amerika go tswa kwa embasing ya yona go tsibosa baagi ba naga ya bona ba ba leng ka fa nageng le ba ba tla etelang naga eno ka seemo sa naga eno jaaka le tsela eo puso eno tlwaetseng go dira dilo ka gone le baagi ba yona tsibositse baagi ba yona gore lebile maemo a diragalang ka fa nageng eno ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho, mme ya ba eletsa gore ba itlhokomele jaaka go na le kgonagalo ya gore maemo botlhokotsebe le megwanto ka gakala mmogo le gore ba reke dijo, melemo le didirisiwa tsa thuso ya tshoganyetso ka bontsi tse di ka ba fepang sebaka sa matsatsi ka nna mararo fa dilo di ka tswa mo taolong ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: Cabinet noted the alert issued by the US Embassy as part of the US government’s standard communication to its citizens travelling and living in the country.

src_text: Puso ya naga eno ka motsotso yo mongwe le yo mongwe ke yona e rweleng maikarabelo go tlhokomela dikarolo tsotlhe ka fa nageng gore go rene pabalesego, fa go na le matshosetsi tseelwa dikgato ka bonako gore motho mongwe le mongwe ka fa nageng bolokesege.
tgt_text: It indicated Level 2 travel advisory was in effect, advising them to exercise increased caution due to crime and civil unrest as well as to stockpile three days’ worth of supplies, medicines and first aid supplies.

src_text: Fa go ka diragala gore go nne le matshosetsi ape fela, puso e busang jaanong eno ke yona ya ntlha e tla itsiseng baagi botlhe ka seno.
tgt_text: Government continuously monitors all areas that impact on our nation, any concern is acted upon swiftly to ensure the safety of everyone in the country.

src_text: Tirelo ya Sepedodi sa Aforika Borwa.
tgt_text: Should there be any risks detected, the government will be the first to inform the public.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgang tsa gore Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) gaufi le go garela tiro e neng saletse morago ya go dira diteko tsa DNA mo dilaboratoring tsa bona tsa go tlhatlhoba bopaki ka ditsela tsa sesaense.
tgt_text: SAPS.

src_text: Seno se tla dira gore dikgetse tse di amanang le go bogisiwa le go betelelwa ga basadi di rarabololwe ka bonako.
tgt_text: Cabinet is pleased that the South African police service has nearly cleared the DNA testing backlog at its forensic service laboratories.

src_text: SAPS okeditse gape le mafelo go dira diteko tsa DNA ka go garela go agiwa ga moago wa go tlhatlhoba bopaki ka ditsela tsa sesaense kwa Gqeberha mo porofenseng ya Kapa Botlhaba, seno se tla rola boima jo lefelo leno la porofense ya Kapa Bophirima le neng le borwele  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: This breakthrough will ensure that gender-based violence-related cases are speedily resolved..

src_text: Leano la Naga la go Samagana le Tiro (NSP) ya go Lwantshana le Bolwetse jwa Lebolelamading (HIV), Bolwetse jwa lehuba (TB) le Malwetse a Fetelanang ka Thobalano (di-STI) go Tloga ka Ngwaga wa 2023 go Fitlha ka wa.
tgt_text: The SAPS has also added additional DNA testing capacity with the completion of forensic laboratory in Gqeberha in the Eastern Cape, which will ease pressure on the existing laboratory in the Western Cape  Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse gore go ka phasaladiwa Leano la Naga la go Samagana le Tiro (NSP) ya go Lwantshana le Bolwetse jwa Lebolelamading (HIV), Bolwetse jwa lehuba (TB) le Malwetse a Fetelanang ka Thobalano (di-STI) go Tloga ka Ngwaga wa 2023 go Fitlha ka wa 2028 (NSP 2023-2028).
tgt_text: National Strategic Plan (NSP) for HIV, TB and STIs 2023-..

src_text: NSP 2023-2028 ka botlalo tla ribololwa gore baagi ba itseele yona ka tsebe ka Letsatsi la go Keteka Dikgato tsa Lefatshe tsa go Lwantshana le TB ka la bo 24 Mopitlwe 2023 kwa Rustenburg mo porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) for Human Immunodeficiency Virus, Tuberculosis and Sexually Transmitted Infections 2023-..

src_text: NSP tshitshinya dikgato tse di ka diragadiwang go samagana ka gangwe le malwetse otlhe HIV, di-STD le TB ka go dirisa matsholo go thibela le go alafa.
tgt_text: The full version of the NSP 2023-2028 will be released to the public on World TB Day on the 24 March 2023 in Rustenburg in the North West.

src_text: NSP eno ke leno ke leano la botlhano la go samagana le HIV, di-STD le TB mme le tlhagisa kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa mo go samaganeng le malwetse mararo ano.
tgt_text: The NSP proposes to deal with HIV, sexually transmitted infections and tuberculosis through holistic approach that includes preventative and therapeutic measures.

src_text: Leano leno la dingwaga di le tlhano le tlhagisa leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya makala mantsi a farologaneng a ka ga go thusa batho gore re ka ngwaga wa 2030 go bo go fedisitswe malwetse setšhaba HIV, di-STD le TB.
tgt_text: This is the 5th NSP for HIV, TB and STIs and it outlines the progress South Africa has made to deal with the three diseases thus far.

src_text: NSP eno kwadilwe ke Lekgotla la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la AIDS (SANAC) mme lona le dira gore puso, mekgatlho ya baagi mmogo le ba bangwe ba baagi ba dumelane ka tsela ya go samagana le maroborobo ano mararo mo sebakeng sa dingwaga di le tlhano.
tgt_text: The five-year plan provides strategic framework for multi-sectoral approach that is people-centred to eliminate HIV, TB and STIs as public health threats by..

src_text: Thulaganyo ya go kwala leano leno la rona la botlhano ne le telele jaaka go ne go bokelediwa maikutlo baagi mo setšhabeng gore re kgone go utlwa maikutlo mantsi a farologaneng mmogo le go agelela mo go seo re ithutileng sona go tswa mo maanong mo malobeng.
tgt_text: The drafting of the NSP was coordinated by the South African National AIDS Council (SANAC) which brings together government, civil society, and other social partners to build consensus and drive well-coordinated, unified response to three epidemics over five-year period.

src_text: NSP gatelela botlhokwa jwa go ritibatsa dilo tseo di re kgoreletsang mmogo le go oketsa phitlhelelo ya ditirelo ka go lekalekana ka go dirisa dithulaganyo tsa boitekanelo tse di sa tseweng ke phefo.
tgt_text: The process to develop this 5th iteration of our national plan was extensively consulted across society to secure the widest range of views and ideas, and building on the lessons learnt from our previous plans.

src_text: Go akarediwa ga ditirelo tsa malwetse kgatelelo ya tlhaloganyo le maikutlo le tsa go thobiwa matswalo ke ka ntlha ya gore malwetse ano tsamaelana thata le batho ba ba nang le malwetse HIV, TB, di-STD, mmogo le ba ba bogang ka ditiragalo tsa go bogisa le go bolaya batho ba sesadi, ka go gatakakiwa ga ditshwanelo tse ba nang le tsona tsa botho mmogo le ka ntlha ya go se lekane re se meno.
tgt_text: The NSP emphasises the need to break down barriers and maximise equitable and equal access to services through resilient and integrated health systems.

src_text: Mo leanong le lentšhwa leno go okeditswe gape le ditiro tsa go samagana le malwetse di-STI, go akaretsa le malwetse go ruruga sebete mmogo le Mogare wa Kankere ya Molongwana wa Popelo ao tshwarang gantsi batho ba ba nang le HIV.
tgt_text: The inclusion of mental health services and social support is based on the strong association between HIV, TB, STIs with gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF), human rights violations and inequalities.

src_text: Pegelo e ka ga Tseo di Utlwanetsweng kwa Lekgotleng la Dinagakopano le le Disang Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi (UNFCCC COP 27).
tgt_text: The new plan features an expanded scope for the management of STIs, including viral hepatitis and Human Papilloma Virus, which are common coinfections in HIV infected individuals.

src_text: Kabinete rometswe pegelo ya tseo di utlwanetsweng kwa UNFCCC COP 27 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sharm El Sheik kwa nageng ya Egepeta ka Ngwanaitseele.
tgt_text: Report on the outcomes of United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC COP 27).

src_text: Le fa naga ya Aforika Borwa dumela gore go santse go na le dikgwetlho tse dintsi mo go samaganeng le phetogo ya maemo loapi nopotse gore dilo tse di setseng di dirilwe go samagana le bothata jono di re tiisa mooko.
tgt_text: Cabinet received report on the outcomes of United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC COP 27) which was held in Sharm El Sheik in Egypt in November.

src_text: Dipuisano mo kopanong ya COP 27 di dirile gore go tsewe ditshwetso tse dikgolo tse di iseng di tle di tsewe fa go tla mo mererong ya phetogo ya maemo loapi mo go tserweng tshwetso ya go tlhoma Letlole leo le tla thusang dinaga tse di santseng di iketetsa go duelela ditshenyegelo tse di bakilweng ke maemo phetogo ya maemo loapi mo dinageng tseno.
tgt_text: While South Africa acknowledges the challenges remaining in fighting climate change, the gains various parties are making to address the issue are welcomed.

src_text: Go tlhomilwe gape le Komiti ya Dithulaganyo go rulaganyetsa letlole leno mme maitlhomo ke gore go tla tsewa ditshwetso ka lona mo kopanong ya COP28 e tla tshwarwang ka ngwaga wa..  COP27 gateletse gape le botlhokwa jwa go oketsa lebelo la go tlhabolola Dibanka tsa go Thusa Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le Ditheo tsa Boditšhabatšhaba tsa Matlole mmogo le go ikuela mo go batsholadišere ba ditheo tseno go tsaya ditshwetso tse dikgolo tsa go oketsa tlamelo ya matlole dikgato tsa go samagana le phetogo ya maemo loapi mo ngwageng wa matlole wa 2023 mmogo le go dira gore dithulaganyo tsa ditheo tsa bona di nne le mosola.
tgt_text: COP 27 negotiations contributed to the historic decision to establish Fund to assist developing countries to respond to Loss and Damage caused by climate change.

src_text: Kopano ya bofelo ya COP27 bontshitse ka fao dikgato tsa go samagana le matsapa phetogo ya maemo loapi di tshwanetsweng go tsewa ka bonako ka teng, mmogo le tlhokagalo ya go se sute mo maemong ao go ipeetsweng ona go dira gore mogote mo lefatsheng se fete ditekeriselešiase di le.
tgt_text: It established Transitional Committee to work on the modalities of this fund with view of taking decision at COP28 in..  COP27 also emphasised the need for increased momentum to reform the Multilateral Development Banks and International Financial Institutions and called on the shareholders of these institutions to take decisive action to scale-up climate finance in 2023 and make their institutional arrangements fit for purpose.

src_text: 5 ao Setlhopha sa Baemedi ba Maphata Puso ka fa Nageng e Buang ka Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi (IPCC) se bitsang gore ke "Ngwagasome o Botlhokwa Thata" mmogo le go tlhagisa letsholo le le tlhamaletseng le le ka ga ka fao go tla okediwang dikgato tsa go samagana le matsapa ano morago ga ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: The final COP27 outcome reflects the urgency of the climate crisis, and the need to keep the.

src_text: Go Tshwara Kopano ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2024 ya Merero ya Ditlakala.
tgt_text: 5-degree temperature target alive during what the International Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) calls the “Critical Decade”, including by providing clear programme to advance the mitigation agenda from now to.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula kgang ya gore Aforika Borwa tshware Kopano ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2024 ya Merero ya Ditlakala kwa Motsekapa go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 18 Lwetse.
tgt_text: Hosting of the World Waste Congress.

src_text: Moletlo ono rulaganngwa ke ba Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Merero ya go Olela Ditlakala, ono ke mokgatlho wa lefatshe o nang le badiredi le baitseanape ba ditiro tsa go olela ditlakala go tswa mo lefatsheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved for South Africa to host the World Waste Congress in Cape Town from 15 to 18 September.

src_text: Moletlo ono tla tswela naga ya Aforika Borwa mosola gonne baromiwa bano ba tla abelana ka ditsela tsa ga jaanong tsa go dira tiro ya go olela ditlakala ka manontlhotlho.
tgt_text: The event is being organised by the International Solid Waste Association, an international network of waste professionals and expert from across the world.

src_text: Moletlo ono tla dira gore baitseanape go tswa kwa mafatsheng boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le baabi ba ditirelo tsa thekenoloji mo lephateng leno ba tshologele ka kwano mme seno se tla tswela mosola lekala la naga ya rona ya Aforika Borwa le iseng le thanye sentle la kolelo ya ditlakala mme dikgwebo tse di dirang ka ditlakala di tla iponela botlhale mo moletlong ono.
tgt_text: The congress will benefit South Africa, as delegates will share current trends and best practices in waste management.

src_text: Ka ngwaga wa 2011 Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula Leano la Naga la go Sela Ditlakala (NWMS) gore le tsenngwe tirisong.
tgt_text: The congress will attract international experts and technology providers and South Africa’s informal waste sector and small business will benefit.

src_text: NWMS na le dilo di le robedi tse ipeetseng tsona tse di botlhokwa mme mo go tsona ke go dira gore go fokotsa ditlakala nne selo se se botlhokwa, go dirisa dilo makgetlho mantsinyana, go fetola tiro ya selo se se latlhilweng mmogo le go tsosolosa selo se se latlhilweng.
tgt_text: In 2011, Cabinet approved the National Waste Management Strategy (NWMS) for implementation.

src_text: Seno se tla thusa naga gape gore kgone go diragatsa tlamelo ya ditirelo tsa go sela ditlakala e tswileng diatla mmogo le go dira gore lekala la tshelo ya ditlakala le nne le seabe mo ikonoming ya tshomarelo ya tlhago.
tgt_text: The NWMS has eight key goals including promoting waste minimisation, re-use, recycling and recovery of waste.

src_text: Se sengwe gape ka naga ya Aforika Borwa ke gore na le seabe mo ditumelanong tsa boditšhabatšhaba tseo di amanang le matsapa go sela ditlakala.
tgt_text: It also helps the country deliver effective and efficient waste services and grows the contribution of the waste sector to the green economy.

src_text: Go Tlhophiwa ga Teropokgolo go tla Tshwarelwang kwa go yona Samiti ya bo 15 ya Dinaga tsa BRICS.
tgt_text: South Africa is also party to international agreements that relate to waste management issues.

src_text: Kabinete dumelane gore Gauteng tla nna lona lefwlo le go tla tshwarelwang kwa go lona Samiti ya bo 15 ya Dinaga tsa BRICS go tloga ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 24 Phatwe..  Naga ya Aforika Borwa tsere maemo a sa nneleng ruri go nna Komangkanna mo Kopanong ya BRICS monongwaga ka la bo 1 Ferikgong 2023 e neng tshwerwe ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “BRICS le Tirisanommogo le Dinaga tsa Aforika go Dira Gore Lebelo la Kgolo le Okediwe Nne Kgolo e tla Nnelang Ruri bile Ditšhaba tsotlhe di Nathelane Tlhogwana ya Tsie”.
tgt_text: Selection of the Host City for the 15th BRICS Summit.

src_text: Go tloga ka motsi yo naga eno neng nna karolo ya setlhopha seno sa dinaga tse ikonomi ya tsona ntseng gola mo dingwageng di le 12 tse di fetileng palo ya maloko BRICS mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa oketsegile thata.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved that Gauteng would host the 15th BRICS Summit to be held in South Africa from 22 to 24 August.

src_text: Ka ngwaga wa 2021, diphesente di feta di le 17 tsa ditlhagisiwa tsa naga ya rona tse di rekisediwang dinaga tsa boditšhaba tse di neng di rekisediwa dinaga tse dingwe tsa BRICS fa ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe diphesente di feta di le 29 tsa dilo tse re di rekang kwa dinageng tsa boditšhaba di rekiwa mo go tsona dinaga tseno  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
Kgwedi ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.
tgt_text: South Africa assumed the rotational Chairship of the BIRICS Forum from 1 January 2023 under the theme “BRICS and Africa Partnership for Accelerated Growth, Sustainable Development and Inclusive Multilateralism”.

src_text: Naga keteka Kgwedi ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “Go Rokelela le go Somarela Setlwaedi sa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho gore le mo isagong se nne teng”.
tgt_text: South Africa’s membership of BRICS has grown substantially since the country joined this group of emerging economies 12 years ago.

src_text: Kabinete rotloetsa maAforika Borwa go iphantsha ka ngwaoboswa e humileng ka ditso tse re nang le tsona mmogo le go farologana ga rona go go dirileng gore re ipope seoposengwe.
tgt_text: In 2021, over 17 percent of South Africa’s exports were destined for other BRICS countries while over 29 percent of our total imports came from these countries/C.

src_text: Tla re tlotleng bao ba ikentshitseng setlhabelo mo kgaratlhong ya gore re nne le kgololesego ka maitlhomo gore ka le lengwe la matsatsi re keteng go nna le ditshwanelo re le batho mme re tswelele go gata mo mositong wa gore batho botlhe ba nne le seabe mo ikonoming jaaka borakhukhu ba rona ba re bonetse seno kwa pele  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Upcoming Events.

src_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go:Setlhopha sa Aforika Borwa sa Basadi ba Motshameko wa Kerikete, ka ntlha ya go tsholetsa folaga ya naga kwa godimo kwa Metshamekong ya Sejana sa Lefatshe sa Metshameko ya Kerikete ya Basadi ya T20 e neng tshamekelwa ka fa nageng.Sethopha sa Basadi sa Motshameko wa ice hokhi sa Aforika Borwa seo se tshamekileng motshameko wa sona wa ntlha kwa Sejaneng sa Motshameko wa Lefatshe wa Ice Hockey o neng tshamekelwa kwa Motsekapa.Setlhopha sa Banna sa Motshameko wa Hockey sa Aforika Borwa jaaka se atlegile mo go tshwareng Metshameko ya Sejana sa Lefatshe ya FIH ya go Tshamekela Hockey ka fa Teng ga Meago kwa Pretoria go tloga ka la bo 5 go fitlha ka la bo 11 Tlhakole.
tgt_text: Human Rights Month.

src_text: Setlhopha sa Bagale ba Aforika sa Banyana-Banyana morago ga motshameko wa bona kwa Motshamekong wa Sejana sa Lefatshe sa Turkey, mo setlhopha seno se neilweng maemo boganka go laetla gore se fenye metshameko ya Setlhopha sa le go boa ka sejana ka fa nageng.Barulaganyi ba metshameko ya Mabelo Dijanaga ya Formula e neng tshwaretswe ka fa nageng le ka fa kontinenteng lekgetlo la ntlha mme tsamaile sentle e neng tshwaretswe kwa Motsekapa.
tgt_text: The country commemorates Human Rights Month under the theme “Consolidating and Sustaining Human Rights culture into the future”.

src_text: Teropokgolo eno ne ya keteka seno go tshwana le diteropokgolo tse dingwe tsotlhe di le 11 mo lefatsheng tshe di kileng tsa tshwara Metshameko ya Lefatshe ya Mabelo Dijanaga ya Formula , mo dijanaga tsotlhe le mafelo a neng dirisiwa go dirisitsweng fela motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa le maokwane a sa kgotlheleng tikologo.Rre Calib Cassim yo thapilweng go nna CEO wa namaotshwere kwa Eskom yo rwalang marapo go latela gore rolwe ke Rre André Marinus de Ruyter, yo puso mo eletsang tsotlhe tse dintle mo go tseo batlang go di dira mo isagong ya gagwe.Baagi ba naga ya Nigeria go latela gore Setlhopha sa Basekaseki ba Tsamaiso ya Ditlhopho ba Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika ba totobatse gore tsotlhe mo ditlhophong tsa naga yotlhe di ne di apere tshiamo.
tgt_text: Cabinet encourages South Africans to celebrate our rich cultural heritage and diversity that has the power to unite our nation.

src_text: Melaetsa ya MatshedisoKabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa:Peter Cyril Jones, molwelakgaratlho wyo gape neng le moeteledipele wa mokgatlho wa Black People’s Convention.Morwediakgosi Alice, morwedi Kgosi Solomon kaDinuzulu.Paul Herbst, Motlhankedimogolo wa setlamo sa Medi-Response, yo leng moeteledipele yo tlotliwang mo ditirelong tsa tshoganyetso tsa kalafo yo mo malobeng thusitseng go pholosa batho kwa Türkiye le kwa Seria.Rafiq Rohan yo neng le mmegadikgang yo itsegeng yo gape neng le yo mongwe wa maAforika Borwa ao neng tshwaretswe ditiro tsa sepolotiki kwa Robben Island yo kileng nna mongwe wa barulaganyi ba ba simolotseng lekwalodikgang la puso la Vuk’uzenzele, mo neng le morulaganyi wa dikgang mme mo tsamaong ya nako ya nna morulaganyi wa dikgang tsa sepolotiki mo lekwalodikganyeng la “The Sowetan”, ya nna morulaganyimogolo mo lekwalodikganyeng la “The Star”, mme mo malobanyaneng ne le morulaganyi yo mogolo wa Al Jazeera  Ba Ba ThapilwengPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.
tgt_text: Let us pay tribute to those who sacrificed their lives in our struggle for freedom to ensure we may enjoy human rights and continue to work towards inclusive socio-economic development as envisioned by our founding fathers  Messages.

src_text: Rre Hishaam Emeran thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) wa Setlamo sa Setheo sa Banamedi ba Diterene sa Aforika Borwa (PRASA).
tgt_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well wishes to:South African Women cricket team for flying the flag high by reaching their inaugural ICC Women’s T20 World Cup final hosted in the country.The South African women’s ice hockey team who made their debut in the Women’s Ice Hockey World Championships which was being held in Cape Town.SA Hockey for successfully hosting the FIH Indoor Hockey World Cup in Pretoria from 5 to 11 February.

src_text: Rre Themba Rikhotso thapilwe go nna CEO wa Banka e Thusang Balemi le Barui ba Dipolasa ka Mafatshe ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa mmogo le go nna Motlhankedimogolo mo Botong ya Batlhankedibagolo ba Banka eno ya Mafatshe.
tgt_text: African champions Banyana-Banyana following their performance at the Turkish Women’s Cup, where the team was crowned winners of Group and brought trophy back.The organisers of the country’s first successful hosting of the Formula race on the African continent, held in Cape Town.
